Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: Be sure you wear this on \Nyour chest at all times.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: Be careful not to lose it.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: Haven't seen you guys around before.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: After all, this will be my thirty-fifth attempt.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: Well, you could say I'm an exam veteran.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: That isn't something to brag about.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: If you have any questions, \Nfeel free to ask me.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: Hey, are there others who have taken the exam a bunch \Nof times like you?

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: Well, I have the most experience here, but there are a few others.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: And he's smarter than he looks.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: On the other side, we have number 103,

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: He tends to hold grudges, so you don't want to end up on his bad side.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: He's getting old, but there still isn't \Na better martial artist around.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: Then you have the three brothers, \NAmori, Imori, and Umori.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: They perform consistently well, thanks to their excellent teamwork.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: He specializes in killing all manner of creatures, \Nby blow dart and club.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: There are many more, but they have taken the test \Nthe most times.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: His arms seem to have become flower petals.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: When you bump into someone, \Nyou really should apologize.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: Does that mean he took last year's exam?

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: Last year, he was a virtual \Nlock to pass the test, until he all but killed an examiner he didn't like.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: A-And they're still allowing him to \Nretake the exam this year?

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: Every year, the examiners and \Ntest content change, and the examiners are the ones \Nwho choose the new content.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: The devil himself could pass if that were \Nthe examiners' determination.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: That's just how the Hunter Exam works.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: He looks dangerous. \NThat much is for sure.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: A little something to mark our acquaintance.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: As it happened, I was thirsty...

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: He always plays the nice guy, despite being nastier than \Nanyone else here.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: Best of luck to all of us!

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: The juice I gave you contains an \Nextremely strong laxative.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: One sip, and for three days, your guts will be a non-stop roller coaster.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: You'll need diapers to take the exam.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: Tonpa-san, this juice must have expired.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: That laxative should have \Npractically no taste nor scent.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: I didn't realize the juice had gone bad.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: It's okay. You don't have to apologize.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: I've sampled all kinds of mountain \Ngrasses and plants.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: So I can usually taste when something's bad.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: Damn... I had to run into \Nthis wild mountain kid.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: Still, there's something wrong \Nwith this year's rookies.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: He seemed gullible when I approached him.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: Don't tell anyone else, but I'm actually a ninja.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: I seek the legendary scroll... Shh...

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: The Ultimate Ninja Scroll. \NThat is why I desire to become a Hunter.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: I've heard that it's hidden somewhere inaccessible to ordinary people.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: Yeah, I guess... So, how about it?

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: As a ninja, I make it a point to never drink anything someone else offers.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: I could tell by his eyes that he's no fool.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: One false step, and I could've \Nbeen in real danger.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: That guy just oozes peril. \NI can't even go near him.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: Then there's that guy I can't stand, number 187, Nicolas.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: Must've been tough to make it here.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: Not really. Everything went \Nas predicted by my data...

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: I used historical data, from past Hunter Exams, \Nto calculate this year's location.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: My name is Tonpa. Nice to meet you.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: This is your thirty-fifth attempt, the second-highest number by one person.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: And with thirty, you have the most \Nconsecutive appearances.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: How about it? \NLet's drink to our new friendship...

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: But you have yet to actually pass the exam.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: I assume that's because you're too absorbed by your other objective.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: Well, I won't share my knowledge \Nwith anyone else, seeing as you hold the consecutive \Nappearance record...

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: I'll break that snotty nose of yours.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: Could I have more of that juice?

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: The laxative he drank earlier should \Nhave taken effect by now.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: It's only a laxative, but if he imbibes that much, \Nhe could die of dehydration.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: He knew what was in the juice?

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: This year's rookies are all insane...

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: That just means crushing them will \Nbe all the more worthwhile.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: The entry period for \NHunter applicants has ended.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: The Hunter Exam will now begin!

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: If you are short on luck or ability, you could very well end up seriously injured or even dead.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: Those who accept the risks, \Nplease follow me.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: Otherwise, please exit via \Nthe elevator behind you.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: All 404 applicants will participate in Phase One.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: Of course, no one turned around and left.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: I'd hoped a few might withdraw.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: The people in front started running.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: I am Satotz, the Phase One examiner.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: I shall lead you to the exam's Second Phase.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: This is part of the test?

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: You must follow me to Phase Two.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: This is the exam's First Phase.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: I cannot tell you where or \Nwhen you must arrive.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: I expect it's an endurance test.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: But there is the mental stress \Nof not knowing how far we'll have to run.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: He's also testing our mental fortitude.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: The exam's First Phase begins, amidst a mix of warriors and knaves.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: One candidate is disqualified \Nbefore it even starts.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: The total number of Hunter \Napplicants is 404.

Title: Rivals x For x Survival.
Line: Next time: Hope x And x Ambition.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: And some incredible people are \Ndrawn to that magic.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: The Hunter Exam will now begin!

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: I am Satotz, the Phase One examiner.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: You must follow me to Phase Two.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: This is the exam's First Phase.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Two hours have passed since \Nthe start of the exam.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: The applicants have traveled over thirty kilometers from the start.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: None of them knows how far they must go.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: They are forced to run at the leader's pace, \Nwith no goal specified.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: It's a monotonous course with no end in sight.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: And many applicants have \Nalready dropped out.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Extrapolating from historical data, \Nthis exam type usually involves a forty-kilometer course.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: My calculations suggest that we are nearing the goal...

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Every person here is a monster.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: You should show the \NHunter Exam some respect!

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Why are you using a skateboard?

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: The examiner only told us to follow him.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Whose side are you on, eh?

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Making a fool out of me...

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: It's rare to see someone \Nout of steam so early.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: You must be a hell of an incompetent.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: People like you are doomed \Nto fail the Hunter Exam.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: He won't recover from the abuse \Nwe just dished out.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: I doubt he'll ever take the \NHunter Exam again.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: You really do love crushing rookies.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: It's been about four hours since the exam began.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: We must have traveled at least sixty kilometers.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: How much farther do we need to go?

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Only one rookie, every three years, \Npasses the Hunter Exam.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: So for a normal human like me, it isn't even worth dreaming about...

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: If you let me try your skateboard, okay?

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: It is now time to pick up the pace a bit.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: He's prancing up the stairs, \Nas if they're not even there.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: If he keeps up this pace, tons of people will fail.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Gon, wanna race to see who finishes first?

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: The loser has to buy dinner.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: I realized that I can keep going if I don't worry about how stupid I look!

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: I should probably follow his example.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Is this too easy for you, Kurapika?

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Are you really trying to become \Na Hunter for the money?

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: We've only been together for a few days, but I know you better than that.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Sure, you have a nasty attitude, \Nand you aren't very bright.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: But you're not a shallow person.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: I've seen many who live for money.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: That's why the Kurta were targeted.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: We Kurta are known for \Nour unique scarlet eyes.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: When our emotions are heightened, our eyes turn scarlet, as though on fire.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: The eyes in that scarlet state are considered one of the seven most \Nbeautiful colors in the world.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: They command high prices \Non the black market.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: That's why the Phantom Troupe \Nattacked you?

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: They took every single eye from \Nmy brethren's corpses.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: I can still hear their darkened eyes \Ncrying out in anguish...

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: I swear I will capture the Phantom Troupe!

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: And I will reclaim the eyes of my clan!

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: That's why you want to be a Hunter?

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Yeah, if I become a Hunter with rich clients,

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: I'll gain access to black market information.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: But you'll have to swallow your pride and become the kind of Hunter you despise!

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: The blow to my pride is nothing, measured against the suffering \Nmy clan endured.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Sorry, but I have no noble cause.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: You really believe you can buy \Neverything with money?

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: For the right price, you can buy not only \Ntreasures, but dreams, hearts, and even people's lives!

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: If you're insulting the Kurta, \NI won't forgive you.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: If I'd had money, my friend \Nwouldn't have died!

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: The problem was that the \Noperation costs a fortune.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: I thought I could become a doctor...

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: I wanted to cure kids who have \Nthe same disease, and be able to tell them \Nit was free of charge!

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Then I could have told his parents, too.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Turns out that to become a doctor, you need even more money!

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: See you at the goal, Kurapika.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: I'm a teenager, just like you guys!

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: I'm impressed that you \Ncan keep up with me.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Or maybe it's just that \Neveryone else is too slow.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: The Hunter Exam is gonna be a breeze.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Hey, why do you want to \Nbecome a Hunter?

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: I'm not really interested in \Nbecoming a Hunter.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: I heard the exam was supposed \Nto be really hard, so I thought it'd be fun.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: So I want to become a Hunter, like my dad.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: What kind of Hunter is he?

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: You want to be like your dad, but you don't know anything about him?

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: I was raised by Mito-san, so I've only seen my dad in pictures.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: When he was twelve, \Nmy dad took the Hunter Exam.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: He passed and became a Hunter.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: I want to find out why he \Nchose to be a Hunter over being with me.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Finally, I can get out of this dark tunnel!

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Now, let's see how many made it this far.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: I was faster, so you have to buy dinner!

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: I believe that you crossed the \Nfinish line simultaneously.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Is this where the Second Phase \Nof the exam takes place?

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: No, we still have quite a way to go.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: The Numere Wetlands, also known as Swindlers Swamp.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: We must cross these wetlands to \Nreach Phase Two of the exam.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: This place is home to many bizarre animals, many of them being cunning, insatiable creatures who deceive humans and prey upon them.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: If you let them fool you...

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: These wetland creatures will use every trick in the book to fool their prey.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: An ecosystem in which creatures \Nobtain food through deceit...

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Stay very close to me so you won't be deceived.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: How can they fool us, \Nwhen we're expecting it?

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: I just said that they can't.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: It's a Man-Faced Ape, one of the creatures \Nthat dwell in the Numere Wetlands!

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Man-Faced Apes love the taste \Nof fresh human flesh.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: However, their limbs are long and thin, \Nso they're quite weak.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: That's why they disguise themselves as humans.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: They trick humans into following them \Ninto these wetlands, where they team up with other animals \Nto kill and devour them.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: He intends to trap every single applicant!

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: He certainly doesn't walk like a human...

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Examiners are Hunters selected by the committee to perform \Nthis duty without pay.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Any Hunter, bearing the title we seek, would have been able to block that attack.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: I shall take that as a compliment.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: However, should you attack me again, \Nfor any reason,

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: I will report you for turning \Non an examiner.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: And you will be immediately disqualified.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Nature really can be brutal to watch...

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: So he was a Man-Faced Ape, as well.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: He was attempting to confuse \Nthe applicants, to lure some of them away.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: You will be encountering such \Ndeception on a regular basis.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: I believe that a number of you were fooled into suspecting my identity?

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: If you lose sight of me in \Nthe Numere Wetlands fog, you will never reach the exam's Second Phase.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Then let us be on our way.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: And we're running through marsh this time.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Running on wet ground requires more energy.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: The applicants have finally escaped \Nthe long, dark tunnel.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Thus far, 36 candidates have \Nwithdrawn from the exam, leaving 368 remaining applicants.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Their next challenge is the Numere Wetlands, also known as Swindlers Swamp.

Title: Hope x And x Ambition.
Line: Next time: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: And some incredible people are \Ndrawn to that magic.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: Examiners are Hunters selected by the committee to perform \Nthis duty without pay.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: Any Hunter, bearing the title we seek, would have been able to block that attack.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: I shall take that as a compliment.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: However, should you attack me again, \Nfor any reason,

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: I will report you for turning \Non an examiner.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: And you will be immediately disqualified.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: The 368 applicants who made it through \Nthe long underground tunnel find themselves in an unexplored land \Nteeming with strange creatures, known as the Numere Wetlands.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: Be sure to stay close behind me.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: We'll take advantage of the fog \Nto get rid of him!

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: We don't want to lose sight \Nof the examiner.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: I'm more concerned with increasing the distance between \Nus and Hisoka.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: Staying too close to him is dangerous.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: I can smell it in the air.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: Killua says that we should move up!

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: Can't you feel the tension \Nsurrounding us?

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: If I had the strength, \NI'd already be there!

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: We can't even tell \Nwhich way we're going.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: As long as we don't lose sight \Nof the guys ahead of us...

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: Which way are we supposed to go?

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: Did we lose sight of him?

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: Be sure to stay close behind me.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: Be sure to stay close behind me.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: That thing can imitate human speech?

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: I hear people screaming all around us.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: I wonder if Leorio and \NKurapika are okay...

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: Guess he didn't like the taste of us.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: I'm still worried about Leorio and Kurapika.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: Forget about them. Let's get a move on.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: We can still catch up to the examiner.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: We've lost sight of the front-runners.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: When I saw you last year,

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: I knew you weren't Hunter material.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: We'll spare you if you swear not to \Ntake the Hunter Exam again.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: I'm passing the exam this year, so I won't need to retake it.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: It's impossible to determine which \Ndirection the main pack went!

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: Meaning we've all failed the exam!

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: Having already failed, you wish \Nto play examiner.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: And judge whether you \Nare Hunter material?

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: Care to participate, in my little game of examiner?

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: We've caught up to the \Nmain group, Gon.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: On my signal, we run in \Nopposite directions.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: He is vastly more experienced \Nin real combat.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: The two of us won't stand a \Nchance against him.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: We cannot afford to squander time \Nin a pointless fight!

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: This may not be my fight, but I won't close my eyes and make a break for it!

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: Mm, I adore that look on your face.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: You came to rescue your friend?

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: I really do love that look.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: I will not kill your friend.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: Grow up and become a fine Hunter.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: Hisoka, you should get back here.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: We're nearly at the Phase Two site.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: It's always good to have friends.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: You can find your own way back, yes?

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: I can smell him from a \Nfew kilometers away.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: What did Hisoka mean when \Nhe said that we passed?

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: Hisoka was acting as a judge.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: He must have his own benchmarks \Nfor evaluating power.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: It's possible that he was ascertaining \Neach applicant's strength.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: Apparently, you and Leorio must \Nhave met his standards.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: But I was powerless to do \Nanything against him.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: Didn't you land your first hit on him?

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: Besides, Leorio passed, \Neven though he lost...

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: Perhaps he sensed that you \Nwere kindred spirits.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: I seriously doubt that Hisoka \Ncould qualify as a Hunter.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: I must admit that he did impress me with his superhuman agility \Nand graceful technique.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: It's quite common that those possessing special talents are drawn \Nto others with unique gifts.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: Most likely, Hisoka's instincts \Nand experience told him that you had the skill and \Npotential to become Hunters.

Title: Hisoka x Is x Sneaky!
Line: Killing you now would have been a waste...

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: The snakes are trained to attack the moment anyone tries to touch \Ntheir master or to leave the cave.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: So you used poison to fight poison.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Judging from his wounds, you must have used Neurotoxic Bees.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: He probably died from anaphylactic shock.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: When a bee stings a human, the human produces antibodies \Nto counter the venom.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: But if that human is stung again \Nby the same kind of bee, they experience an allergic reaction.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: An extreme allergic reaction is known as anaphylactic shock.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Depending on the circumstances, \Nit can be fatal.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: You got me. \NThat's exactly what happened.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: So you used bees to kill him?

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: After confirming that he'd \Nentered the cave,

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: I sprayed sleeping gas into the entrance, and waited until it was safe to enter.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Bourbon was sound asleep, but he'd already set his trap.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: The sleeping gas didn't reach most of the snakes that were hiding in cracks at the back of the cave.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Well, I jumped back in time, so I wasn't bitten by snakes.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: But that triggered my attack switch.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: If I scream or collapse, they'll attack any nearby humans.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: I didn't expect him to die.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: How could I have known that he'd \Nalready been stung once?

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: And I couldn't help him \Nbecause of the snakes.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Well, it was beyond my control anyway.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: The problem is that he's dead, but the viper trap is still active.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: And we can't ask him or \Nlook for a way to disarm it.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: We just have to wait for the \Nexaminers to come and save us.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: You're saying that they'll \Nrescue us from this cave?

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Our ID tags contain a tracking device.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: The examiners can locate each applicant.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: If someone hasn't returned \Nby the deadline, the examiners will look for them.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Though this won't work if \Nyou lose your tag or if someone takes it from you.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Fortunately, there's only one day left.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: The best course would be to give up \Nfor this year and wait for help.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: We must take him to a \Ndoctor immediately.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: The examiners won't move until \Nthe deadline passes.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: If you don't have your tag, \Nyou'll basically be left for dead.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: All you can do is pray that he \Nholds out until help arrives.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: No, there is still a way.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: With a good chance for success.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: But if he isn't carrying any on his person, we'll have another victim.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Didn't you hear what I just said?

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: He jumped into a nest of \Npoisonous snakes to search for an antidote, \Nnot even knowing if he had it?

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: The odds were in his favor.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: If you're going to poison someone, you'd need the antidote at hand, \Nas a bargaining chip.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: That said, it took an incredible amount of courage to do what he just did.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: You must be really good friends.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Hey, do you have any sleeping gas left?

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Would you trade it for this?

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: This gives you six points, right?

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: But what are you going to do \Nwith the sleeping gas?

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Put all the snakes to sleep, \Nso we can escape.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: It'd be more effective than when \NI sprayed the gas from outside.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Within five minutes, the entire \Ncave will fill with gas, and the snakes will be asleep.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: No one can hold their breath that long.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: There's no point if we put \Nourselves to sleep in the process.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: I'll hold my breath and carry \Neveryone out of here.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: You really think he'd do that, \Nafter jumping into a nest of poisonous snakes to save Leorio?

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: I'll get you out of here!

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: On my signal, release the gas.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Well, I'll leave Bourbon's tag with you, so the examiners will find you.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: If I give Leorio your tag, he'll have six points and pass.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Consider it the fee for carrying \Nyou out of there.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: The Fourth Phase of the exam \Nhas just ended.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Will the applicants please return to the starting point at once?

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: You will be given one hour of extra time.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: If you do not return during this time, \Nyou will fail the exam.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Furthermore, you are not allowed \Nto exchange tags after reaching the starting point.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Anyone caught swapping tags \Nwill be disqualified.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Then we will now check the \Ntags of everyone here!

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Ah, three more arrive at the last second.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: And now for the last few members...

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: These nine applicants have passed the Fourth Phase of the exam!

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Six of the nine are rookies?

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Hmm, there's a trend where we'll go many years without \Na single rookie qualifying.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Then suddenly, we'll have a whole bunch \Nof promising newbies.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: This is the fourth time I've seen it happen.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: By the way, what are we doing \Nfor the Final Phase?

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: I intend to have them participate \Nin a rather peculiar fight.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: First, I want to talk to each of the nine remaining applicants.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: I needed the two of you to do everything for me during \Nthe Fourth Phase.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: I promise I'll return the favor.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: I have an announcement for all applicants.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: The chairman wishes to interview \Nthe remaining candidates.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: When your number is called, please come to the first reception room, \Non the second floor.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Then we will start with #44, Hisoka-sama.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Don't tell me that this is \Nthe exam's Final Phase.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: I'll just be asking a few questions \Nto satisfy my curiosity.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: First, why do you want to \Nbecome a Hunter?

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: I'm not particularly interested in \Nbecoming a Hunter, but...

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: A Hunter License can be very useful.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Hunters usually can't be punished \Nwhen they kill someone.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Then I'll move on to the next question.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Which of the other eight applicants are you keeping an eye on?

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: #405 is also on my radar, but it's #99 I'm keeping an eye on.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: I would love to take him on one day.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Which of the other eight applicants \Nwould you least want to fight?

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: If you're asking whom I least \Nwant to fight at this moment, my answer would be #405.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: I should mention that the one I most \Nwant to fight at this moment is you.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: That old man is too crafty...

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: He left himself so undefended, \NI lost my edge.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: He looks to be the most \Nbalanced applicant left.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: I definitely don't want to fight #44.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: To be honest, I doubt I can beat him.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Has to be Gon. \NSince we're the same age.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: I don't think it'd be a \Nvery interesting fight.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: I couldn't bring myself to fight them.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Who am I watching out for?

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: A lot's happened, so I've \Nbeen watching him.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: I can't choose one out of \N#99, #403, and #404.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: He's the most dangerous one here.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: And #44 is the one I least want to fight.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: I'm watching #405 for positive reasons, and #44 for negative reasons.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: If I'm given ample reason, \NI'll fight anyone.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: If not, I would prefer not to fight anyone.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: I owe him, and I hope that \Nhe passes the exam.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: So I'm hoping I don't have to fight #405.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Hmm, the results were more lopsided \Nthan I was expecting.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: We've reached the Final Phase \Nof the exam.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: He certainly has a serious expression.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Did something happen during \Nthe Fourth Phase?

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: When we met up, you were acting a little strange.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: And you've been somewhat subdued since we left Zevil Island.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: I waited for the perfect chance \Nand stole his tag, but someone else was tailing me, and he got me with a poisoned dart.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Soon after, Hisoka took back his tag from the person who got me, \Nand he left it with me.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: He said that I owed him now.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: I told him I didn't need his help, and he sent me flying.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: I'll only take it back when you're able to punch me \Nin the face, just like that.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: I was so mad that I couldn't do anything against him...

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: After that, I was pretty \Nmiserable and lonely.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: That's why I was looking for you two.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Leorio and I have only been able to make it this far because of you.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: I'd also like to thank you.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Gon has deepened his bond \Nwith his friends.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: And the nine remaining \Napplicants are about to begin the exam's Final Phase.

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Next time: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!

Title: Big x Time x Interview!
Line: Then how am I supposed to win?

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: And some incredible people are \Ndrawn to that magic.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Those who win will join \Nthe ranks of the Hunters.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Gittarackur, Hanzo, and Hisoka, head to the Final Phase, having passed \Nthe exam's Fourth Phase.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Did you get plenty of rest?

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: This hotel is owned by the \NHunter Exam Selection Committee.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: The place is all yours until the \Nbattles have concluded.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: For the Final Phase, we will be \Nholding a one-on-one tournament.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: So only the last person standing passes?

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: One win is all you need to pass.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: The winners are removed from competition, while the losers continue up the bracket.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: In other words, the person who \Nfinishes at the top will not pass.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: So you're saying that only \None person will fail.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: After all, everyone has at least \Ntwo chances to win.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: But some people, like #294 and #405, get five chances.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Why didn't you use a balanced bracket?

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: A question that must be on everyone's mind.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: This bracket was assembled \Nbased on your performances throughout the entire exam.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Those who performed better \Nreceived more chances.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Can you explain how you \Nscored our performances?

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: So I can't tell you everything.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: But I can explain our methods.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: First, we consider three major criteria: physical strength, mental strength, and overall impression.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: For physical strength, we use \Nan aggregate of agility, flexibility, endurance, and perception.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: For mental strength, we use \Nan aggregate of resilience, adaptability, judgment, and creativity.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: However, this information is only \Nused as a reference point.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: After all, you were strong enough to advance to the Final Phase.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: However, we are most concerned \Nwith your overall impression.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: This refers to any intangible factors not previously mentioned.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: You could consider this an evaluation of your potential as a Hunter.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: And we also incorporate the \Nopinions of your peers.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Based on performance, \NI should be ranked higher...

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Do I have less potential than Gon?

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: The battle rules are quite simple.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: If your opponent admits defeat, you win.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: If you kill your opponent, you will be immediately disqualified.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: All remaining applicants will pass, \Nand the exam will end.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Then, we shall begin the exam's Final Phase.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: The first match is Hanzo versus Gon.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: I will serve as the referee.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Hey, good to see you again.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: You were tailing me during the Fourth Phase.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: I'm assuming that each applicant was \Nassigned an examiner for the Fourth Phase.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Well, I'm sure everyone else noticed.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: I thought it wasn't worth mentioning.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: How was I supposed to notice that?

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: My rank was higher because your \Nreports on me were accurate.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Though the outcome was never in doubt!

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: I have a question for you.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: We only win if our opponent \Nsurrenders, correct?

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: It doesn't count if we knock them unconscious.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: He looks tough, but we should be even in terms of strength and speed.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: I can use my speed to keep on the \Nmove until I get an opening.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Now then, it's time to begin.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: How well can he do against Hanzo?

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: You must be confident in your legs.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: You did well for a kid.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: I could have easily dodged that attack.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Well, this would already be over \Nif it were a normal fight...

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: I hit you hard enough to make \Nyour brain bounce around.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Do you understand? \NYou have no chance against me.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Might as well give up now...

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: If you surrender now, you'll still be in \Ndecent shape for your next fight.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: There's no reason to be stubborn.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: If you were in Gon's position, \Nwould you surrender?

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: That guy thinks he's hot stuff...

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: But there isn't any other choice!

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: You're contradicting yourself, but I understand how you feel!

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Honestly, the chairman's nasty \Nstreak is in a class all its own.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: The applicants who've made it this far are unlikely to simply surrender.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: This goes beyond a "rather peculiar fight."

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: This system is just plain crazy.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: There's nothing left for him to vomit.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: I'll fight you in his place!

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: If you can't take it, leave.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: It's only going to get worse.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: No one may interfere in a one-on-one match.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: And if you step in, Gon will be \Nthe one disqualified!

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: I'm going to break your arm.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: I'm not joking around, so give up.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: You can't use your left arm anymore.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Kurapika, don't try to stop me.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: If that bastard does anything else to Gon...

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Sorry, Gon, but I can't stop myself.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: There is no chance of that happening.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: I'm sure you're in too much pain to listen, but hear me out.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: I am descended from the shinobi, \Na clan of covert agents.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: From the day I was born, I was forced to endure harsh training in order \Nto master the art of ninpo.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: I have trained my body and \Ntechnique, without rest.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: By the time I was your age, \NI had already killed a man.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Heh, that's nothing to brag about.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: At this point in time, \Nyou cannot defeat me in combat.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: My head's cleared a bit, after all the \Npain and that long explanation.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: If you're eighteen, you're only \Nsix years older than I am.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Besides, this isn't a battle \Nto see who's stronger.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: It's to see who's willing to surrender first.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: I let you kick me on purpose.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Was it too hard for you to understand?

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Then I'll make it easier for you.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: I'll cut off your legs, so that they can't be reattached.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: A permanent injury should \Nhelp to wake you up.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: But first, I'll ask you once more.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: I don't want my legs cut off, but I don't want to surrender.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: So let's find a different way to fight!

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Hey... Do you understand \Nyour own situation?!

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: You don't get to make demands!

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Are you trying to insult me?!

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: I'm seriously gonna cut off your legs!

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: But I still will not surrender.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Besides, if you do that, \NI'll bleed to death.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: He'll be disqualified if that happens, right?

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Neither of us wants that to happen.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: So let's think of a better way.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: But he's succeeded in convincing \NHanzo and the rest of us.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Gon hasn't gotten stronger than his opponent.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: So why is the brutal \Natmosphere from before suddenly so much lighter?

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: If you die, you'll never get another chance.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: I need only try again next year.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: We are not on equal footing!

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: You can try all you want \Nto talk your way out of this, but he's far stronger than you.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: That isn't something you can \Nneutralize on the spot.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: It all comes down to power.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Why won't you concede? \NIt's easy to do.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: You can try again next year.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: You value your pride more \Nthan your own life?!

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: You're really willing to die for your pride?!

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: I'm going to find my dad.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: So I'm going to become a Hunter \Nand find him!

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: I believe that I'll find him one day...

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: But I have a feeling that if I give up now,

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: If you don't yield, you'll die...

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: But I can't think of a way \Nto make you surrender.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: I'll take this loss and take my \Nchances in the next battle!

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: We both have to think of \Na way to settle this fight!

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Heh, I knew you would say that.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: There's no point, because you'll \Nnever surrender!

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: But I don't want to win like this!

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: What am I supposed to do?

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: We can work together to figure it out!

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: In other words, I've already \Ngiven up on this match, but you want me to try to win again, while helping to determine a way to \Nmake you feel good about your victory!

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: I lose. Let's move on to the next match.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: But I want to tell the executive \Ncommittee something first.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: When he wakes up, he'll probably refuse his passing judgment.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Because he's a stubborn boy, as we've seen.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Only one person will fail this round, right?

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: If Gon fails, wouldn't that make the \Nrest of our fights meaningless?

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Gon's victory has been assured, \Nfollowing Hanzo's concession.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: The Final Phase, to determine \Nthe single failing applicant, has only just begun.

Title: Can't Win x And x Can't Lose!
Line: Next time: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
