Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: And some incredible people are \Ndrawn to that magic.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Baffling x Turn Of x Events

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: A waiting room, next to the \Narena for the Final Phase.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Right. I was in the middle \Nof the Hunter Exam.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: In fact, once it heals, the bone \Nwill be stronger than before.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: In any case, congratulations on passing the exam.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Just as someone who has failed \Nthe exam can no longer pass, someone who has passed \Nthe exam can no longer fail.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: The rest is up to you.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: If you feel you are unqualified to be a pro, you are free to destroy or \Nput away your license.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: You can even sell it, since no one else will be able to use it.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: However, a person who has passed the exam will \Nnot be allowed to take it again.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Professional Hunters are treated well, largely due to our predecessors' efforts.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Hence, there are many applicants \Nwho harbor ill intentions.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: If it weren't for them, we would accept every person who applied.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Most professional Hunters consider this card more valuable than their own lives, yet no more than a worthless scrap \Nof paper at the same time.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: The important thing is what you accomplish once \Nyou become a Hunter.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Gon-kun, you can decide for yourself when \Nyou're ready to use this card.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: I have faith in your judgment.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: A lot of people helped me reach this point.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: I'll use this once I've returned the favor.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Then allow me to congratulate you.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: The exam is still going on, right?

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Yes, you slept for nearly an entire day.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: The others who passed are currently \Ncompleting a brief orientation.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: You will undergo the orientation later.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: First, let me fill you in on what transpired after you were knocked out.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: That will help you understand \Nwhat occurred.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: When he wakes up, he'll probably \Nrefuse his license.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: That sounds like something Gon would do.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Only one person will fail this round, right?

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: If Gon fails, wouldn't that make the \Nrest of our fights meaningless?

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Nothing he says can change that.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: If Gon were to throw a fit and kill me, we still wouldn't be able \Nto revoke his license.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Why did you let him win?

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: I'm sure you knew how to make Gon \Nsurrender without killing him.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: I expect that person to hate me \Nfor the rest of their life.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: It's more effective and less stressful.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: When someone is in pain, their eyes show a gleam of hostility toward \Nthe one responsible for that pain.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Even with extensive training, it is difficult to suppress \Nthat gleam of hate and rage.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: But there was no gleam in Gon's eyes.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: I had just broken his arm.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: But his eyes had already \Nforgotten about that.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: I guess you could say that he won me over.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: If you need a reason, there you go.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Gon-kun, you were able to \Nwin over your opponent.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: After that, the second match began.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: The second match is Kurapika versus Hisoka.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: After the two of them fought for a while...

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: I don't know, but Hisoka voluntarily conceded.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: The third match pit Hanzo against Pokkle.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Pokkle found himself in much \Nthe same position as you, but he admitted defeat immediately.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Sorry, but I won't go easy on you.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: The fourth match was between \NHisoka and Bodoro.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: The match was extremely one-sided, but Bodoro refused to give up.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: However, while Bodoro \Nwas lying on the floor,

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Hisoka whispered something in his ear.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: The fifth match featured Killua and Pokkle, but as soon as the fight began, \NKillua walked away.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Sorry, but I'm not interested in fighting you.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: He must have felt that he \Ncould win his next match.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Leorio requested that the sixth match be postponed while Bodoro \Nrecovered from his injuries.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: So Killua and Gittarackur fought first.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: That was when Killua made a fatal mistake.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: He used those needles to change \Nthe shape of his face?!

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: I heard that you cut up Mom and Milluki.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Anyone would cry if their \Nson did that to them.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: She was so happy to see that you'd grown up.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: But she was worried about you leaving home, so she asked me to check up on you.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: I didn't know you wanted to be a Hunter.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: I'm trying to get a license for my next job.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: I don't really want to be a Hunter.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: I just felt like taking the exam.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Then I have some advice for you.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: You're not cut out to be a Hunter.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: You were born to be... a killer.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Is that really what he said?

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Killua mentioned his family before, but they sound crazy...

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: You're a puppet of darkness, without passion.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: You don't want anything or wish for anything.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: As one who lives in the shadows, you can only feel pleasure when people die.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: That's how Dad and I raised you.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: What would you accomplish \Nby becoming a Hunter?

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: I don't desire to become a Hunter.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: I do have something I want...

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Tell me what it is that you want.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: There's nothing you really want, is there?

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: I want to become friends with Gon...

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: I want to become friends with Gon, and to live a normal life...

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: You'll never be able to make friends.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Your only concern when you meet someone \Nis whether you should kill them.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: You just don't know how to classify Gon because he's too dazzling for your eyes.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: You don't actually want to \Nbecome friends with him.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: If you stay with him, you'll end up wanting to kill him one day.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: You'll get the urge to see if \Nyou can kill him or not.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Because you have the soul of a killer.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: I don't give a damn if he's your brother.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: He's a worthless piece of crap!

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Just beat the crap out of \Nhim like usual and win!

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: You want to become friends with Gon?

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: I'm sure that's how Gon feels!

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: A killer doesn't need any friends.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: I need a Hunter license to do my job...

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: But if I kill them, I'll fail, and Kil will pass automatically.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Oh, darn. The same thing \Nwill happen if I kill Gon.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: I'll pass the exam before killing Gon.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: If I wait until after passing the exam,

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: I can kill everyone here and \Nstill keep my license, right?

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: You have to beat me if \Nyou want to save Gon.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Will you fight me for your friend's sake?

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Because you're more worried about whether or not you can defeat me.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: And you already have your answer:

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: "I'm not strong enough to beat my brother."

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: "Never fight an enemy you can't beat."

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: If you move an inch, I'll assume \Nthat the fight has begun.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: And if our bodies make contact, that will also mean the fight has begun.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: There's only one way to stop me.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: If you don't fight me, your dear Gon will die.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: We won't let him kill you or Gon!

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: We'll stop him, whatever it takes!

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: I was lying about killing Gon.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: That was just a little test.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: But now I have my answer.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: You don't have the right to make friends.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: You should just listen to Dad and me, \Nand do your job as you always have.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: I'll tell you to take the Hunter Exam.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: You don't need a license yet.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: After that, he was reduced \Nto a shell of himself.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Leorio and Kurapika tried to help, but he wouldn't respond.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: The sixth match was between \NLeorio and Bodoro.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Bodoro had recovered, \Nbut when the match began...

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: It was over in a second.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Illumi had trampled on his brother's desire to become \Nfriends with Gon, abandoning Killua to despair.

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Next time: Some x Brother x Trouble!

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Line: Do Leorio and I look alike?

Title: Baffling x Turn Of x Events!
Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: And some incredible people are \Ndrawn to that magic.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: After Gon learned why Killua \Nhad been disqualified, he was furious with Gittarackur...

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: You don't know what you did wrong?

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: You don't have the right to be his brother.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Must I earn the right to be his brother?

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: He doesn't need to earn the \Nright to be my friend!

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Just take me to see Killua.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: You make it sound as \Nthough I kidnapped him...

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: He walked away on his own.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: He was being manipulated by you people.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: It's the same thing as kidnapping him!

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: We happened to be discussing \Nthis very subject, Gon.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Kurapika and Leorio have both \Nlodged complaints.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: The committee has been discussing the fairness of Killua's disqualification.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Killua had been behaving in a strange manner during and \Nsince his battle with the man who called himself Gittarackur!

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: I believe that he was hypnotized \Ninto committing murder.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Under normal circumstances, it would be impossible to use \Nhypnosis to induce a person to kill.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: However, as Killua was raised \Nin a family of assassins, murder was a part of his daily life, so it's natural that he would lack \Nthe ethical restraint of most!

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: I want to mention that the attack happened during the \Nmatch between Bodoro and me.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: It's possible that he was trying to help me.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Given that, the one who should be disqualified is me.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Killua was not in control of his own actions.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Thus, he should not have been disqualified!

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: There were no clear signs of manipulation.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: In fact, I would question the claim that he was hypnotized.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: I agree that the incident occurred after the battle between Leorio \Nand Bodoro had begun.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: At that point, both fighters \Nwere evenly matched.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: But in terms of raw combat ability, \NLeorio was the stronger.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: There was no need for Killua to interfere.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: There was some other funny \Nbusiness happening.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Back then, what did he say to you?

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Neither of you seemed particularly tired.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: But Hisoka whispered something in your ear, right before conceding.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: I'd understand surrendering after your \Nopponent whispers something to you, as happened with Hanzo and me, \Nor Bodoro and Hisoka.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: But in your case, the exact opposite happened.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: I have to wonder if you struck \Nsome sort of bargain.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: If you're going to question \Nanything that seems odd, your own victory was quite odd, indeed.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: If you have nothing to hide, \Nyou should tell us what he said.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: I have no obligation to tell you.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Maybe not, but I believe you owe it to us.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: If you consider my victory to be odd, a victory by default would be equally odd.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: I want to get this lecture \Nover with so I can leave.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: It's pointless to argue over whether \Nsomeone should have passed.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: If you aren't happy about passing, keep working until you're satisfied.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: If Killua retakes the Hunter Exam, \Nhe'll definitely pass!

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: It's unfortunate that he failed this time, \Nbut it is what it is.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: If you've been forcing Killua to kill, \Nagainst his will, all this time,

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Only, once I rescue Killua, \NI'll never let you see him again!

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: You must decide for yourselves \Nif you were worthy of passing.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: You may complain about \Nthe results all you like, but we will not be changing our minds.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: And the rest of you have passed the exam.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Okay, then I shall continue the orientation.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: The cards I've passed out \Nare your Hunter Licenses.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: This card allows you to enter 90% of the countries \Nthat limit immigration, as well as 75% of the restricted \Nareas in the world.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: This card also provides free access \Nto 95% of public facilities, and a line of credit that rivals \Nlarge corporations.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: If you sell the card, you'll have enough \Nmoney to last seven lifetimes.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: And if you keep it, you'll still \Nbe living in comfort.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: So take extra care that your \Nlicense isn't lost or stolen.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: According to our estimates, \None in five Hunters lose their card within a year of receiving it.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: As a Hunter, your first challenge \Nis to protect your card.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: The rest is up to you.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Rise above challenges, \Nbelieve in your own strength, and fulfill your dreams.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Then, we now declare the seven members \Nhere to be new Hunters!

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Are you really going to take him away?

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: I think that's a bad idea.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: I don't care what you think!

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Do they feel the same way?

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: I doubt you'll be able to \Nmake it there anyway.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Our family lives at the very top.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Is it really okay for an assassin to give away \Nhis base of operations?

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Sure, it isn't a secret or anything.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: The locals all know where we live.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Well, I'm sure they'll see the \Nlight once they arrive.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: We live in completely different worlds...

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: I can understand why you want \Nto see him grow up.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: But that makes him all the more dangerous.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: This would be the best chance to...

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Touch him, and you'll suffer \Nthe consequences.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: I've only known you for a short while, \Nbut I know your tastes.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: What are you going to do now?

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Kurapika, do you know where it is?

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: He said something about Kukuroo Mountain.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Do you know where it might be?

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: We can look it up online.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: I'm going back to my country.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: It was a short, yet seemingly long \Nacquaintance, but I had fun.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: If you ever visit my country, let me know.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: I can show you the best tourist spots!

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: A shinobi who tries to leave an impression...

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Sorry about getting so excited back there.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: No, I only got mad because you were right.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: I was using you to take out my \Nfrustration for winning by default.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Since I passed, I'm going to make the best of it!

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: The question is what to do next.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: I'm going to travel the world, \Ngathering information and discovering new species, \Nas an Exotic Game Hunter.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: You can use this to obtain \Nall kinds of information.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Is there anything you'd like to know?

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: I can look it up on the spot.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Can you look up a Hunter named Ging?

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Hey, who is this Ging guy?

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: All information related to him is behind a tight security system that requires a bunch of different accesses.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: He has some serious influence, \Neven at the national level.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Looks like your dad is someone really special.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Okay, let me know if anything comes up.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: We should have asked him to \Nlook up Kukuroo Mountain.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: As Chairman Netero was saying, \Nwe are all Hunters now.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: It's a bad idea to let other Hunters \Nknow what you're doing.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: We can look it up ourselves.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: And do you have a moment?

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: We'll be waiting in the lobby.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Forgive me, but I couldn't help but \Noverhear your conversation.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: I happen to specialize in the \Ndiscovery, restoration, and preservation of ancient ruins.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: I was only focused on the glory \Nderived from new discoveries.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: But after watching a certain Hunter at work,

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: That Hunter would discover ruins, spend his own money to \Ncompletely restore them, and take steps to preserve the \Nruins for future generations, thus ensuring that ordinary people \Nwould have a chance to see them.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: I was more impressed by \Nhis dedication to his job than by the beauty of the ruins.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: The work he did to preserve those ruins has been documented in manuals \Nused around the world.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: And this Hunter, Gon-kun, was Ging Freecss, the man \Nyou were asking about.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: I wished to meet him, so I did some investigating.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: However, quite frankly, he is an enigma.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: I wasn't able to learn anything about him...

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: My goal is to become a Hunter like him.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: My dream is to thank him in person one day.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: That's all I had to say.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: It's okay. Thanks for everything, Satotz-san.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: First, let's look up Kukuroo Mountain.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: A 3,722 meter-high mountain, in the Dentora region of \Nthe Republic of Padokea."

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: This is the Republic of Padokea.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: It should be fine. \NIt appears to be a stable country.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: By airship, it will take three days to reach...

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: We've been stuck in one place forever.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: We'll be late for our flight.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: I'm afraid I can't help this traffic.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: And this is the only road.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Do you realize how far away the airport is?

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: I want to rescue Killua as soon \Nas humanly possible!

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: This reminds me of the Hunter Exam.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: This is nothing compared \Nto the Hunter Exam.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Gon and his friends set off for \Nthe Republic of Padokea.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Their destination is Kukuroo Mountain, \Nwhere Killua's home is located.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: I find myself wanting to help him.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: I almost let the cat out of the bag.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: About how the real Hunter Exam hasn't ended yet.

Title: Some x Brother x Trouble!
Line: Next time: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: By airship, it will take three days to reach...

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: I'm from a family of assassins.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: And the family has really high hopes for me...

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Who wants to have their life \Nplanned out for them?

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: What's with the long face, Gon?

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: We'll be in the Republic of \NPadokea by morning.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: We'll definitely take Killua back with us!

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Gon, Leorio, and Kurapika have arrived in the Dentora region of the Republic of Padokea, where Killua lives.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: The base for this family of \Nassassins is on that mountain?

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Once we reach our destination, we should start gathering information.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: In that case, you should take the \Nscenic mountain bus tour over there.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: The tour only runs once a day, \Nbut you'll have a guide to show you around.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Thank you for taking the \NLamentation Tour today.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: We will be visiting Kukuroo Mountain, home to the famous Zoldyck \Nfamily of assassins.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: That is Kukuroo Mountain, \Nwhere the Zoldyck family lives.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: A forest surrounds the 3,722-meter mountain, and the Zoldyck estate is \Nsomewhere on that mountain.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: But no one has ever actually seen it.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: The Zoldyck family includes ten members: a great-grandfather, grandfather, \Ngrandmother, father, mother, and then, there are five children.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Then, let us approach the mountain.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: This is the front gate of the Zoldyck estate.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Also known as the Door to Hades because no one who's entered \Nhas ever returned alive.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: To enter, you must pass through the door beside the security checkpoint.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: But the area beyond the gate \Nis private property, so we can't proceed.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: The mountain's all the way over there!

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: The Zoldycks own Kukuroo Mountain, as well as the surrounding land.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: This whole area is their backyard?

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: What do we have to do to get inside?

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Little boy, were you listening \Nto my explanation?

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: If you go inside, you'll never get out alive!

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: A family of assassins that no one's ever seen.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Just a photo of their faces is \Nworth a hundred million.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: I should have taken a picture of Killua!

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: It's just another case of rampant rumors masking a mundane truth.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: The master would not be pleased.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: We're going to kill your master.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Man... Now Mike's going to end up \Neating between meals again.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: He's only supposed to eat at assigned times.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Don't blame me if you get fat!

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: I've worked here for twenty years, but this is the first time any friends have come to visit.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Since I work here, I shouldn't say this, but the place is rather lonely.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Though we do see a lot of those...

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Well, a family of assassins is pretty unusual.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: So I suppose it's the price they have to pay.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Didn't you see the large arm of the creature?

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: It serves as the Zoldyck family watchdog.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: It only obeys family, \Nand will attack anyone else.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: The beast still follows the order its master gave it ten years ago...

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: But technically, he isn't following the order.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Anyway, I can't let you inside.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: I wouldn't want to reduce young \NKillua's friends to skeletons.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Sir, how is it that you're safe?

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: If you never needed to enter, \Nyou wouldn't have a key.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: I require no key to get inside.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: For some reason, eighty to ninety percent of intruders \Nattempt to use the front gate.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: If I don't open the gate for them, they'll try to break it down.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: So we added a locked door to one side.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: The intruders take the key \Nfrom the helpless guard, and then Mike eats them.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: As you just realized, I'm not a guard.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: I merely clean up after Mike.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: And the actual gate isn't locked!

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: I've tried pushing and pulling, \Nbut it won't budge!

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Are you sure it isn't locked?

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: I've been using all of my strength!

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: This gate's official name is the Testing Gate.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Anyone who cannot open this gate is unqualified to enter the Zoldyck estate.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: As you just saw, the door closes automatically, so you'll want to run in, the second it opens.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: You don't need to worry about Mike.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: He has orders not to attack any who \Nenter through the Testing Gate.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Still, this is getting tougher as I age...

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: But they'll fire me if I can't open the gate, so I need to keep in shape.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: I should mention that each of gate \None's doors weighs two tons.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: You're not supposed to be able to open that!

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: When you go up a gate, the weight doubles.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: The number of gates that open depends on the amount of strength you use.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Incidentally, when young Killua returned, he opened gates one through three.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: This is what's required just \Nto get in the door.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: They live in a completely different world.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: I came here to see my friend, \Nnot to be tested.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: You can consider me an intruder.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: So let me borrow the key.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: It doesn't matter if you \Nwon't loan me the key.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: I'll just climb the wall, if that's what it takes.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Its arm was bigger than your entire body!

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Why would you test your friends?

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: I'll never enter through that door.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: However, forcing your way \Nthrough is impossible.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Let's figure out a way to \Nenter through gate one.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: He's not gonna change his mind.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Unfortunately, I cannot lend you this key.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: I will not feed young Killua's friends to Mike.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Well, please wait here for a minute.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Three of young Killua's friends are here to see him.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: I'm very sorry. I apologize for disturbing you.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: No, I was speaking with the \NZoldyck family butler.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: All communication with the mansion \Nmust go through the butler.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: It's very difficult to reach any \Nof the family members.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: I'll talk to him this time.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: But you won't enjoy the experience.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Yes, this is the butler's office.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: I'm Gon, one of Killua-kun's friends.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Yes, this is the butler's office.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: How could you possibly know that?!

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: I believe you said that you were Gon-kun?

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Let us pretend that Killua-sama happens \Nto have a friend named Gon.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: There is no proof that you are Gon.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: If you put Killua on the phone, \Nhe'll recognize me!

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: If you put Killua on the phone, \Nhe'll recognize me!

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: And there are many other ways \Nto mimic a person's voice.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Next, you'll claim that he'd \Nrecognize you by sight.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: There are only a few methods by which you could perfectly mimic \Nsomeone's appearance.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Additionally, it's possible that someone \Nforced you to approach Killua-sama for sinister purposes.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: As long as the threat exists,

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: I cannot let you meet with Killua-sama.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: The Zoldyck family practices the \Ntrade of assassination.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: As butlers, our duty is to guard our masters from their enemies.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: He's going to climb over the wall...

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: It's okay. You two can wait here.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: I can't let you do that!

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Both of you should calm down!

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Gon-kun, I'll give you the key.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: You can go through the door.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: We can convince Gon to stop!

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: But he appears to be a stubborn boy.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: I'll accompany you through the door.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: It's possible that Mike may recognize me and decide not to attack.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Though I'm almost a hundred percent \Ncertain that he'll kill us all.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: I don't want to cause you any trouble.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: The result will be the same if I stay behind.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: If I send young Killua's friends to their deaths,

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: I'd never be able to face him again.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: I didn't stop to consider your situation.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: He's willing to quell his own anger \Nfor another person's sake.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: He believes in his own strength, as well as in his friends.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: It's likely that Mike \Nwon't frighten him at all.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Did you grow up playing in the countryside?

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Gon-kun, I'm going to open \Nthe Testing Gate again.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: I want you to see Mike for yourself.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Is it really okay for us to come in?

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Yes, you'll be safe because you \Nentered through the Testing Gate.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: This is a trained hunting dog.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: It's nothing like the wild animals \Nyou're accustomed to.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: You must have expected to be able \Nto communicate with him.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Mike is currently memorizing the appearances and \Nscents of humans he's never seen.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: There's nothing else on his mind.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: I don't want to fight him!

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Well, how long will you be here?

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Gon has seen that the Zoldyck family lives in a completely different world.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: No matter what difficulties awaited him, he would find Killua in the end.

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: Next time: The x Guard's x Duty!

Title: A x Dangerous x Watchdog!
Line: So you know how to do math.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: In the Dentora region of the Republic of Padokea, is a 3,722 meter-high dormant volcano \Nsurrounded by forest,

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: The home of the famous Zoldyck \Nfamily of assassins is here.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Visitors come, every day, \Nhoping for a glimpse of the mansion that no one has ever seen before.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: It is a very popular tourist spot \Nin this nation.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Well, how long will you be here?

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Gon and his friends have confronted the obstacles that they must overcome in order to meet with Killua.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: What awaits them at their destination?

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: So you can stay here tonight.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: If you managed to win over Zebro, \Nyou must be special.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Though it won't be easy here.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: You want to see young Killua?

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Then let me give you a warning:

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Zebro told you about the \NTesting Gate, right?

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: That should give you an idea of \Nwhat this place is like.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: We understand that it won't be easy.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: When Killua was in trouble, \NI wasn't there for him.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Then why not do some training here?

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: You three are allowed to work together to open the door.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: With a little training, it should be possible.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: I don't like the idea of being tested...

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: But if there is no other way...

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: We'll just have to do it!

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Then I'll need you to put these on.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Please wear it at all times, \Nexcept while you sleep.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: I'll make it heavier as you get used to it.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: All furniture and utensils in this house weigh over twenty kilograms apiece.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: I see... So this will serve as training.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: They'll give up in two or three days.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Seaquant, I believe that \Nyour shift has already started.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: By the way, where's the bathroom?

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: I'm guessing that the door is also...

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Yes, it weighs five hundred kilograms.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Kil, have you learned your lesson yet?

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: He isn't even the least bit sorry.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: We need to make him suffer more.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Kil, stop being so stubborn \Nand say that you're sorry.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Oh, right. That friend of yours...

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: He'd be better off just leaving, but it sounds like he wants \Nto try the Testing Gate.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: I told you to shut your mouth!

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: I didn't think I needed to tell you, Kil...

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Since it's impossible for him \Nto open the front gate.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: But he'll still never make it here...

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: He will definitely make it here.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: You need to let your arm heal first.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: As long as Kurapika and I can open it, \Nit doesn't matter.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: No use... It won't budge an inch.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: But we just started our training.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: If we work hard enough, we can do it!

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: I wish I could share your optimism.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: You kids need to wake up.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: In that case, you should quit watching us \Nand do your job!

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: And he wishes to see his friend.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: It's only right that we should help him.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Okay, let's give it another shot!

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Man, you can't just mindlessly push.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: You have to push both doors, \Nwith all your strength, simultaneously.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Or the gate won't ever open.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: And push both doors with all our \Nstrength simultaneously...

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: I just wanted to let you know.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Hey, why don't you try removing \Nthose vests today?

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Without them, we can \Ndefinitely open the gate now.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Why are you using your left arm?

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Anyway, we have to push together, right?

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Follow the path, and head for the mountain.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: The mansion should be somewhere up there.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: I'm ashamed to admit that even though I've worked \Nhere for twenty years,

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: I've never been up the mountain.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Sorry that I couldn't be any help.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: You've both been a huge help.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: They might be able to \Nmake it to the mansion.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Won't happen. They'll just \Nget themselves killed.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Speaking from your experience \Nthree years ago?

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: We were wiped out by an apprentice butler.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: That made it painfully clear that I wasn't on their level.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: So you decided to work here.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: But the masters and servants \Nare all monsters.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Once you step into their territory...

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: This is a critical time for Killua.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: We cannot allow anyone near him!

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: I cannot allow you to pass \Nwithout permission.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: And we came through the Testing Gate.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: The butlers did not give you \Npermission to enter.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: What do we need to do to get permission?

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: I said I was Killua's friend, \Nbut they wouldn't put him on.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Because no one has ever \Nreceived permission.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: In any case, this is where I draw the line.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: If you take one step beyond this line,

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: We don't intend to fight you.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: We just want to see Killua.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: It doesn't matter what your motives are.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: You can try all you want.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Don't you realize how futile this is?!

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: I'm just here to see my friend.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: I'm just here to see Killua!

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Why do I have to do this?!

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Aren't you supposed to hit me?

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: You may try to hide your feelings, but you have a heart.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: When I mentioned Killua, \Nyour eyes softened for a moment.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: What was that servant babbling about?

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: She made it sound like we're \Nbeing mean to Killua.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: A worthless apprentice had \Nthe nerve to insult us!

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: I heard about you from Illumi.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: I have a message for you from Kil...

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: But I can't see you right now.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Gon and his friends have finally made it \Ninside the Zoldyck estate.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: But now, they face their \Ngreatest obstacle yet.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: A sad message from Killua, saying that he can't see them.

Title: The x Guard's x Duty!
Line: Next time: The x Zoldyck x Family!

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: In the Dentora region of the Republic of Padokea, is a 3,722 meter-high dormant volcano \Nsurrounded by forest,

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: The home of the famous Zoldyck \Nfamily of assassins is here.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Visitors come, every day, \Nhoping for a glimpse of the mansion that no one has ever seen before.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: It is a very popular tourist spot \Nin this nation.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: I have a message for you from Kil...

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: But I can't see you right now.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Gon, Kurapika, and Leorio have advanced a little closer to the mansion.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Does that mean you dispatched your target?

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: I'm sure you were watching me \Nfrom a distance.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: I don't want to see her.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: While you were away, \NI was hired as an apprentice butler.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: But I appreciate the thought, Killua-sama.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Don't be so formal. Just call me Killua.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: You were using the Shadow Step, right?

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: The technique where you move silently,\Nso you won't be noticed.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: It's one of the first assassination \Ntechniques we learn in the Zoldyck family.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: I must have learned it while \Ngrowing up in Meteor City.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: It's a city that has been erased from this world.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: You're allowed to dump anything in Meteor City.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: That's why many members of the mafia and the Phantom \NTroupe come from there.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: I'd like to visit some time.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: When you visit, I can serve as your guide.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: I'll teach you the Rhythm Echo.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: It's a technique that utilizes the Shadow Step.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: You move at a certain rhythm, \Ncreating afterimages.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: The master has ordered that \NMike be restrained today.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: They wish to test my abilities.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: We'll split up and look for their mansion.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: There is no need for me to answer that question.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: You are trespassing on private property.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: I cannot allow you to pass without permission.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: It's obvious that you stand no chance.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Well, if you don't resist, we'll spare your life.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: If you take one step past this line,

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: I shall use force to remove you.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: You can stand back and watch, boss...

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: After all that, she hasn't \Neven broken a sweat...

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Are you a member of the Zoldyck family?

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: I am but an apprentice butler.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: With your abilities, you're not even a match for the butlers, let alone the Zoldyck family.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: I'm telling you that it's useless!

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: I cannot allow a little girl \Nlike you to defeat me.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: You already knew the Rhythm Echo.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: You think you're stronger than I am.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: So, I don't have anyone to play with.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Will you be my friend, Canary?

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: I feel really bad about stabbing you, Bro.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Sorry. It was the wrong thing to do, Bro.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Kil, your friends are near the butler's office.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: If I ask Mama, those three can become...

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: If you so much as touch them, I'll kill you.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Forgive me for not introducing myself.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Why can't Killua come see us?

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Kil stabbed me and his brother \Nbefore he ran away from home.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: That is the story he told us.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Kil returned because he regretted his actions.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: So we do not know when he will leave...

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: What? Father! What are you doing?!

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: So I let you slap me around.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Kil, Silva wants to see you.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: That's why he's such an uppity brat...

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Mil, what do you think of Kil's potential?

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: He's probably the most talented \NZoldyck in history?

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: But he fails as an assassin because he's so moody.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: A kid who wants to make friends \Ncan't lead the Zoldyck family.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: In the end, he's just a crybaby.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: I'll kill anyone I'm asked to.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: The bomb I'll use next time \Nis awesome, Grandpa!

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: I attached it to a female mosquito, and it's triggered to explode when the \Nmosquito sucks the target's blood.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: But the problem is getting the mosquito \Nto recognize the target...

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: You're a bright boy, but that foolish nature of yours doesn't help.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Oh, why must Father be this way?

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: We'll be staying in town for a while.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Very well. I shall tell him.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: I probably shouldn't say it, \Nbut these people creep me out...

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: And I bet they were lying about Killua's \Nsaying that he can't see us.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Gon, we can't go back yet.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Sure, but if we do that, she'll take the blame.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: I will take you to the butler's office.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: There is a phone that connects to the mansion.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: If Zeno-sama is the one who answers...

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: I heard that you've made some friends?

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: What sort of people are they?

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: They're people I enjoy being with.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: I want you to tell me more.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: What did you do during the Exam?

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Who did you meet? How did you feel?

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Father didn't even ask me first.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Oh, Kil seems to be having fun with Papa...

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: And guess what Gon said next...

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: He didn't want his legs cut off, but he didn't want to surrender, either!

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: And then his opponent pointed a blade at Gon's forehead, \Nbut Gon still...

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Do you want to see your friends?

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: You don't need to hold back.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Thinking back, we've never had a father-son chat before.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: I was raised by my parents to be an assassin.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: And I raised you the same way.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: I didn't realize that until you left home.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: But you are your own person.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: If you get tired, you can come home.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: I'll ask you one more time.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Do you want to see your friends?

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: It's too late. Those three left.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Your eyes are so cold now...

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: For now, we'll let him do what he wants.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: This is a critical juncture in the process of determining if he's qualified \Nto lead the family!

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: So you understand what's at stake.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Then stop griping, and keep your mouth shut!

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: But Silva declares that Killua \Nwill return as an assassin.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Meanwhile, Gon and his friends \Nhead to the butler's office.

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Will they be able to see Killua?

Title: The x Zoldyck x Family!
Line: Next time: Can't See x If x You're Blind!

Line: Th-This is a most critical time for Kil...

Line: He's the one child I shall not give up!

Title: Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Line: But it's still pretty far away.

Title: Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Line: Won't you get in trouble \Nfor bringing us here?

Title: Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Line: They already know what I'm doing.

Title: Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Line: So I am prepared to take the consequences.

Title: Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Line: If there's any trouble, I'll take responsibility.

Title: Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Line: I'm merely serving as a guide \Nfor Killua-sama's friends.

Title: Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Line: Killua-sama, we've been waiting for you.

Title: Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Line: Canary is bringing Gon-sama here, along with his two friends.

Title: Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Line: They should arrive shortly, \Nso please wait inside.

Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Line: Let me know the second Gon gets here.

Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Line: Then this is not the primary residence?

Title: Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Line: No, this place is for the butlers.

Title: Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Line: Well, please make yourselves at home.

Title: Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Line: I appreciate the hospitality, but we've come to see Killua.

Title: Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Line: Can you take us to him at once?

Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Line: Killua-sama is on his way here.

Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Line: To simply sit and wait would be dull.

Line: Then I shall try harder this time.

Title: Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Line: I'm not positive, but I'd guess the right.

Title: Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Line: I have known Killua-sama his entire life.

Line: I dare say that I care for him \Nas though he were my own.

Line: I must despise you for trying \Nto take him away.

Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Line: His lady mother could barely speak...

Title: Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Line: She must be heartbroken, \Nhaving to watch him leave.

Title: Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Line: By the time Killua-sama arrives, \Na decision will be reached.

Title: Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Line: I shall test you in my own way.

Title: Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Line: This is her punishment for having \Nbrought you here, against her orders.

Title: Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Can't See x If x You're Blind!

Title: Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Can't See x If x You're Blind!

Title: Can't See x If x You're Blind!

Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Can't See x If x You're Blind!

Can't See x If x You're Blind!

Title: Can't See x If x You're Blind!

Title: Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Line: I shall await you in Yorknew City, \Non September 1st.

Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Line: Then you've still got over half a year.

Title: Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Can't See x If x You're Blind!
Line: From September 1st through September 10th, there will be an auction for unusual items, rare goods, and national treasures from around the world.

Line: "Dear Mito-san and Grandma, \Nhow are you doing?

Line: We are not on equal footing!

Line: You value your pride more \Nthan your own life?!

Title: Then x And x After!

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: I'm going to find my dad.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: So I'm going to become a Hunter \Nand find him!

Title: Then x And x After!

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: But I have a feeling that if I give up now,

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: If you don't yield, you'll die...

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: We both have to think of \Na way to settle this fight!

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: So Satotz-san had to tell me what had happened next."

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: You're not cut out to be a Hunter.

Line: You were born to be... a killer.

Line: What would you accomplish \Nby becoming a Hunter?

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: Tell me what it is that you want.

Line: I want to become friends with Gon...

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: You'll never be able to make friends.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: Because you have the soul of a killer.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: If you move an inch, I'll assume \Nthat the fight has begun.

Title: Then x And x After!

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: If you don't fight me, your dear Gon will die.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: "Killua gave in to his despair after that."

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: You don't know what you did wrong?

Title: Then x And x After!

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: "After that, Kurapika, Leorio, and I went to Kukuroo Mountain, \Nwhere Killua lives."

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: This gate's official name is the Testing Gate.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: Anyone who cannot open this gate is unqualified to enter the Zoldyck estate.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: You three are allowed to work together to open the door.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: With a little training, it should be possible.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: I cannot allow you to pass \Nwithout permission.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: If you take one step beyond this line,

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: I'm just here to see my friend.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: I'm just here to see Killua!

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: Why do I have to do this?!

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: You may try to hide your feelings, but you have a heart.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: When I mentioned Killua, \Nyour eyes softened for a moment.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: I heard about you from Illumi.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: Why can't Killua come see us?

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: Kil returned because he regretted his actions.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: I will take you to the butler's office.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: There is a phone that connects to the mansion.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: If Zeno-sama is the one who answers...

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: I have known Killua-sama his entire life.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: I dare say that I care for him \Nas though he were my own.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: I must despise you for trying \Nto take him away.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: If one of you answers incorrectly, \Nthat person is out of the games.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: I shall tell Killua-sama that you left.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: And that he will never see you again.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: If you're trying to buy time, \NI'll kill one of your friends.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: He's bleeding himself, to reduce the swelling.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: I can't believe you came. \NWhat happened?

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: "And just like that, we managed to rescue Killua.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: However, there is one more piece of business I must take care of, Mito-san."

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: "The business I still need to take care of is left over from the exam's Fourth Phase."

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: I will need you to draw lots.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: To determine who will hunt \Nand who will be hunted.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: Your target's ID tag is worth three points.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: Your own ID is also worth three points.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: All other ID tags are worth one point.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: You need six points to advance \Nto the Final Phase.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: So while on Zevil Island, you must gather enough ID tags \Nto total six points.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: That is the condition for clearing \Nthe Hunter Exam's Fourth Phase.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: Show each other our numbers \Nat the same time?

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: But if I only need to steal his ID tag, then I have a real shot.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: I might actually have a chance.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: But I think it's worth it.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: At this rate, Hisoka will spot him \Nin the next minute.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: I have to figure out where \Ntheir paths will cross...

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: Hisoka will attack, as soon as he notices that guy.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: This is my chance to steal his tag...

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: I have to conceal my presence, too.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: Do you know what that \Nnumber represents?

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: The number of chances \NI had to kill you.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: It's also the number of times you swung your fishing rod when you were training.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: Next time, remember to \Nwatch your own back.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: You hid your presence, \Nwhile waiting for your chance?

Title: Then x And x After!

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: Did you teach yourself how \Nto conceal your presence?

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: You concealed all traces of your attack by timing it with my own attack.

Title: Then x And x After!

Title: Then x And x After!

Title: Then x And x After!

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: You can have it back now.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: Right now, I'm letting you live.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: And I'll continue to keep you alive, until you've grown enough \Nto be worth killing...

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: I'll only take it back when you're able to punch me \Nin the face, just like that.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: Until then, I shall leave the tag with you.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: "It's the first time I've ever \Nfelt that frustrated.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: So I need to find a way to return the favor.

Title: Then x And x After!
Line: I can't return to Whale Island \Nuntil that's done.

Title: Then x And x After!

Title: Then x And x After!

Nen x And x Nen!
Line: The 251-story, 991-meter \Nbuilding is a mecca for fighters.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: When combatants win a fight, they may advance by one class, and receive a corresponding reward.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: After reaching the 100th floor, you are assigned a private room.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: After reaching the 200th floor, you receive the right to challenge \Nthe strongest fighters, the Floor Masters, in an intense \Nbattle of survival.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: This is the best stage a warrior could ask for.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: Then, your brother is able to use Nen?

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: I need to know what Nen \Nand Ren even mean!

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: I'll agree to the full learning process rather than a quick explanation!

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: After Killua fought Zushi, the young Shingen-ryu practitioner,

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: Zushi mentioned the four major principles.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: Gon and Killua are about to learn the secret of those principles from Zushi's master, Wing.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: Nen means to burn your own soul.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: In other words, it tests your strength of will.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: And the four major principles are part of a training curriculum for \Nstrengthening your will.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: Ten means to focus your soul to a single point, to increase awareness of your ego and goals.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: Zetsu means to express yourself in words.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: Ren means to temper that will.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: And Hatsu means to act upon that will.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: Those are the four major principles.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: Killua-kun, Zushi tempered his "refusal \Nto lose," during his fight with you.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: I think I'm going to kill you now.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: I focus my soul into a single point.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: You can express yourself mentally or verbally.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: If I temper my will enough, then I can act. Hatsu.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: If your will is strong enough, you can make your opponent back down, \Nwithout moving a muscle.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: The concept of bluffing derives from this.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: Ren hardens that which is soft, and you lose the ability to \Ncorrect an incorrect idea.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: Therefore, you should avoid using Ren until your soul has fully matured.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: Right now, you boys and Zushi \Nshould be training your souls.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: If you wish to learn about Nen, you should focus on mastering Ten.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: If you master Ten, you will no longer feel the pressure \Nof an opponent's will.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: Yeah. The explanation made perfect sense, and Wing is clearly very strong.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: He kept getting up after \NI knocked him down.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: I was getting irritated, so I used all of my strength \Nduring my last attack.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: He flew out of the ring!

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: Even an amateur can see that \Nhe's headed for the hospital!

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: However, the referee has awarded \Na critical hit and knockdown.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: Killua wins by TKO, with eleven total points.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: Why did you lie to them?

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: The four major principles are \NTen, Zetsu, Ren, and Hatsu.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: But they don't mean what you said.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: Did you lie because they aren't your students?

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: Nen{\i0 to someone who is not a student.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: So I used the other Nen as a hint, \Nto help them along.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: Nen{\i0 it can become a terrible weapon.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: You could turn a piece of paper \Ninto a blade to harm others, while hardening your body, \Nas a defensive measure.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: That is why you must be careful when \Ndeciding to teach it.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: I didn't have a chance to read that book yet...

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: And that can of juice was mine...

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: It's time for the day's biggest match!

Line: The rookies Killua and Gon have advanced to the 190th floor without dropping a fight.

Line: Will they be able to keep moving on?

Line: Get ready to press your gamble switches!

Line: I am as slippery as a snake, with sharp fangs,\Nto bite at your vital points.

Line: Once again, Gon and Killua have knocked \Nout their opponents with one attack.

Line: And both of them have \Nsuccessfully cleared the 190s!

Line: Killua-kun and Gon-kun have \Nalready reached the 200s?

Line: I've never been up here before.

Line: All of a sudden, it feels like \Nwe're in a monster-filled jungle.

Line: The receptionist's desk is over here, so please register for a 200s match today.

Line: You won't be able to register after midnight, so please be careful.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: Was she the source of all that?

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: By the way, there are currently one hundred, seventy-three \Ncontestants in the 200s class.

Line: You will fight only for glory, so please understand that\N if you're going to participate.

Line: I love to fight, and this is a temple to fighting.

Line: Remember how you ordered airship \Ntickets over the cybernet?

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: With a little effort, it's possible to determine where \Nand when someone will arrive.

Line: I knew you would come here eventually.

Line: And so, as a veteran, I have a warning for you.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: Right now, you are like someone standing naked in a blizzard, wondering why it is cold.

Line: If you continue to strain \Nyour body, you may die.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: He can stop us from moving \Nforward through willpower?

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
Line: Though technically, I wasn't lying completely.

Title: Nen x And x Nen!
