Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: Nen{\i0 and there are six distinct categories.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: Enhancers are able to strengthen objects.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: Transmuters can alter their aura's qualities.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: Conjurers are able to manifest their aura.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: Manipulators can use their aura \Nto control objects and creatures.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: Specialists are those with a \Nspecial aura that doesn't fall within the other five classes.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: The key is to find the power that suits you.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: Nen{\i0 with two areas of particular prominence.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: The first would be your natural potential.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: The second would be potential \Nrefined later in life.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: Gon-kun, for example, was born with a flexible, springy body.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: His acute senses were the product \Nof a childhood spent in nature.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: Nen{\i0 falls within one of the six categories.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: If you attempt to learn an ability that does not fit your inclination, you will find it very difficult.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: This hexagon depicts the relationship among the six categories.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: The closer a class is to your own, the higher your compatibility to learn it.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: If you are born with an aura of the Enhancer category, you will find Enhancer abilities easiest to learn and master.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: And the adjacent Transmuter and Emitter classes will also be easy to learn.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: On the other hand, the Specialist class, which is furthest away, would be difficult.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: To illustrate, I'll use skills \Nthat you've seen for yourselves.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: Hisoka was able to change his aura into a rubbery substance.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: This would be a Transmuter ability.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: Gido used his tops and body as \Nweapons by making them spin faster, which would be an Enhancer power.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: However, since using so many tops as weapons also requires Manipulator skill, \Nhe wasn't as successful.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: As for Kastro, his Tiger Bite was incredibly strong.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: I believe that his aura fell \Ninto the Enhancer class.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: However, he focused his energy on \Nthe power to create a double, which is a Conjurer skill.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: And he also required a Manipulator \Nability to control the double.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: Both of those are relatively far from the Enhancer category.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: So neither was compatible \Nwith an Enhancer type?

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: Indeed, it requires a great deal of work and natural talent to learn an incompatible ability.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: So he made the wrong choice.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: Do you see the importance of understanding your own \Nauras and inclinations?

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: Given that, is there any way to learn which \Ncategory your aura falls into?

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: Water Divination, a Shingen-ryu technique for classifying your aura.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: The result will reveal your category.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: If the amount of water changes, that means you are an Enhancer.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: This shows that my aura falls \Nwithin the Enhancer class.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: If the leaf moves, that makes you a Manipulator.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: Do I not have any potential?

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: It might be a little sweet...

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: Now, you three know how your auras are classified.

Title: The x True x Pass!
Line: Nen{\i0 as professional Hunters are \Nexpected to be exceptionally strong.

Line: One of your basic tasks as a Hunter will be apprehending \Nevil poachers and criminals.

Line: Our eyes are normally brown, but they're red when we're excited.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: So I wear black contacts \Nto avoid discovery.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: I am searching for the eyes taken from my brethren.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: I'll do whatever it takes to \Nreturn their eyes to them.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: Will you report this to Dalzollene?

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: I do not wish to be killed.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: When you began to confess \Nyour true nature to me, your heartbeat was calm, but frigid.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: The heartbeat of one who is prepared to kill.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: Your heart said that, though you would hold \Nno grudges, I was fair game if I talked.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: Why did you take this job?

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: I'll know if you're lying by your eyes.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: I'm looking for a certain musical score.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: You aren't lying, but you are concealing \Nsomething important.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: Well, let's just say that you're correct.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: I'm looking for the Dark Sonata.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: A solo said to have been \Ncomposed by the devil.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: There are four versions... \NFor the piano, violin, flute, and harp.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: If a human plays or listens to the piece, it's said that disaster will befall them.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: I doubt something like that \Ncould exist in reality.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: One movement alone turned me into this.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: My friend who played the piece died, \Ntheir entire body like this.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: That friend learned a single \Nmovement from someone who said never to play the music.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: That day, we were drunk and giddy.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: My body was destroyed, but I \Ngained this ability in return.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: However, I wish to restore my body.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: I don't want anyone else \Nto end up like me.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: So I'll find the score and destroy it.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: I chose this job because it will be more efficient to \Nwork from the underworld.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: The underworld auction is about to start.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: The Phantom Troupe prepares \Nto bare its fangs.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: How will Kurapika, now a \NNostrade Family bodyguard, deal with them?

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: Coming up, we have Gon and Killua's

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: A Hunter hired as one \Nof Neon's bodyguards.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: Watch for his Great Haikuist technique, which manifests any haiku he recites.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: His hobby is writing haiku, \Na form of poetry from his home.

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: "This segment is a test of the heart and soul."

Title: Defend x And x Attack!
Line: Next time: A x Shocking x Tragedy.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Tonight, at 9 PM, the mummy of Princess Corco \Nwill be auctioned off.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Tocino, and Baise, you'll handle the bidding.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: What about the rest of us?

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Basho and Linssen will cover the rear entrance.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Kurapika and Melody will \Ntake the front entrance.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Squala and I will guard the lady.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: And with that, the mission begins.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: The Nostrade Family has \Nlearned that someone plans to attack the \Nunderground auction run by the Mafia community.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Kurapika and the other bodyguards have begun their assignments.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: We even have some head honchos here.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: For each winning bid, five percent goes back into the \NMafia community as a commission.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Does that act as a bribe?

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Like, the more they bid, \Nthe more they'll receive?

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Yeah, that's how the Mafia flexes \Nits financial muscles.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: So this is a chance to improve \Ntheir standings.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: But some gangs have gone bust because they overbid.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: My Ambidextrous Automatic Weapons \NDouble Machine Gun

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: That means he's also an Emitter!

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: He'll break through my Nen barrier, and pierce my body...

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Each bullet packs an incredible punch!

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: I didn't get to do anything.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Suck up the bodies, blood, body parts, and all their possessions.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: I'm having difficulty hearing clearly, but there's a real commotion \Ninside the building.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Where did they go? \NSearch the place!

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: It appears that everyone in the \Nauction house has disappeared.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: The whole place is in an uproar.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Melody is heading underground, to the safe.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: The goods for today's auction \Nhave been stolen!

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Rendezvous with Linssen and Basho \Nbehind the building, in Central Park.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Just in case, leave five dogs behind.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Don't take your eyes off the boss!

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Don't let anyone in the \Nroom until we return.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: The only remaining escape \Nroute is by air!

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: If you see any suspicious \Naircraft, contact me.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Make sure not to kill them.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: The community has offered \Na substantial reward to the gang that captures the thieves.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: According to the auctioneer, \Nthe only one who knew the situation, everything in the safe had been \Nmoved a few hours earlier.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Exactly as though they \Nexpected this to happen.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Don't you find the timing too perfect?

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: We have a Judas among us.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: You're saying that one of us is a traitor?

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: It's said that Judas sold Jesus out \Nfor thirty pieces of silver.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: But how much would a traitor ask from the Mafia?

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: What would the traitor gain \Nby selling us to the Mafia?

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Do you truly believe that any of us cares for those things?

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Besides, something else \Nhere doesn't add up.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Assuming there were a spy, the response was too tepid.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: If they had foreknowledge that Class-A bounties would \Nappear at the auction, they would have increased security.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: The auction goers were all \Nuninformed and unarmed.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: I believe that someone provided information \Nthat wasn't explicit.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: However, a Mafia community leader believed that information.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Did you ask the auctioneer where the merchandise was moved?

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Yeah, but he swore on his life that he didn't know.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Feitan tortured him, so he wasn't lying.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: He had the worst luck of them all today.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Did you get the names of \Nanyone who might know?

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: The auction is run by the \NMafia community heads, who lead gangs in each of the \Nten districts around the world.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: This is the only time that all \Nten gather in one place, to discuss business and issue orders.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Their commands are carried \Nout by a special force, the Shadow Beasts.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: This squad consists of each \Ndon's best combatants.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Since the Shadow Beasts weren't \Nguarding the auction house, the Mafia didn't know we were coming.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Then how did they move \Nthe merchandise?

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: I heard that a single Shadow Beasts \Nmember turned up at the safe.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: The twenty-five square-meter \Nsafe was packed with items ready to be auctioned off.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: The Shadow Beast walked in, then \Nwalked right back out, empty-handed.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: It was a man in sunglasses, \Ncalling himself Owl.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Surely they noticed after five hundred people disappeared...

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Put on a show for the pursuers.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: It's them! They're in a hot air balloon!

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: The balloon is moving toward \Nthe Gordeau Desert!

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Then what became of the \Nhundreds of guests?

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: It's possible that we aren't dealing with an ordinary band of armed thugs.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Ask them to immediately \Ndispatch the Shadow Beasts!

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Hurry, they're headed for \Nthe Gordeau Desert.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: We'll even let you decide whether \Nyou'll be drowned or buried!

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: I don't have to suck them up, do I?

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Are you the ones who \Nkidnapped the guests?

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: His philosophy is to be the strongest of them all...

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: An ordinary gun wouldn't \Neven scratch him.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: It's like watching a gorilla stomping ants.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: They came all the way here, \Nmerely to be killed.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: That wasn't enough to warm me \Nup for the Shadow Beasts.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Trying to take me out from afar?

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: This super-bazooka is strong \Nenough to take out a tank.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: You're comparing me \Nto some little tank?

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: As is the number of corpses.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: He's tearing through people \Nlike scraps of paper.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: I won't be part of that!

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: I don't see how we can win...

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: However, we cannot abandon \Nour mission and back off.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: I suddenly hear an additional \Nheartbeat coming from somewhere...

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: I am Worm, a Shadow Beast.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Which group do you belong to?

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: To them, taking lives is like breathing.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: And a pro knows his trade best of all.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: We Shadow Beasts will see to them.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: The Mafia community has \Nunleashed the Shadow Beasts on the bandits who attacked the auction.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Kurapika still has yet to \Nrealize that they are facing off against the Phantom Troupe.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Coming up, we have Gon and Killua's

Line: A Hunter hired as one \Nof Neon's bodyguards.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.

Title: A x Shocking x Tragedy.
Line: Nen{\i0 pretend she's into them, and kiss them!

Buildup x To A x Fierce Battle!
Line: My body hair will repel \Nany projectile, yup.

Line: Won't it be impossible for you \Ntwo to find him alone?

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: It'll be fine. \NI'm a pro Hunter, too.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: Okay, your turn to ask a question.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: Okay, this is my final question.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: Can I help you with anything?

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: If you want to make money at an auction, \Nyou'll need an appraiser.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: You could even say that with an appraiser, you can always turn a profit.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: You can set the price you want to pay me.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: Then you have to answer our last question.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: Why do you want to help us?

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: It made me happy that this piece of junk actually caught your eye.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: It's not a piece of junk!

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: But it's incredibly difficult to harness!

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: You must concentrate and \Ntrain for a very long time.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: I can tell how much effort you \Nput into making that pot!

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: You have a lot of talent!

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: I still think it's a weird pot, though.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: When you appraise objects long enough, you also become a good judge of character.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: I look at the sellers and the buyers too, \Nnot just the merchandise.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: It's a lot harder to appraise humans than it is to appraise antiques.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: When I saw you, I knew right away...

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: That I wanted to work with you.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: We'll decide your fee after \Nwe see how you do.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: Teach me those techniques you talked about earlier.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: But they sound fun! \NLike magic tricks!

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: We're not here to have fun!

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: Now I understand why this kid interests me.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: He doesn't care about right or wrong.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: When I admitted to making forgeries and when that trader gave me a hard time...

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: He didn't react with accusatory glares or by plotting his own evil deeds.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: He opens his mind to everything that \Nimpresses him, right or wrong.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: Someone who can never truly be appraised.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: Welding is the hardest \Ntechnique to see through.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: But recently, a new technique has surfaced.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: You plainly reveal the opened statue along with a fake treasure.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: Because people assume that you wouldn't open the statue \Nif the treasure were fake, you can fool them.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: But now this technique is getting old.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: When people started to get suspicious, \Na new technique emerged.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: Can you guess what it is?

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: The treasure inside is also fake!

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: Remove the treasure from a different place!

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: You can create a new opening \Nand remove the treasure, then insert the fake \Ntreasure and seal the hole.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: Many veteran appraisers have been fooled.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: They assume the statue is real if the \Nadhesive hasn't changed color from the application of fire.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: That's how they fool the pros.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: You live in an incredible world.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: I'll leave now, so let's meet there.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: Try to get us a good price!

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: Gon and Killua have learned \Nabout a whole new world.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: And they are about to make \Ncontact with the Phantom Troupe.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: Coming up, we have Gon and Killua's

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: A member of the Phantom Troupe.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: She can conjure the vacuum cleaner Blinky.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: Conjurer who uses a conjured \Nvacuum named Blinky.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: But it can't suck up anything alive.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: Where do you go if you're sucked in?

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: Next Time: Pursuit x And x Analysis.

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: Do we go after the man or the woman?

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: Should I use red or blue?

Title: Very x Sharp x Eye.
Line: You can decide that for yourself!

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: I'll leave now, so let's meet there.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: After a tip about the Phantom Troupe, \NGon and his friends move out.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: There, they encounter Machi and Nobunaga.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: However, the two aren't just \Nwaiting around to be caught.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Uvo was more than just a dumb brute.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Even if he were fighting \Na difficult opponent, he had the wits and experience to prevail.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: I'm the one who submitted the request.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: It's the couple behind your boyfriend?

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: I'll wire the money to you now, so please confirm receipt.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Has he ever been late without informing us?

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: He wasn't coming back until he \Nsettled up with that chain user.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: I never said he was definitely dead.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Okay, we should decide our next move.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: How do we catch those two?

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: We aren't strong enough to handle them.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: We won't know until we try!

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: And why are you saying this now?!

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: I knew it as soon as I saw them.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: My dad once had a hit on a Troupe member.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: One of the few times I've \Never heard him complain.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Said the job wasn't worth the price.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: That's considered the greatest \Ncompliment a target can get.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: That was when he told us to stay away from the Troupe.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: It's been a few years, so I thought we might stand a chance...

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Would it help you to picture \Ntwo Hisokas sitting there?

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: That is definitely not something we can handle.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: So, why do you think they're here?

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: No, they noticed that other \Ncouple behind them.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: They're paying close attention \Nto their surroundings.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: At first, I thought it was just caution \Nbecause the Mafia is after them.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: But in that case, they wouldn't \Nbe sitting in a public place.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: They're waiting for someone to find them.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Acting as bait, to draw out their prey.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Yeah, I can't tell where they are, but they're focused on us.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: If it is, we'll follow the \Nboss' orders to go wild.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: I believe the boss wishes to recruit him.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: The boss only told us to find \Nhim and bring him back.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Have you forgotten the unspoken rule?

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Alive or dead. \NBy any means necessary.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: You're free to interpret the \Nboss' orders as you like, but you can't force me to agree.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: You're the one forcing the issue.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: I've got a really bad feeling...

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: They're trying to see if there's anyone in this area who looks or acts suspicious.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: So you'd better wipe those \Nlooks off your faces.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Sorry, that was a bad idea.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Are we going to take him dead, or alive?

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: According to the online Hunter information, the chain user is one of her bodyguards.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: As for her other bodyguards, we have pictures and names for these five.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: And this girl is responsible \Nfor Nostrade's success?

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: This information comes \Nfrom the Hunter website, so it should be accurate.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: It was wise to switch rooms.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: The Phantom Troupe is definitely \Nusing the pro Hunter website.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: If you'd moved any later, \NNeon might have been in danger.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Looking ahead, the first step is to get my daughter home.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Well, I don't have a choice.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: The auction was canceled, \Nso I don't have any reason to stay.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: They'll hold another auction next year.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: And I promise I'll recover the items you wanted from those bandits.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Have I ever broken a promise?

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Have you ever kept a promise?

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: I believe your names are \NMelody and Basho?

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: You'll take Neon back to \Nthe house immediately.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: To be on the safe side, \Nuse simple disguises.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Return to your room and pack.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: All right, let's get down to our real business.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: The time and location haven't changed.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: The community must demonstrate that they will not allow anyone \Nto intimidate them.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: The Ten Dons have vowed to \Nrecover the stolen merchandise.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: As I told you earlier, the man we captured claimed that a Shadow Beast had taken \Neverything before they arrived.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: The Shadow Beasts appear to be wiped out.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Nine bodies have been recovered so far.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: The final member, Owl, was the one carrying the merchandise.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: He was probably captured by the Troupe.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Nen{\i0 they wouldn't even need torture.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: It's believed that the merchandise Owl took has fallen into the Troupe's hands.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: So, as I was saying, with the Shadow Beasts \Ndestroyed, the Ten Dons are hiring professionals to handle the Troupe.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: To the Mafia, murder is a tool, not our trade.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Considering our opponents, it would be better to leave it to the experts.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: We'll have them crush the Troupe for us, \Nwhile avoiding further losses.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: However, it's also a chance to make a \Nname for ourselves in the community.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: We cannot allow those hit men all the glory.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: I want you to join those hit men.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Take care of the chain user for me.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: They're on the move. \NWhat should we do?

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: As I told you, we can't \Nbeat them in a fight.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Gon and I will tail them.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: We absolutely cannot let them spot us.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: I can see him standing here, \Nbut I can't sense him.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Gon, I need you to make me two promises.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: If they see us, we give up \Nimmediately and escape.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: If I judge that further pursuit is impossible \Nfor any other reason, we give up.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: The signal to stop will be one phone call.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Make sure your phone's on vibrate.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: If they split up, we follow the woman.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Leorio, contact Zepile, and keep an \Neye on the auction for us.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: I'm guessing you've never \Ntailed anyone before?

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: During the Hunter Exam, I trailed Hisoka.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Yeah, I was on his tail for a whole day.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Ow... Why did you hit me?

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Well, then you should have no problem.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Be sure to stay out of \Ntheir field of vision.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: The targets have passed the plaza \Nand entered a side street.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: But they're on constant guard \Nagainst pursuers, so stay vigilant.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Tsk, he's telling me to be careful?

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: I'm the one who has to be alert to \Nany change in their movements.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: When they realize we're here, \Nthey'll react in some way.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: They can try to conceal it, but their faces or behavior will betray it.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: I've been put through life-or-death \Nshadowing exercises since I was three.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: I won't fail and lose sight of them!

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Crap, they're moving toward a deserted area.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: They must realize by now that \Nthey're being followed.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: No, they don't know our exact locations.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Or maybe they don't know they're being \Nfollowed and are heading back to base.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: That would make this a huge success.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: If it's a trap, we should run immediately.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: If it's their hideout, we should continue.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Our stalker isn't taking the bait.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: It probably isn't the chain user.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: I can sense multiple people tailing us.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: But the chain user works alone.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: He's a member of the \NNostrade Family, right?

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Yet he managed to defeat Uvo on his own.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: I'm sure because the Mafia \Nhasn't taken any action.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: If the Mafia were responsible, they would use Uvo as a chip \Nagainst us, dead or alive.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Had they killed him, the news would \Nprobably be on the Net by now.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Since there's nothing, the chain user probably defeated Uvo alone, without reporting it to the Mafia.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Why would someone who works \Nfor the Mafia operate solo?

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: It was probably a personal grudge.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: I doubt that someone seeking \Nrevenge without Mafia backup would team up with anyone else.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Thus, the chain user is operating alone and unrelated to the group now pursuing us.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Your theory has a lot of holes.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: I suspect that there's a link between \Nthis tail and the chain user.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: People who act on instinct \Nshouldn't criticize theories.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: They're waiting for someone \Nor trying to lure us out.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Do they know we're following them?

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: But they don't know our location.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: They want to draw us out because \Nthey don't know where we are.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: They're inviting us to show ourselves.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: They may be waiting for someone else.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: If they give any kind of reaction, \Nwe'll run for it!

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Escape as soon as I ring the phone.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: I wanted to see how you were doing.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: We're being followed, \Nbut they haven't made a move.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: And we can't locate them, \Nso this will take a while.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Oh, then would you like some helpful info?

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Weren't you heading out with the boss?

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: To fool the enemy, \Nyou first fool your allies.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: The boss got me good again.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Mustache-guy and the woman didn't know?

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: I have a few questions for you.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Boy, do you know the chain user?

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: He asked you to follow us, right?

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: I don't know who that is.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: We were following you \Nfor our own reasons.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: With an opening, I can escape!

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: If he's lying, he's really good.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Lying will only make the situation worse.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: The Mafia has put a huge \Nbounty on your heads.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Websites are offering a lot of money \Njust for information on your location.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Question 2... \NWho taught you to shadow people?

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: I'm trying to become a pro Hunter.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Who taught you how to do that?

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: He would be a Conjurer or Manipulator.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Does your master have chains \Nhanging from his right arm?

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: My master is an Enhancer, and he only taught me the \Nfour major principles.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: I see... Well, nothing we \Ncan do, if you don't know.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Time for the last question, then.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Do you want to die now or later?

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: You have three seconds to answer.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Do you know the chain user?

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: They stand inside the \NPhantom Troupe's hideout...

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Coming up, we have Gon and Killua's

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Her special technique is Nen Stitches.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: She can put your body back together!

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: Next time: Ally x And x Sword.

Title: Pursuit x And x Analysis.
Line: That's one of Milluki's miniature bombs!

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: He likes Gon, so he'll bail us out.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: Two days ago, you lost to \Nthat kid at arm wrestling.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: I would never lose to a kid.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: Well, you were using your right hand...

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: Once Shizuku's forgotten something, \Nshe'll never remember.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: Never would've imagined she \Nwas a Troupe member.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: When it comes to arm wrestling, what's my rank among the spiders?

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: You're not weak, but you're \Nnot strong, either.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: And the strongest was this guy called Uvogin.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: But apparently, he was \Nkilled by the chain user.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: We already said we don't know who that is!

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: If you speak without permission again,

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: Simple-minded and straightforward, \Nhe loved a good, all-out fight.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: But he was fussy about time.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: He'd get into fights with Franklin and me when we were late.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: He'd beat the crap out of me \Nin an unarmed brawl...

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: I've known him since before \Nthe Troupe was founded.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: I know him better than anyone.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: Uvo would never lose in a fight!

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: He must've been caught in some dirty trap!

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: I will make his killer pay.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: I'll find him, no matter \Nhow many I have to kill.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: The chain user bears a \Nstrong grudge against us.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: The Mafia's Nostrade Family \Nhired him recently.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: You might not know him directly, \Nbut you may have heard stories of him!

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: If you have any guesses, spill them!

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: But even if I did, I would never tell you!

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: I thought you were a bunch \Nof heartless monsters, but you'll mourn the death \Nof one of your own?

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: Spare a fraction of that grief... for the people you've killed?!

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: Another step, and I'll cut you up.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: Do you know who the chain user is?

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: I already said I have nothing to tell you!

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: Stop what you're about to do.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: You know what I'm about to do?

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: You're going to break his arm, right?

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: Why are you giving me orders?

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: I have no reason to listen to you.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: Troupe members aren't allowed \Nto start serious fights.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: If there's a dispute, we flip a coin.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: So, what do we do with them?

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: They haven't told us anything \Nabout the chain user yet.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: If they don't know anything, \Nwe can let them go.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: I checked on the trip here.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: They have no memories of the chain user.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: Seems your instinct was off this time.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: Well, if Pakunoda says so, it must be true.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: Did they do anything to you \Non the way over here?

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: No, they just asked me a few questions.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: Then they learned what they wanted \Nwithout our realizing.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: Sounds like they really trust \NPakunoda's judgment.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: She must possess a skill more \Nconvincing than mere instinct.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: They have no memories of the chain user.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: The power to scan someone's memory!

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: When she scanned us before, I had \Nno idea who the chain user was.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: But now, I have an image in my head.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: If they have nothing to do \Nwith the chain user, we can let them go?

Title: Ally x And x Sword.
Line: Yeah, there's no point \Nin keeping them here.

Title: Ally x And x Sword.

Line: I requested that Kurapika stay here.

Line: I understand that he's been \Nhired by the Ten Dons, but I was worried about my daughter.

Line: You're the chain user who killed \None of their members, right?

Line: If you won't treat us as friends or equals, we'll do whatever we must to help!

Line: One of their members cried in front of us.

Line: There are Troupe members inside the building.

Line: His presence was only exposed \Nfor a brief instant, and barely any trace remains.

Line: Fool, if I wanted, I could \Nhandle three times that.

Line: A tenth of a milligram will \Ncompletely paralyze a whale.

Line: I would consider you a threat if you \Ncould freely use the powers you steal.

Line: However, you must take risks \Nto take those abilities.

Line: A technique that strong must \Nhave its drawbacks...

Line: I would guess you must clear four or five conditions \Nbefore you can steal an ability.

Line: The old man's a difficult opponent.

Line: Once I lock him in place, kill him, even if you have \Nto kill me with him.

Line: He focused his aura into his hand.

Line: He dodges each of my old man's \Nattacks at the last second, leaving me no opening to attack.

Line: We aren't hiding anything, \Nand we know no‚Äî

Line: I'm not browsing through \Nthe images in your mind.

Line: My question will stimulate your memory, stirring up the dirt collected in its depths like throwing a stone into a pond.

Line: Once you reveal your presence, \NI can sense you.

Line: If these kids knew the chain user all along, why didn't my previous questioning \Ntrigger any memories?

Title: Initiative x And x Law.
Line: He must have been hiding his powers from his own allies!

Line: From all that, we can surmise \Nthat he is most likely intelligent, quick on his feet, secretive, \Nand level headed.

Line: If I talk, he'll sacrifice his own \Nallies and kill the boss.

Line: But that also means that these \Nkids are valuable as hostages.

Line: We have a chance to rescue the boss.

Line: Until then, these kids are valuable hostages.

Line: I am the head, and you are the legs of the spider.

Line: However, this simply represents \Na chain of command.

Line: Our goal is not to keep an individual alive, but the spider.

Line: If I tell everyone the chain \Nuser's powers and weaknesses that I learned, we can defeat him.

Line: Uvo must have faced a similar decision.

Title: Initiative x And x Law.
Line: On a dark day with very little light, \Nyou will face two choices within a small room. \NYou must choose between pride and betrayal. \NWhile the death-bringer hovers near.

Title: Initiative x And x Law.
Line: Would it be considered betrayal to speak?

Title: Initiative x And x Law.
Line: Or would it be considered betrayal to lie?

Line: It is the spider that must be kept alive.

Line: Paku, don't worry about it too much.

Line: A number of the enemies were injured.

Line: Anyway, you should watch what you say.

Line: Since it may be the last \Nthing out of your mouth.

Line: You left your precious friends behind.

Title: Initiative x And x Law.
Line: First of all, you've made \Nthe wrong assumption.

Line: I have no value as a hostage.

Line: You people are the ones on the ropes.

Title: Initiative x And x Law.
Line: He isn't shaken by any of this.

Title: Initiative x And x Law.

Line: I don't want to listen to you or him!

Line: He truly believes that he has \Nno value as a hostage.

Line: The boss was taken in that instant.

Line: If we give chase and let \Nthem escape, it's over!

Line: The boss has probably been captured by those chains that Uvo couldn't break.

Line: It'll be difficult for him to escape on his own!

Line: By the time our eyes adjusted, \Nthe boss was gone.

Title: Initiative x And x Law.
Line: For now, we need a plan.

Title: Initiative x And x Law.
Line: Five years ago, were you the \Nleader when the Troupe slaughtered the Kurta of the Scarlet Eyes?

Line: I have nothing to say to you.

Line: The chain user has an exploitable weakness.

Title: Initiative x And x Law.
Line: The general rule is that my \Ndemands are absolute.

Line: Second, do not harm your two hostages.

Title: Initiative x And x Law.
Line: Third, put that Pakunoda woman on the phone.

Title: Initiative x And x Law.
Line: Can I ask you something first?

Line: The two hostages put up a struggle, and we had to break a few bones.

Line: You are the only one allowed \Nto hear what I say.

Line: You are forbidden from \Ncommunicating with your comrades.

Line: You must come alone to \Nthe place I designate.

Line: If your heart rate changes even in \Nthe slightest, I will kill the hostage.

Line: Now give the phone to someone \Nbesides the previous man.

Line: I'm going to meet with Pakunoda alone.

Line: He'll put his friends before his mission.

Title: Initiative x And x Law.

Line: But they're talking about \Ngoing after Pakunoda...

Line: You have thirty minutes to \Nreturn to your hideout.

Line: Next time: Signal x To x Retreat.

Title: Signal x To x Retreat.
Line: Are you Pakunoda, from the Troupe?

Line: First, release Gon and Killua unharmed, \Nbefore midnight, without any tricks.

Line: If you have no objections, \NI will use my chain on you.

Title: Signal x To x Retreat.
Line: If Gon and Killua were being \Ncontrolled by a Manipulator, could you tell from their heartbeats?

Line: I've met Killua-kun, and I know how \Nhis normal heartbeat sounds.

Title: Signal x To x Retreat.
Line: So I could tell if anything had changed.

Title: Signal x To x Retreat.
Line: I have something to say before the exchange.

Title: Signal x To x Retreat.
Line: In the back of your mind, \Nyou sense that something is amiss.

Line: I want you to bring the hostages to \NLingon Airport before midnight.

Line: I'm not going to say a single word, so devise your own means \Nto defeat the monsters.

Line: Still, the people who made this \Ngame really were special...

Line: The game's programmed in such a way that you're guaranteed to get \Nstronger as you progress.

Line: And, most likely, all for the purpose of making him stronger.

Title: Strengthen x And x Threaten.
Line: The ability to think on your feet is the most critical technique.

Line: First, get used to thinking all the time, until your thinking is tied to your reflexes.

Line: Okay, we'll now begin to \Nwork on your defense.

Line: Now protect yourself from my punch!

Line: Okay, we'll begin actual \Ncombat training today.

Line: If they keep this up daily, for two months, they'll be able to fight at \Nfull speed while using {\i0

Line: After that, it'll be time for the final stage.

Line: They've made a lot of progress...

Line: Yes, you will begin training in \Nthe individual categories.

Line: Today, we'll be training in \Nthe Enhancer category.

Line: Smash a thousand with a single stone \Nin a day, and you clear the level.

Line: What are you talking about? \NYou did well.

Line: These days, we keep getting draws.

Line: But if there's no winner, it's no fun.

Line: The loser does a thousand push-ups!

Title: Strengthen x And x Threaten.
Line: Have you heard the theory that \Nrock-paper-scissors began in martial arts?

Title: Strengthen x And x Threaten.
Line: Paper represents a palm attack that \Nwrecks the opponent's organs.

Title: Strengthen x And x Threaten.
Line: Scissors represents a finger jab, \Ntargeting vital points.

Title: Strengthen x And x Threaten.
Line: And rock represents a punch with \Nthe fist to deal external damage.

Title: Strengthen x And x Threaten.
Line: Long ago, when martial arts were mistaken as purely destructive and banned as an evil art, martial artists trained by playing this game.

Title: Strengthen x And x Threaten.
Line: And that's how rock-paper-scissors came to be.

Title: Strengthen x And x Threaten.
Line: We have a total of 133 cards from \N90 of the 100 total restricted slot cards.

Line: I will now tell you how to disarm the bombs.

Title: Strengthen x And x Threaten.
Line: Let's start with how I set them.

Title: Strengthen x And x Threaten.
Line: In order to disarm the bombs, you must touch my body and say, \N"I caught the Bomber."

Title: Strengthen x And x Threaten.
Line: However, I also have the Little Flower ability.

Title: Strengthen x And x Threaten.
Line: I can use this to stop anyone \Nwho tries to touch me.

Title: Strengthen x And x Threaten.
Line: You must be very careful as you \Nattempt to disarm the bombs.

Title: Strengthen x And x Threaten.
Line: Why am I telling you so \Nmuch about my powers?

Title: Strengthen x And x Threaten.
Line: That's the condition for arming the bombs.

Title: Strengthen x And x Threaten.
Line: Then you've been waiting for \Nthe day when all the cards and members were gathered.

Title: Strengthen x And x Threaten.
Line: I will trade your lives for those \N90 restricted slot cards.

Title: Strengthen x And x Threaten.
Line: If you agree, I will use an alternative method, and simultaneously disarm all the bombs.

Title: Strengthen x And x Threaten.
Line: Do nothing, and all of you will die \Nwhen the counter reaches zero.

Title: Strengthen x And x Threaten.
Line: You should discuss this amongst yourselves.

Title: Strengthen x And x Threaten.
