Line: I'm sorry, but I won't move outside.

Title: Guts x And x Courage.
Line: I need Killua to hold the ball.

Title: Guts x And x Courage.
Line: He's the only one who can do it!

Title: Guts x And x Courage.
Line: If Bisky or Hisoka held it, \NI probably couldn't use my full strength.

Title: Guts x And x Courage.
Line: The only reason I can focus \Nwholly on hitting the ball is because Killua's holding it for me.

Title: Guts x And x Courage.
Line: We will now resume the match.

Title: Guts x And x Courage.
Line: Honestly, I'm not too good at throwing!

Title: Guts x And x Courage.
Line: She hit him at just the right angle \Nso the ball would rebound to us.

Title: Guts x And x Courage.
Line: Gon, we need to regain \Nthe ball from Razor first.

Title: Guts x And x Courage.
Line: I'm not sure it'll work, though...

Title: Guts x And x Courage.
Line: Oh, but I would so love to try it.

Title: Guts x And x Courage.
Line: Let's give it a shot, Killua.

Title: Guts x And x Courage.
Line: Man, you always come up \Nwith the craziest ideas.

Title: Guts x And x Courage.
Line: We will resume the match now.

Title: Guts x And x Courage.
Line: Gon and Killua share a strong bond of trust.

Title: Guts x And x Courage.
Line: What sort of team play will emerge when their friendship is backed \Nby the addition of Hisoka?

Title: Guts x And x Courage.
Line: Coming up, it's the \NGreed Island Tutorial!

Title: Guts x And x Courage.
Line: Today, we introduce the card Contact.

Title: Guts x And x Courage.
Line: Contact \N\NCommunicate with one target \Nplayer (encountered within the \Ngame) via your Book. (Connection \Nmaintained for a maximum \Nof 3 minutes. May only be \Nbroken by player who uses card.) \N\N[LR][NORM]

Title: Guts x And x Courage.
Line: It uses your Binder to let you \Ncontact any player you've met.

Title: Guts x And x Courage.
Line: Next time: Bargain x And x Deal.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: We will now resume the match.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: He drew the aura he'd \Ndispersed back into himself.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: So his next throw will use his true strength.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: What is Gon's plan to retake the ball from Razor?

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: I didn't expect I'd need to use this...

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: It's been a long time since I've felt this good!

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: He threw the ball straight up?

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Then it's a contest to determine the winner!

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Their plan is for Gon to catch the ball.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: And for Killua to provide support!

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: I have to applaud them for that.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: They overcame my power using their wits.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: And the key to their success was that boy Killua.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Gon focused aura on his \Nhands to catch the ball.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: The incredible concentration and focus \Nit took to pull that off deserve my praise.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Hisoka used his power to smother the ball's \Nmomentum so Gon wouldn't drop it.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Had his technique been less than perfect, the ball would have flown off.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: He was stuck between them, \Nacting as both a cushion and a brace, balancing his aura between \Noffensive and defensive.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: If the aura around his body had been too weak, he would have failed to work as a cushion, and all three of them would have taken \Nmajor damage from the ball's impact.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: But if he hadn't used enough aura on his legs, he would have failed to act as a \Nbrace, and the ball would have knocked all three of them outside the court.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: He needed to analyze how to balance his aura between body and legs \Nwithin one-percent accuracy.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: A feat that demanded both experience and talent.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: But Killua managed to compensate for \Nhis inexperience with his prodigious talent, allowing him to overcome such a difficult task.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: I didn't reach that point until \NI was in my late twenties...

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: I have to beat them before they can combine.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Right after their attack, my chance will come.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: If I can get them at that moment, \Nthey won't have time to combine.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Certainly, Gon's throw is powerful, but now I have the power to catch \Nit without being pushed back.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Then I can pick them off one at a time.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: He didn't use his full strength earlier?

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: This kid is definitely your son.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: If you don't, I'll smack you!

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: However, the momentum will force me out of bounds!

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: So catching isn't an option, but I can't dodge, either!

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Fool, that'll let Hisoka grab it!

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: That depends on the direction in which I direct it!

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: That isn't how he wants to win.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: During this match, I've learned \Nthat much about him.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: It was the aura he expended...

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: He truly used every ounce of strength.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: You can take pride in this.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Bungee Gum possesses the properties \Nof both rubber and gum.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Razor, catching the ball while touching the \Narea out of bounds is against the rules.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Which makes Team Gon \Nthe winner of this match!

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Oh, so Hisoka finished the job.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: In the end, he stole all the glory.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: It was only possible with all of your help.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Call this a victory for the team.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: That doesn't sound like you at all.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: As promised, we'll leave the city.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: I will answer your question about Ging.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Your hands are a total mess.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: The answer is that Ging isn't here.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Nor do I know where he is.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: But I can tell you some stories that I know.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: I, too, was a death row convict.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: I'd been arrested, jailed, and sentenced to die, when Ging hired me to come here.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Ging taught me it took only one person, one person in the entire world who will trust you, to save you.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: My son will come here one day.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: When that happens, give him a good beating.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Does that mean I'm allowed to kill him?

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Then, I'm counting on you, Razor.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: I always thought your old man was insane.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: He'd spend hours with a death \Nrow convict going on and on about a game he made, like a kid would.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: And then he hired that convict \Nto fight his own son.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Scum! Who do you think is letting you live?

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Then, I'm counting on you, Razor.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: It felt like no one had ever \Ncalled me by name before.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Ging believed in your strength, \Nso he left you to me.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: And I believed in your strength, which is why I didn't hold back.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Yeah, but I couldn't have won \Nwithout everyone else.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: We can see the shore from here.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: How do we reach the Sea God's Grotto from here?

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Directly below the point on the \Nsurface the light points to.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: But there isn't any treasure there.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: It's a sacred cavern, so only a few fishermen know the location.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: All other stories you heard were \Nrumors made up by others.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: But Razor and his gang wouldn't believe us.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Those who make their living on \Nthe sea can never defile it.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: So they said before they were all killed, \Ntaking the secret with them.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: You get that this is a story in a game, right?

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: I can finally see the ocean again from here.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: The boats returning with their hauls...

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: The water sparkling in many colors.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: In my mind, this view is the true treasure.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Patch of Shore \N\NThe entrance to an \Nunderwater cavern known \Nas the Sea God's Grotto. \NThe cavern changes \Nevery time you enter.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Yes! We got Patch of Shore!

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Let's use Clone to make two copies.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: We're fine with taking the copies.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Yes, you've earned the right to the original.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Hisoka, you really don't want anything?

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: I'm curious about the Troupe's actions.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: I'm not interested in collecting cards.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Should anything else come up, \Nuse Contact to reach me.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: I'll use Accompany or Magnetic \NForce to come at once.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: We haven't used Magnetic Force \Nat all since Hisoka joined, right?

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: That means he already knew about \Nspell cards before he ran into us!

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Killua, there are liars who only lie \Nwhen there's a reason to, and there are liars who also lie without reason.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: You and I are the former.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: You won't get anywhere by fretting over it.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Another player has used Contact to reach you.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Do you know who this is?

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: First, I'd like to congratulate you.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: I promise to spare your lives.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: In return, hand over Patch of Shore.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Well, I am somewhat interested \Nto see if you can beat us.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: If you're willing to deal, come alone to Masadora's entrance in one hour.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: If you don't, we'll take the card by force.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: We have many copies of Accompany.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: I knew he'd find out, but not this soon!

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: They were all members of \Nyour party of fifteen.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: This means they're either dead \Nor no longer in the game...

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: So you're one of those three kids.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: It appears you have Lucky Alexandrite.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Once I'm done with Tsezgerra, I'll come for you.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Or do you want to give up the card now?

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Tsezgerra, can you move somewhere else?

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Another player has used Contact to reach you.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Wouldn't it be faster to target the kids?

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: They probably have a copy of Patch of Shore.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: But it would be a card created by Clone.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Once those kids see Tsezgerra \Nsurrender, they'll give up.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: If we go after the kids first,

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Tsezgerra will have time to recover, \Nand that will just give us more trouble.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: He is a Single Star Hunter.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: And we don't know what his power is.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: So he believes that we are carrying \Nthe original Patch of Shore.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: They want the original card... \Nthey want "our" card.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: We'll try to buy as much time as possible.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Use the time to regain your strength.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: If you want to beat this game, you'll \Nhave no choice but to fight them.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: And you are the only ones \Nwith a chance to win.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Just now, your actions were \Nboth selfish and foolish.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: If they'd accepted your challenge and come, what would have happened \Nto Killua, given his injuries?

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: You endangered not only yourself, but your friends too, by losing \Ncontrol of your emotions!

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: It will all come down to Accompany.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: If we evade their use of Accompany, \Nwe should be able to buy plenty of time.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: But if too much time passes, they may decide to switch and target you.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: I estimate we have a one-week limit.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Past that, we can't make guarantees.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: They may well switch to us after three days.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: If we're buying you time, \Nthat implies we have an alliance.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: There is little benefit from an alliance with them.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: The enemy already knows the \Neight of us have teamed up.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: So we won't be able to act as decoys \Nwhile you take out Genthru.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: That means leaving the original versions of the last two cards they seek,

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: #2 and #75, with any one \Nparty would be dangerous.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: So my offer to buy time isn't an alliance.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: That's the amount of time we can buy.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: If we succeed, will you give \Nus #75, Lucky Alexandrite?

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: You just said one week was the limit.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: That's assuming we stay on the run.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: If necessary, I can force a stalemate of sorts.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: But for #75, we could just \Ntell you how to obtain it.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: But Goreinu and the rest of us have few empty slots left.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: It's no longer reasonable to turn \Nall our cards over to the villagers.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: That isn't enough time for \NKillua's hands to heal.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: And it certainly isn't enough to close the \Ngap between Genthru's abilities and ours.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Which means we should use the \Ntime to come up with a plan.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Devise a scenario in which \Nyou can defeat Genthru.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Identify the required circumstances, \Nand prepare to carry out that plan.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: We'll leave to delay Team Genthru now.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: They've already killed over \Nfifty players in this game.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: If you want to beat the game, \Nyou'll have to fight them.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Three weeks... That isn't much time.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Killua, you focus on healing and thinking of a plan to defeat Genthru.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: The first necessity is that you be \Nable to avoid his Little Flower.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Gon has won his match against Razor.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: But the bombers remain stronger \Nfighters than Gon's group.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Will they be able to devise a viable plan?

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Coming up, it's the \NGreed Island Tutorial!

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Today, we introduce the card Clone.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Clone \N\NTransform into a random card \Nselected from the restricted slots \Nof one target player. (If target has \Nempty restricted slots or max of \Nselected card has been reached, \NClone is used up without transforming. \N\N[LR][NORM]

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: It transforms into one random card from the player's restricted slots.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Gold Dust Girl \N\NA girl who releases golden dust. \NOne bath a day will net 500G. \NVery shy and quiet.

Title: Bargain x And x Deal.
Line: Next time: Chase x And x Chance.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Machi and Nobunaga are tailing him.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: We'll let you negotiate with the exorcist.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: We're willing to pay any price he asks.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Anyway, just make sure he agrees to do it.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: After all, I won't get to fight Chrollo otherwise...

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Hell if I'll tell you, fool.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: You in the shadows, was it through your power?

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Are you some kind of freak?

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: I recently completed a very entertaining battle.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: I'm quite sensitive at the moment...

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: I rather feel like messing up \Na complete stranger.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: This guy is just insanely perceptive.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: I cannot tell you how my power works, \Nbut we found him by using it.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: You look very appetizing as well.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: I certainly shall, for my own benefit.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Are you serious about fighting the boss?

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Would you prefer that I survive, \Nor that Chrollo survives?

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Once you finish your job here, \Nyou can die, for all I care.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: And if I kill Chrollo, then what?

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: I would pursue you to the ends \Nof the Earth to kill you.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: I like the sound of that...

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Our objective is to obtain Breath of Archangel, \Ncurrently monopolized by Team Genthru.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: We must force them to transform a card, or we won't have a chance to use our Voucher.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: And that's where Team Gon comes in.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: While they may not have the \Nstrength to win outright, they are highly likely to deal serious \Ndamage to a member of Team Genthru.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: If they're forced to use a Breath of Archangel,

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Voucher\N\NA voucher that can be \Nexchanged for Breath \Nof Archangel. Can only \Nbe obtained when \NBreath of Archangel \Nhas attained its card \Ntransformation limit. our Voucher will become a Breath of Archangel.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Breath of Archangel \N\NAn angel that cures any \Nmortal injury or terminal \Nillness with one breath. \NBut angel only appears once.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: And if we can buy three weeks for those kids, they'll trade the card to us!

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: I believe I told you to come alone.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: We weren't able to make a decision,

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Cards Needed\N\NBreath of Archangel\NLucky Alexandrite\NBlue Planet so we kept discussing it on our way here.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: And we've finally reached a consensus.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: They only stole some useless \Ncards from my free slots.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: We take their cards and kill them.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: I don't know what's happened to them...

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: But their resolve was written all over their faces.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Six copies of Accompany, twenty-four of Return, nine copies of Castle Gate, and two of Magnetic Force.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: I spent all our money on them.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Okay, then we'll meet up in three days.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Use that time to earn money \Nand buy the cards we need.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Do you think they'll come after us?

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: We now have nearly twice the number \Nof Accompany cards as Genthru.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: If they use Clairvoyant Serpent, they'll see that.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: This is how a Single Star Hunter fights.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Don't stop to think after I grab your arm.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Act the second you feel my touch!

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Okay, let's take a ten-minute break.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: But in the mere two weeks we have left,

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: I can only help him bolster his defense.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: We need another weapon before we can fight.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: You must maintain this stance, \Nwhile staying perfectly still, and only by releasing aura.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: If you can elevate around \Nat least that high, you pass.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: That training is a lot harder, given that it's only a level higher.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Naturally... Because this is \Nreally level-five training.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Are you sure you should skip levels like that?

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: If it doesn't work, we'll have wasted \Nthe three weeks we were given.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: If we followed the proper sequence, \Nhe could reach level three easily.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: But that wouldn't do him any \Ngood in actual combat.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: He needs an Emitter attack that \Ncan push an opponent back several meters with a direct hit.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: It must be that strong for \Nhim to use it as a weapon.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: So you jumped to level five...

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: But even if he clears the training, the ability to send enemies flying \Nisn't a desicively lethal weapon.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: It's only meant to give him more options.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: So have you made any progress on a plan?

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: First, can you tell me what your power is?

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: My job will be easier with that information.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: I'll introduce you to my power.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: She specializes in providing \Nmassages of pure pleasure.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: She'll burn off excess fat and guide both \Nyour body and your soul to paradise.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: When her aura, transformed into \Nspecial lotion, is applied to the skin, it makes your skin look younger.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: She can also use acupressure massage \Nto cleanse your body internally.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Constipation, stiff shoulders, chills... \Nany anomaly you have will vanish!

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: She can also do chiropractic massages, \Nmeditative massages, rolling massages...

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: That's the most useful power in the world!

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: This is why you're just a stupid old hag!

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: I dare you to say that again!

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: How do they know where to find us?

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: If they were using Accompany or Magnetic \NForce to move straight to us, we'd know, but that isn't the case.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: They're using hit and run tactics, \Nthen making clean escapes.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: We immediately move to a different location, \Nbut before long, they find us.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: If they aren't using a spell, \Nlike homing or tracking,

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: We'll just have to use some force.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Okay, we'll set Steal on his binder...

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Hey, have you heard of the bombers?

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: I just set a bomb on you.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: I can kill you from anywhere, anytime I wish.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: If you don't want to die, \Nbring me the cards I request.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: They're camping outside the spell card store.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: And they're attacking every player who \Nwalks out with newly bought cards.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Contact \N\NCommunicate with one target \Nplayer (encountered within the \Ngame) via your Book. (Connection \Nmaintained for a maximum \Nof 3 minutes. May only be \Nbroken by player who uses card.) \N\N[LR][NORM]

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: But they must be aware of me.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: They've realized that someone new is \Nproviding cards to Team Tsezgerra.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: So to flush me out, they check the binders of \Nanyone who exits the store, disposing of everyone who's met one of you.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: They're primarily focused on obtaining \NAccompany and Magnetic Force.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: And any players that they free \Nonce cleared of suspicion are forced to collect cards for them.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: By eliminating suspects and taking their cards, they also cut off our supply.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: They're killing three birds with one stone.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: We'll try to track their movements.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Get away from there and \Nwait for us to contact you.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Silent Worker: Fly on the Job

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: They don't appear to be leaving Masadora.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Okay, next we check their cards.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Together, those three have sixteen copies of Accompany \Nand two of Magnetic Force.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: At this pace, they'll catch up \Nto us in four to five days.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: They're saying they won't move \Nuntil they have enough cards.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: While training, see yourself firing a water pistol.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: You build up aura within your body, \Nthen shoot it from your palm!

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: The greater your power, \Nthe stronger the aura you fire.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: You want to release all the aura \Nyou've kept closed up inside.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: The total amount of refined \Naura you apply to the attack, and the speed, power, and timing \Nyou apply to the release...

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: You need all of those elements \Nto land the attack you'll require.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: I just don't get how you push the aura \Nin your body out of your hand...

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: He hasn't made any progress for ten days.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Maybe you should have let \Nhim start from level two.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: We still have ten more days...

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: In hindsight, it wasn't a very good deal.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: If we give Team Tsezgerra Lucky Alexandrite, they'll only be missing two cards.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: We can just take them from Genthru by force.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: And we still have to figure out \Nhow to defeat Genthru first.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: We now have forty-eight copies of Accompany.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: If you total their Accompany, Return, and Magnetic Force cards, \Nthey only have forty-five cards.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Let us start a game of tag we cannot lose.

Line: They're coming our way at an incredible speed!

Line: We move according to the plan!

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Damn, we only have five days left...

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Don't you have any advice that \Ncould help him break through?

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: The sensation of aura flowing through the body is different for everyone.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: If I give him advice from my own perception \Nand he makes incorrect assumptions, it could end up hurting more than helping.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: How many do we have left?

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: They're taking their time to throw us off.

Line: If we run out of Accompany, \Nwe'll have to use Return.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: We'll alternate between Aiai and Soufrabi.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: They're speculating that I'll try to buy \Ncards while they're playing tag.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Which means it's Genthru and a couple \Nof fakes that are chasing you.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: The same trick won't work again.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Right now, Genthru is alone, \Nwhile there are four of us.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: No, I would prefer better odds for a fight.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: We'll stick to the original plan.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: I came up with a plan for defeating them.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: I think I've almost got it.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: And I can't use an unreliable \Ntechnique in my plan...

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: You'll have to learn this the hard way.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Until you get it down to perfection.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Only one, and it was someone new to the game.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Word's out that the bombers are hunting players around here, so everyone's staying away.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Could he have been someone \Nwe already disposed of?

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Leave \N\NSend one target player \Noff the island. \N\N[SR][NORM]

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: We're finally down to our last card.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: If they follow us outside the game, \Nwe can fend them off at the mansion.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: If they don't follow us, we just have \Nto wait until the time limit is up.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: All that's left is choosing the \Nthree to keep for winning.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: We just have to ask Mr. Battera what he wants.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Mr. Battera canceled the whole thing.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: We received an intermediary fee \Nand a cancellation fee.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: But I stayed behind because I \Nthought I should inform you.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: What is the meaning of this?!

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: We're close to beating the game!

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: What about all the time and effort we've spent?

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: My lawyers have been instructed to pay you.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: You can do whatever you want with the cards.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: So now, just leave me alone...

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: We're free to kill them out here.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Since their ring data won't disappear.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Team Tsezgerra has given Gon and his \Nfriends the time that they promised.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: But awaiting them was a \Nsituation they didn't expect.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Coming up, it's the \NGreed Island Tutorial!

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Today, we introduce the card Fake.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Fake \N\NChange Fake into any card type from 001 to 099. \NThe new card can be placed in a restricted pocket. \NBut it will not count toward Book completion, \Nand cannot be transformed into an item. \NIt also will not count toward card limit. \N\N[SR][NORM]

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: It can transform into any card from 001 to 099.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: But it doesn't count toward binder completion.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: And it can't be transformed into an item.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Next time: Insanity x And x Sanity.

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: Hey, Gon, want to see my special attack?

Title: Chase x And x Chance.
Line: You'll have to wait till next week!

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: If they don't return, their data will be erased.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Well, I guess we have to wait \Nfor Goreinu to contact us.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Look, I've got this down pat.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Can I concentrate on Emitter training now?

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: You might have it down, but you're \Nstill off by a tenth of a second.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Your goal is to be within a hundredth of a second.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Another player has used Contact to reach you.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Do you realize it'll soon have been 240 hours since Tsezgerra's team exited the game?

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I can tell you now they won't be returning.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Genthru's team is camping the starting point.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: We decided beforehand that they \Nwouldn't return to the game until I sent an all clear signal.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: But their card data will disappear.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I'm holding on to all the valuable cards.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Doesn't that betray that they have other allies?

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: They'll notice if none of the four \Nhave any important cards!

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: They left the game at 3:05, ten days ago, right?

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Yeah, in five more minutes, \Ntheir card data will be wiped.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Essentially, they'll be out of it.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: To be safe, we'll wait until 3:10.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: But do you really think they've given up?

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Given that they took Battera and ran.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: It was a desperate attempt to \Nkeep us from the reward.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: But they spent years collecting \Nthose ninety-six cards.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Also, I'm wondering why Battera \Nwould send his guards packing.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: No point in speculating about it now.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Yeah, we switched about thirty of their \Nninety-six cards with fakes.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I'm the one actually holding \Nthe ninety-six cards.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: For such a cautious man, this is the \Nbiggest gamble of Tsezgerra's life.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: So I want to make sure it pays off.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I'm sorry, but I won't be able to \Nhelp you face Genthru's crew.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: When do you want us to give you the card?

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I'll wait until you've defeated Genthru.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Accompany \N\NWarp all players within \N20 meters of caster to city \N(must have been visited) \Nor player of your choice \N(must have been met \Ninside the game). \N\N[SR][NORM]

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Now it's time to go after those kids.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: It wasn't in the plan, but we can \Nget Patch of Shore from them.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: First, we need more copies of Accompany.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Once they're prepared, they'll come for you.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: We have you guys to thank.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: But we have no choice. It'll depend on Gon.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Did you let our conversation \Ndistract you and lose track?

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Please explain what this is about.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I realize that I was being intrusive, but I took a look.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: She'd been hospitalized for a long time.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: A few days ago, she passed away in her sleep.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I suppose she didn't want people \Nthinking she wanted my money, because she returned every gift I gave her.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: But she loved this shoddy picture frame that I made myself.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: All we ever needed was one other.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: We swore that we would never be apart...

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Until the accident that put her into a sleep from \Nwhich she'd never wake...

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: She appeared to only be sleeping...

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Breath of Archangel \N\NAn angel that cures any \Nmortal injury or terminal \Nillness with one breath. \NBut angel only appears once.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: If I beat that game, I could obtain the one thing that I need most, like a dream come true.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I was prepared to spend my \Nfortune on copies of that game.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: But it doesn't matter any longer...

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: The kids have four copies of \NAccompany among them.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I'll take the kid with spiky black hair.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Assuming we need to resort to force.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: We're here to propose a deal.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Right, don't let them notice that we've been waiting for them, \Ncompletely prepared.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: We have a good idea that Tsezgerra approved.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Stop! Talk from where you are!

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: We must act like we're at a \Nsignificant disadvantage.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: We have to convince them that we're being forced into this position.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: We'll beat the game on everyone's behalf, \Nthen everyone returns to the real world.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I find that hard to believe.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: We've had a change of heart.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: And Tsezgerra has already left the game.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: But that doesn't prove that \Nhe agreed to your offer.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Stop whining, and hand over your cards!

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Return \N\NWarp to a city \Nof your choice. \N(Must be a city \Nyou have visited.) \N\N[LR][NORM]

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Are they trying to obtain more spell cards?

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: They might try to escape to the \Nreal world through the port.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Are they hiding and concealing their presences?

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: We don't want to let them buy any spell cards.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Did they head for the port?

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Tsk, guess we have no choice.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Now why don't you give up, \Nand hand over your cards?

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: We'll never let you have them!

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: They mean to fight us one-on-one.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: If we have to hand over our \Ncards, we'd rather fight!

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Now we only need to separate them.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: You know that I'm the Bomber?

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: And who told you how my power works?

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: That moment was enough for him to know what I'm watching out for and why...

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: This is the difference in experience between us!

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: There aren't too many people who know about my power \Nand are still alive.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I can't let him control things.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I don't like people just taking \Ncards from other players!

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Whoever surrenders first has \Nto give up all his cards.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: You seem to have the wrong idea.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: You're in no position to make demands.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: This is your last chance to make a deal.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Otherwise, you're nothing more than a thief.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I'd rather die than hand \Nover my cards to a thief!

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: You can kill me, but I still \Nwon't take out my binder!

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: And I don't mean my kind of insane.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I'm holding one hundred thirty-one cards.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I have ninety-seven of the restricted slot cards.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I have one hundred and two cards.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: And seventy-one of the restricted slot cards.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: But clearly, he has much \Nroom for improvement.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: You're strong enough that a single explosion won't be \Nenough to finish you off.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: But his use of aura is sloppy at best.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Not sure why he was so confident.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: At this point, you're nowhere near his level.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: You won't be able to deal significant damage.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Because he will still defeat you.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: You still haven't answered my question.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Who told you about my power?

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: My point is that I don't need my ability to deal with you.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Once he's seen how much stronger he is, we'll begin to lure him into our trap!

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: That's how I'd like to respond...

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: But I don't like the idea of \Nbeing totally manhandled.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I'll make him use his power...

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I'll carry out the plan afterwards!

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Looks like you need a little more pain!

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I have a surprise for you!

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: She should be out of teleportation spells.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: She used Transform to hide \Nit as a different card?

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Why would you go to all this \Ntrouble to be alone with me?

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Because I didn't want to let you cry for help.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I have no idea what you're talking about.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I'm telling you that I'm stronger.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: That's what I was going to say.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I was being nice, so I let you hit me once.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Because I can't restrain myself when I revert.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: And I end up killing my opponents!

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Why would you... hide your power?

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: The ace up your sleeve should remain hidden...

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: And more than anything, I hate the way I look.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I have a slight advantage in martial \Nskill and physical strength.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: But he has me beat in aura capacity.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I probably won't be able to hurt \Nhim with any normal attack.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Which makes him perfect to experiment on.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I felt that hit inside my head.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I can't afford to fool around.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Doesn't seem to be enough to knock him out.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: But I can immobilize him for a few seconds.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: This is a superalloy yo-yo my brother ordered.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: It weighs around fifty kilograms, so it packs quite a punch!

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Between the weight and centrifugal \Nforce, that really hurts.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: He always leaves his right side exposed when I attack a certain way!

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: If I take his yo-yo, leaving him empty-handed, he'll make the same mistake!

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Did I forget to mention that I have two yo-yos?

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Did you know that when you kick me, you raise your \Nguarding arm on the other side?

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: You're creating your own blind spot.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: He used my blind spot to pull \Nout a yo-yo and attack?

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Was a fake to make you \Nkick me with your left leg.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: And when you released your first yo-yo...

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I knew you picked up something to throw at me.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Why did you use Accompany to \Ndraw me away from the others?

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: To make you focus on a one-on-one chance, \Nso you'd lose track of your surroundings.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: You set three traps during that brief exchange?

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Every move I made was a trap.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Why won't you accept your fate?

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I take back what I said.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: I will show you my power.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: This battle is mental, not physical.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: His will to fight, his will to stand, his will to resist.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: To win, I must swallow my \Npride and play it smart.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Let me demonstrate that all your hard \Nwork and confidence mean nothing!

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: The devilish man has unleashed his true power.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Coming up, it's the \NGreed Island Tutorial!

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Today, we introduce the card Breath of Archangel.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Breath of Archangel \N\NAn angel that cures any \Nmortal injury or terminal \Nillness with one breath. \NBut angel only appears once.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: A card that can cure injury and disease.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Mito-san used this all the time.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Next time: Victor x And x Loser.

Title: Insanity x And x Sanity.
Line: Good kids always brush their teeth.

Title: Victor x And x Loser.
Line: His will to fight, his will to stand, his will to resist...

Title: Victor x And x Loser.
Line: Let me demonstrate that all your hard \Nwork and confidence mean nothing!

Title: Victor x And x Loser.
Line: I had no time to dodge!

Title: Victor x And x Loser.
Line: But I can still block his attacks!

Title: Victor x And x Loser.
Line: The moment I grasped his arm, he focused his aura there to block my attack.

Title: Victor x And x Loser.
Line: You think you've outwitted me now?!

Title: Victor x And x Loser.
Line: That was just a body blow.

Title: Victor x And x Loser.
Line: If you focus your aura where I grab you, you leave yourself open everywhere else.

Title: Victor x And x Loser.
Line: In fact, you're only making \Nit harder on yourself.

Title: Victor x And x Loser.
Line: You won't be smiling much longer!

Title: Victor x And x Loser.
Line: One more hit to send you to hell!

Title: Victor x And x Loser.
Line: That was the hardest hit so far!

Title: Victor x And x Loser.
Line: He shouldn't have been able to counter.

Title: Victor x And x Loser.
Line: But since he did, that means he \Nkept the damage to a minimum.

Title: Victor x And x Loser.
Line: In other words, he blocked me \Nwithout relying on aura.

Title: Victor x And x Loser.
Line: He guessed I didn't intend to set off a bomb?

Title: Victor x And x Loser.
Line: How does Genthru avoid being \Nburned by his own bombs?

Title: Victor x And x Loser.
Line: He shrouds his hand in aura that's \Nstronger than the explosion.

Title: Victor x And x Loser.
Line: It's a technique that requires \Na large aura reserve.

Title: Victor x And x Loser.
Line: By now, you should be able to tell.

Title: Victor x And x Loser.

Line: Each number summons a different weapon.

Line: You should be grateful, you idiot!

Line: First you push us down, then you fire at us!

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: If I hadn't opened fire, \Nyou would have been attacked.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: An aggressive, carnivorous insect, \Ncurrently under class-1 quarantine.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: From time to time, they even attack humans.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: You were standing right in front of their nest.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Had I not fired, a Chimera Ant army would \Nhave consumed you by now.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: I feel like this has happened before...

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Because of this interruption, \NI'll need to start over.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Man, forced to take another life...

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Man, forced to take another life...

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Are you the one who saved me back then?

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: On Whale Island, after I stumbled into \Nthe territory of a Foxbear with its cub.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: That time, too, you had to kill, in order to protect me.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: I never expected to run into you again here.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: How do you know my name?

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: I heard it from your dad,

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Oh, so you're also pro Hunters?

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Yep. Are you one too, Kite-san?

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: It's awkward being addressed \Nformally by my master's son.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Yeah, Ging-san was the one who \Nmade me a top-class Hunter.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: He was my teacher and benefactor.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: I'd have died long ago, in the alley of a slum.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: He swiped the bread that \NI'd managed to find...

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Bastard, you won't get away today!

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: That was how you met Ging?

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Ging-san said that good Hunters \Nare well-liked by animals.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: He said I had potential, so I got interested.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: I had to force him to teach me.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: He hated dealing with any kind of hassle...

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: So I was never his student officially.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: But I was a stubborn one...

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Nen{\i0 and he began teaching me to hunt.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: As a result, I was able to pass the \NHunter Exam with little difficulty.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: But before Ging-san was satisfied, \NI had to clear another hurdle.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Can you guess what it was?

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: This is what Ging would have said...

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: I knew it! I figured that was it!

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: But as far as I knew, he was \Nthe world's greatest Hunter.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: It was going to be the most difficult hunt ever.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: There were no clues or leads to begin from.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: And I didn't hear word of a single sighting.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: He'd managed to completely erase \Nhis existence from this world.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: So what happened in the end?

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: I was struggling, and grasping for a single clue, so I went to his home.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: That was when I met you, Gon.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: But back then, I didn't realize that you were Ging-san's son.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: I didn't learn that until I'd found Ging-san and told him about what had \Nhappened on Whale Island.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: That was my kid... His name is Gon.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Foxbear territory when they're raising young.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Ging-san wasn't surprised that I went to Whale Island, \Nor that I met you there.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: It was almost as though he'd expected it.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Looking back, it may be that everything's gone \Naccording to Ging-san's plans.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Are you saying he set all this up?

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: In the game, a guy named Razor was \Nwaiting for me, at Ging's request.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: My son will come here one day.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: When that happens, give him a good beating.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Does that mean I'm allowed to kill him?

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Then, I'm counting on you, Razor.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Dwun and List were among Ging's ten friends

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Oh, Razor was also one of them...

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Anyway, those three were waiting for me.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: When I learned that, I realized something.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Greed \NIsland{\i0 meeting Bisky and the others may have \Nbeen another part of his plan.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: In that case, it's possible that Ging also planned \Nthat you'd meet Kite here.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Yeah, did you register under the name "Nigg"?

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: No, I don't recall that name.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: I do remember Ging-san taking \Nme inside a game...

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Yes, I believe that was its title.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: But I can't remember if I used an alias.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Ging must have had you use the name Nigg.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: You were so sure you'd meet him, huh?

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Are you sure this was the right decision,

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Can you make it so that using \NMagnetic Force will send Gon to me, while using Accompany will send him to Kite?

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Why do you want me to do that?

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: If he uses Magnetic Force to see me on \Nhis own, I'm willing to meet with him.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: But I can't meet him if he's so gutless \Nthat he has to bring friends.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Why would bringing friends mean he's gutless?

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: You'd probably just be \Nembarrassed if he brought a crowd.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: I just tagged along for the ride.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: That may have been part of Ging's plan, too.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: However, it appears that our meeting \Nhere wasn't coincidence.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: There must be a deeper meaning to this.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Razor waited inside the \Ngame to make you stronger, so one would think Ging must \Nhave some role for Kite to play.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Your final test was finding Ging, right?

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: That sounds like a daunting task.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: The best Hunters in this world are masters of not only hunting, \Nbut concealing themselves as well.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Yet you were able to find him.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Once you cleared your final test,

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Ging must have decided you were \Nworthy of handling this.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Want me to tell you Ging-san's \Ncurrent whereabouts?

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: No, I'll find him on my own.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: How to help two-headed wolves breed?

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Ging is involved in that stuff?

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Sure, Ging-san is involved with a \Nwide range of Hunter activities.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: He's never formally applied \Nbecause he doesn't want to expend the energy, but he's as \Nqualified as a Triple Star Hunter.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Stars are awarded to Hunters who \Nperform extraordinary tasks.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Those responsible for historical discoveries or global \Nachievements receive three stars.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: There are fewer than ten of \Nthese Hunters in the world.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: The title "Triple Star Hunter" \Nis reserved for the very best.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: So Ging is as good as the best!

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: A Hunter who earned Ging's respect.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Ging-san is also famous for discovering the Lurka Ruins \Nand the Kongo gold vein.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Oh, I've heard of the Lurka Ruins!

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: While his meeting with Gon and Killua signaled the \Nbeginning of a new adventure...

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: On the Yorbian continent, in the \Nsouthernmost of the Balsa Islands, a prologue to unparalleled fear was quietly but steadily unfolding.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: These creatures are not enough, \Nno matter how many I eat.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: I must heal before I can take the next step.

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: I have a duty to fulfill...

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: I must give birth to the King!

Title: Reunion x And x Understanding.
Line: Next time: Unease x And x Sighting.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: I have a duty to fulfill...

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: I must give birth to the King!

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: Gon and Killua were transported \Nto Ging's student, Kite.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: After Gon remembered having \Nmet Kite years before, he felt that Ging intended \Nfor this meeting to occur, and his interest in Kite grew.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: Hey, what kind of work do you do, Kite?

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: I focus on discovering and \Nresearching new species.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: Oh, have you heard of the Camp Tiger?

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: They use branches that have been \Nignited by lightning as live kindle.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: Other than certain Magical \NBeasts that walk on two legs, they're the first of their kind: animals that eat their meat cooked, not raw.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: You said the thing that attacked \Nme was a Chimera Ant?

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: Normally, no one would be allowed \Nnear such a dangerous insect.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: No, I specialize in larger creatures.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: But currently, I'm investigating these insects.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: But it appears that now, I'll have \Nto move to a different location.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: I must make a call, but I'm not \Ngetting any reception here.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: Seven of us are working as a team.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: I guess I must wait for their arrival.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: Once they're here, I'll introduce you.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: They're amateurs, but they're still skilled Hunters.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: They dropped by for a visit on their travels.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: Oh, it's a pleasure to meet \Nyou all the way out here.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: Um, forgive me if I'm wrong, but are you \Npart of the famous family of assassins?

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: Additionally, they are both pro Hunters.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: So you should show some respect.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: We've been conducting biological \Nsurveys with Kite for three years, but this is the most incredible \Norganism we've ever seen!

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: I don't think we finished our introductions.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: We have two others on our team.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: They're both headed toward \Nthe area of the sighting.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: Oh, and you were right, Kite...

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: This looks just like the claw \Nof a Chimera Ant queen.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: We ran some computer analyses, \Nand the result was a 99% match.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: This is a Chimera Ant claw?

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: It's as big as a human finger.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: Does that mean there are huge ants?

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: Maybe one mutated and grew really big?

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: That's possible, though it may also belong \Nto a completely different species.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: Regardless, we just don't know right now.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: It all started with the wonkiest little thing...

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: It's this wild land, in the middle \Nof the Azian continent.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: We had just completed a biological \Nsurvey they had requested when...

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: You've completed two hundred years' \Nworth of work for this agency...

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: To be honest, I regret that I am \Nunable to pay you a bonus.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: I'll be sure to recommend you \Nto other friendly nations.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: I'm going to ramble a bit.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: I believe part of a very strange species was \Nbrought to the Southern Piece auction...

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: There's suspicion that it's from \Nan unidentified organism, so the seller couldn't list it in the catalog, but since they'd have to donate it \Nto a government agency otherwise, they hoped a licensed Hunter would \Nbuy it from them for a high price.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: Th-This clearly belongs to an \Nunidentified organism, yes.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: F-From what I can see, \Nit resembles an insect's leg...

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: B-But no known insects have l-legs this large.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: And the claw exhibits traits \Nnot found among insects...

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: A leg typically has two claws, but this has six.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: It almost looks as though the tarsi \Nevolved into something like fingers?

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: Yes, and this part is spiny, \Nso it could be the tibia.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: If we take a sample and study \Nit further, we'll learn more.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: Could you give us a small part?

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: Since Won-san referred you \Nto us, we cannot refuse.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: We'll send you any results, once we have them.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: Where did Lin and Podungo go?

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: The person who found the insect leg \Napparently lives in a city by the ocean.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: Sorry you won't be able to catch your breath, \Nbut we should hurry after them.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: Hey, can we come with you?

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: Having two pro Hunters with us is reassuring.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: And this is Ging-san's son and \None of the Zoldyck family!

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: Anyway, you kids are already pros at your age?

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: We weren't born with the talent...

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: Talent, talent... Guess I have a \Ntalent for saying "talent," huh?

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
Line: When a Chimera Ant queen eats other organisms, she is able to pass traits on from those organisms to the next generation.

Title: Unease x And x Sighting.
