Title: The x Fight x Begins.
Line: Let that Rammot guy know, so he calms down.

Title: The x Fight x Begins.
Line: I'll take that as a promise.

Title: The x Fight x Begins.
Line: Fool. You think I'd keep that promise?

Title: The x Fight x Begins.
Line: Let's find a rare one and eat it.

Title: The x Fight x Begins.
Line: But his anger and stamina \Nshould see him through it.

Title: The x Fight x Begins.
Line: Still, our army seems to have \Ntoo much personality.

Title: The x Fight x Begins.
Line: Having multiple perspectives helps, but too many are self-centered.

Title: The x Fight x Begins.
Line: We're meeting our quota, so there's \Nnothing to worry about.

Title: The x Fight x Begins.
Line: Are you counting the humans you capture?

Title: The x Fight x Begins.
Line: Perhaps we should have everyone \Nassemble to discuss this.

Title: The x Fight x Begins.
Line: No, we operate at different times now.

Title: The x Fight x Begins.
Line: I'll talk to each leader and devise a solution.

Title: The x Fight x Begins.
Line: If you're honestly concerned, \Ntry to control yourself.

Title: The x Fight x Begins.
Line: The stench alone would guide us to the corpses.

Title: The x Fight x Begins.
Line: So this is the hidden side of NGL.

Title: The x Fight x Begins.
Line: The silence of the drug factory \Novertaken by the Chimera Ants further intensifies the chill in the air.

Title: The x Fight x Begins.
Line: What awaits Gon and his friends there?

Title: The x Fight x Begins.
Line: Next time: Kite x And x Slots.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: I'm saying that some unique humans \Nare overflowing with life energy.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: They're hard to find, which is why they're rare.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: If you wish to become stronger, this is a perfect opportunity.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: But if you aren't prepared, you won't \Nbe able to endure the ordeal.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Whether we win or lose, hell lies ahead of us.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Kite, Gon, and Killua have advanced deep within NGL, in search \Nof the Chimera Ant nest, and have arrived at a cliff \Nwith peculiar openings.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: This is the Chimera Ant nest?

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: They don't make their nests in holes.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: They use mud and feces to build them.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: There's no telling when or \Nfrom where they will attack.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: That other Chimera Ant completely concealed his presence.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Yes, it is NGL's hidden side.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: This factory produces the ingestible drug D¬≤, which is spreading throughout the mainland.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: There are probably nearby bila trees, \Nwhich produce its main ingredient.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Ironic given their claims as preservationists.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: It's the same as the others.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: I assume that only the NGL leaders \Nknow the truth of this place.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: The other members joined because they honestly loved nature.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: So this facility is the center \Nof NGL's underground.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Then Chimera Ants have wiped \Nout the NGL underground.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: And a bunch of amateurs with guns \Nwon't suffice to deal with them.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: He either escaped or was eaten.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: They're slowly approaching \Nthrough the middle tunnel.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: There are more in the left and right tunnels.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: How far away can you search?

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Everything within a forty-five meter radius.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Depending on physical and mental condition, \NI can increase that by a few meters.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: How dare you intrude on my turf?

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Oops, didn't mean to do that.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: I'm getting bored with these guys.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Guess I'll get rid of Rover, too.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: When you beg like that, \NI just want to kill you more.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: They want you to rush over.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: If they shoot a projectile your way, \Nyou won't be able to see it.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: You three will be my new dogs.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Chimera Ants have always been aggressive, but it seems consuming malicious humans \Nhas made them even more evil.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: If we don't deal with them here, \Nmany more will die!

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: I'll take the one in back.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: You boys will have to deal \Nwith the two rushing us.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: You have more power than I expected.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: They have the hard shells of insects, \Ncombined with human agility...

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Little boy, do you want your new \Nname to be Spot or Rover?

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: You'll be roving around the land of the \Ndead in no time, so I'll call you Rover!

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Been a while since I flipped my switch on.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: How does it feel as the poison \Nspreads through your body?

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Once I drug him enough, \Nwe'll have a human dog.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: My body is immune to poison.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: If you behave, I'll kill you fast.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: It just means that I was weaker.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: She let that cheap act fool her.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: What is this power flowing from his body?

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Any closer, and I'll suffer considerable damage.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: If I don't attack, Yunju will kill me!

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: The source of his power is his fist!

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: He's preparing to launch an attack many...

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: No, dozens of times stronger than the last.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Or will he fake the punch and use a kick?

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: No, he's definitely going to use his fist.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: I'll sacrifice my eight left \Nlegs to block his punch, while using the right eight to grab him.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Then I can bite him and inject my venom!

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: No matter how strong it is, if I'm prepared, I can take it!

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Hey, we should get started soon.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: You don't have a choice in the matter.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: A king needs no reason to be in his castle.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: There are many drugs here \Nthat emit strong odors.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: I would expect you to avoid this place.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Shut up... I like this place!

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: What happened to the head of NGL?

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: He's probably inside the Queen's belly.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: I'm going to build my own kingdom starting here.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Then I'll take control of the whole world.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: That will be impossible for a \Nboor who amuses himself by making dogs of humans.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: I can't wait to strip you down and \Nput a collar around your neck!

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: You only summon me when you're in trouble.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: I don't have time for small talk.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Forget about turning you into a dog!

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: I have no bad spins, bastard!

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: I'll pretend to attack, while I block his punch.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Then I grab him and bite.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: I can pretend I've been defeated, then wait for an opening to bite him!

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: You can't relax after dismembering them.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: The head and body can survive an entire day after they've been separated.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: And preferably, you'll kill \Nthem quickly and quietly.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: I got a slot machine in my mouth!

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Each number summons a different weapon.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: If it uses a slot machine, doesn't that mean you can't \Nchoose your weapon?

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Yes, and I cannot change or get rid of the \Nweapon I receive until I use it.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Why did you come up with this power?

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: We've lost the signal from Yunju's team.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: The signal indicated three enemies, and that they looked tastier than the others.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: And we have cause to fight.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Isn't Yunju using that factory as a base?

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: So the rare humans should \Nstill be near the factory.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Both of your powers are much \Neasier to use than mine.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Compared to that thing of yours? No kidding.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Gon, you appear to have incorporated \NEnhancer, Transmuter, and Emitter abilities into your Rock-Paper-Scissors.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Yep, but my natural affinity \Nlies with Enhancer abilities.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Killua used lightning. \NAre you a Transmuter?

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Yeah, but it's not that strong, \Nand I lose energy fast.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: You'll have the chance to improve.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: I can feel power rushing into me.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: My body is overflowing with energy!

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: A signal from one of my soldiers.

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Can you see that light, Peggy?

Title: Kite x And x Slots.
Line: Next time: Inspiration x To x Evolve.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: Been a while since I flipped my switch on.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: The Hunters Association has learned of the Chimera Ants \Nfrom the biological survey team, and now awaits the world leaders' \Ndecision on how to handle them.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: The immediate extermination \Nof these dangerous creatures.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: There have already been many casualties.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: We will use any means necessary.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: Naturally, we have no intention of \Ntelling the experts how to proceed.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: We simply desire those dangerous creatures \Neradicated as swiftly as possible.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: So their goal is to eradicate the Ants, \Nleaving the Hunters Association to take the blame.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: Th-The Chimera Ants have five ranks, w-with the Queen at the top.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: Under her is the Royal Guard,

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: Squadron Leaders and then, the Squadron Leaders.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: Under the Squadron Leaders are Captains, and they oversee many foot \Nsoldiers and other grunts.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: A-And once the King is born, \Nthe hierarchy shifts like so.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: The Royal Guard that followed the Queen switches into the King's service.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: A-Afterwards, Squadron Leaders \Nreport directly to the Queen, and she focuses on directing the soldiers.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: The Queen remains in the castle, \Nperiodically giving birth to Kings.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: The Kings travel and mate \Nwith different organisms, so as to breed new Queens.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: That explains their fast reproduction rate.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: To prevent a Chimera Ant population explosion, you must defeat the Queen before \Nshe can give birth to a King.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: But first, you need to defeat \Nall the soldiers guarding her.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: The punitive force's first wave is on its way.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: They'll be facing those vicious Chimera Ants.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: I'm worried about Kite and the kids.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: Why does Rammot have so much life energy?

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: There must have been some catalyst.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: What if their attacks were the catalyst?

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: I can feel the power filling me!

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: I told you that we are capable \Nof anything that humans are.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: Including the use of this strange power?

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: Rammot, while you have that power, hit me.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: You've been ticking me off, \Nso I won't go easy on you.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: I'm assuming that's what it takes.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: This is a message from Hagya.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: This is a message from Hagya.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: The ultimate prey is either \Nwithin the factory or nearby.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: Do you believe they will succeed?

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: There are enough Captains for a decent fight.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: But I doubt they'll be much help.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: They're just buying time for us to arrive.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: Then the rare humans will be ours to take.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: As for our targets, you have three choices.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: Decide the order in which you will fight.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: Three, give up and let us capture you.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: If you choose option one, you will fight one-on-one battles with us for a chance to survive.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: I don't recommend the second option.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: You'll anger us, resulting in a brutal capture and prolonged suffering for all of you.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: Option three is out of the question.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: That would anger us even more than option two.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: We couldn't have asked for a better deal.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: We'll start with whoever is prepared to fight.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: While the Ants have inherited \Nindividualism from humans, they've lost the unity that's \Ncharacteristic of ants.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: I hope we'll be able to take advantage of that change.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: Well, we need to decide who \Nto send from our side.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: How will the victor be decided?

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: If you lose, we'll feed you to the Queen.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: If you don't defeat me, \Nyou're guaranteed to die!

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: But there's no need for you to die.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: If I beat you, I won't want to eat you.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: But if you lose, you must promise never to eat another human.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: This guy isn't taking us seriously!

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: He has more pep than any human I've seen!

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: You managed to dodge that one.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: By this point, the rest were vomiting organs.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: Just need a few more times.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: There's no way to dodge my homing roll!

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: He only has to alter his course to \Nmatch the direction Gon dodges.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: Kid, I have something to \Ntell you before I kill you.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: The main reason we kill humans isn't to eat them or to feed them to the Queen.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: I love the sound as humans \Nvomit their own organs with a plop!

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: It's hilarious because it looks like barf.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: I'll make you vomit your own \Norgans with a plop, too!

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: Compared to Razor's spikes, this is nothing!

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: You won't be smiling for long.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: I'm about to show you hell.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: I'm nothing like the trash over there.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: Huh? I said trash because he's trash.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: I'm ten times stronger than that guy.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: Oh, that's nothing to brag about.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: When they enter battle, \Ntheir aura becomes much stronger.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: They're at their best in battle.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: Gon tends to have an agitatingly slow start, but we should have time.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: We'll reach the Queen before \Nshe gives birth to the King.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: But why do I have such a bad feeling?

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: I feel like I'm missing something.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: There's a gnawing anxiety that won't go away.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: I can freely control this energy!

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: If we learn the proper way \Nto wield this power, we can synchronize it with our natural abilities to make it an even stronger weapon.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: She said she captured a rare \Nhuman a few days ago...

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: If we're lucky, he's still in the storeroom.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: My entire body is covered by hardened skin.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: I can take as many of those \Nattacks as you can throw!

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: Is there anyone ten times \Nstronger than this guy?

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: Their Captains can be dispatched easily enough.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: This scythe can be used \Nonly with this technique.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: And it won't disappear until I've used it.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: So why did you choose that power?

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: As I mentioned, that won't be \Nenough to kill them immediately.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: It's only getting worse from here.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: If you start to sympathize with the enemy, \Nyou won't be able to handle what's coming.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: I have no sympathy for bugs \Nthat call each other trash.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: What would you do if one of those \Nbugs cared for its comrades?

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: Kite, Gon, and Killua head toward \Nthe Chimera Ant Queen's castle to prevent the King's birth.

Title: Inspiration x To x Evolve.
Line: Next time: A x Fated x Awakening.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: I feel like I'm missing something.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: There's a gnawing anxiety that won't go away.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: Kite, Gon, and Killua have \Ntaken care of Hagya's soldiers.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: As they head deeper into NGL in \Nsearch of the Chimera Ants' nest, within the Queen's castle, one of the soon-to-be-born \NKing's three Royal Guards is about to awaken.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: What kind of magic did they use?

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: Wow, all of them were split cleanly in half.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: This one almost looks like he was smashed \Nby a rock, or some other hard object.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: And Baro's the one with an iron shell.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: So this is the rare humans' power.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: The king of the jungle's blood \Nruns through my veins.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: A few humans can't scare me.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: I thought I was gonna miss out on tonight's feast.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: These must be extremely rare humans.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: We'll tear them to shreds and gobble them down!

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: There's quite a number of them.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: Your job is to distract the enemy, \Nwhile attacking from a distance.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: The 2nd Platoon will take the right, as the 3rd Platoon pincers \Nthem from the left.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: My 1st Platoon will trap them, \Npreventing a rear retreat.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: Gon and I didn't notice them.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: They're coming from the left and the right.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: The trees are getting in the way.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: Shouldn't we get out of the forest?

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: Hagya-sama, all goes according to plan.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: Once we drive our prey into range, one strike with my fangs will finish them.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: You ordered Flutter to chase the prey, while you hid in the grass to ambush them.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: Aren't you the king of the jungle?

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: A king should face his prey, rather than hiding.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: Just jump out and go, \N"Roar! Chomp! Ga ha ha ha!"

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: This is how the king of the jungle hunts.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: Well, I don't care, so long as I \Nget to eat the rare humans.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: It was captured and brought \Nin by Zazan's squadron.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: Doesn't mean a thing to me.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: It was probably given to the Queen.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: Her appetite is even more insatiable these days.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: She'll give birth to an incredible king.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: It must already be inside the Queen's belly.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: Any creature poisoned by our nerve toxin will be paralyzed for at least a month.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: After a mere three days, it couldn't move around.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: You can't be sure when it \Nconcerns the rare ones.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: You should know that very well.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: I'm not the same creature I was before.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: The next time I see them,

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: I'll crush them, rip them apart, and eat them.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: The antidote I hid in my \Nback tooth came in handy.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: But I could barely drag myself across the ground.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: For the time being, I'll have to hide here...

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: How can a Chimera Ant use{\i0

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: Come on, give me a break...

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: I'm busy enough as it is.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: Didn't you hear me say the Queen \Nhas a huge appetite now?

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: I am well aware of that.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: I don't know anything about this "rare" stuff, but why are you so obsessed with this human?

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: I'd like to ask it a few questions.

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: Can't you see the light surrounding his body?

Title: A x Fated x Awakening.
Line: No, I don't see a thing.

Line: You must make the correct decision, \Nand find the will to follow through!

Line: Don't bother me with reports \NI don't need to hear!

Line: I don't know which nation sent you.

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: But having entered this palace, you must now die painful deaths.

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: I needn't even strain my eyes to sense it.

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: This is the flavor I sought!

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: I feel it! I feel it!

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: I can feel power surging through my body!

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: He can take aura from rare humans he consumes.

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: In other words, the more he eats, the stronger he will grow.

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: Do you know who I am?

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: A supreme leader of this era, a king among kings...

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: Why does that scum claim to be the king?

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: In the human world, it is a common phenomenon.

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: Humans without intelligence or talent end up in positions of power due \Nto bloodline or connections.

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: In the hands of an incompetent, \Npower brings nothing but ruin.

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: This could only be the work of imbeciles.

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: However, they serve as quality meat, and they are a self-renewing resource.

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: They are an easy food source.

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: The non-rare humans can be \Nused to feed our soldiers.

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: I shall use my godly power \Nto deal divine punishment!

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: Allow me to dispose of this.

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: I can use it to control other humans.

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: Think as hard as those weak \Nbrains of yours can manage.

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: Have you ever spared a pig or a cow as it begged for its life?

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: And there is plenty of space.

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: I dub this place the Meat Plantation.

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: It will be used for processing humans.

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: After being defeated by Knuckle \Nand Shoot, Gon and Killua return to the inn where Palm waits.

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: I have to protect Gon from Palm.

Line: But there's no point in having you \Nswallow a thousand needles.

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: You must... do any one thing I say.

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: Right now, do you know how Gon feels‚Äî

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: Do you have any idea what you're doing?!

Line: Yeah, but I did say I'd do anything.

Line: This is something the two \Nof us must decide alone.

Line: There's somewhere I really want to go.

Line: Oh, sorry. I can't go out today.

Line: Then, why is he tagging along?

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: We can have a proper date later.

Line: And I need time to prepare for it, too.

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: You get to find out tomorrow.

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: If you'd explained first, \NI wouldn't have been so angry.

Line: But I wanted to keep it secret, to surprise you!

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: Let's meet tomorrow, at 10 AM, \Nin front of the bulletin board.

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: Well, listening to you talk to Palm, \Nyou seemed used to this stuff.

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: Have you been on a date before?

Line: Well, most of them were with Mito-san.

Line: Oh, some of the fishing boats that stopped at Whale Island were full of women, some of whom only liked younger men...

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: So I took them around the village \Nand had them teach me things.

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: Women like that were called fanatics.

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: Haven't you ever been on a date, Killua?

Title: Date x With x Palm.
Line: I spent all my time training as an assassin.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.

Line: Just as a warning, I'm not \Nusing my full strength.

Line: I can run faster and throw harder punches.

Line: He's actually aiming for my face.

Line: He's clearly ascertaining where \NI'm going to be before he attacks.

Line: It's only been a minute since I encountered them.

Line: They've adapted to my speed that quickly?

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: They're nothing like the guys from yesterday.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: It makes this more of a challenge!

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Your bodies can't keep up with your minds...

Line: Where did this stuff come from?

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: This must be some kind of special power.

Line: You can retreat if you want.

Line: Well, let's see what they can do...

Line: This trick won't work on the same \Nopponent too many times.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: But it only needs to once.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: I'll admit that you caught me off-guard, but you didn't do any damage.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Your anger is blinding you \Nto your surroundings...

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: It'll be super easy to send you tumbling.

Line: It doesn't matter what your power does.

Line: Well, we're dealing with \Na level-one soldier ant.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: With APR on him, we can easily track him.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: We just need to chase him down, \N box him in, and that'll be the end.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: But doesn't your ability lose its effect \Nif the target moves too far away?
