Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Once I'm back in range, \Nthe counter will start up again.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: But even if IRS doesn't kick in, \Nhe'll be easy to finish off.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: We may know what pitch he'll use, but we still can't put the bat on the ball.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: I'm more concerned about Gon and Killua...

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: I need more than just speed here.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: He is no longer the person you once knew.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: We'll find a way to cure him!

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Once I've dealt an enemy a \Ncertain amount of damage,

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: I'm able to trap an entire body or merely a single part inside.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: This must be how he took my eye.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: If I release him from the cage, \Nhe'll return to his original size.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Most likely, they used him to train soldiers.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: It's been a while... since you punched me.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: You're going to let this beating continue?

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Maybe he already has, and is still...

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: He's suppressing his reflexes to dodge or block, allowing himself to be hit.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Kite's attacks may be robotic \Nand easy to anticipate.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: But Gon shouldn't be able to adapt \Nso quickly in his current state!

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: I'm sure he doesn't know what else to do.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: This is the reality we've created \Nthat we must now face.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: He really does fight like a robot.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: It's our fault you're like this...

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Gon can't see that thing, but it activates when anyone touches Kite.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: You must be highly skilled at \Ncombat to clear this test.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Nen{\i0 so that belongs to whoever's controlling him.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: If you touch him again, he'll attack.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: We had no choice, but I'm still sorry.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: If you stay away, he won't attack.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: I'll get you back to normal soon.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: I knew something was different when I saw you.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: What did you guys do in the \Nshort time since I saw you last?

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Are you sure we should let them come along?

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: We'll be breaking our promise to the old man.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: I see no problem with that.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: The test was to determine \Nwho would enter NGL...

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: And we are headed to the \NRepublic of East Gorteau.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Sounds like a technicality to me.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Then you think we shouldn't bring them with us?

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: They can take care of themselves.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: I would agree that Killua is capable, but what about Gon?

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: At the very end, I was impressed \Nby the way he moved.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: But he hasn't shown any fire since.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: And he clearly isn't focused during training.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: I believe his performance is quite inconsistent.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: He only gets serious when he absolutely must.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: I think his lack of drive these past few \Nweeks will actually give him a boost.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: He's been saving up all that energy...

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: To unleash when he finds his hated foe.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: And the enemy is before us!

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Near the Republic of East Gorteau Border

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: What is the agenda behind \Nthe sudden flurry of activity recently observed in East Gorteau?

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Supreme Leader Diego has personally invited all citizens to gather in the capital city,

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Peijing, to celebrate the \Nnation's birth in ten days.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Yes, there have been occasions \Nin the past during which all citizens were invited to participate.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: However, we've never seen \Nanything on this scale, where practically every citizen, from babies to the ill, has been summoned \Nfor a celebration spanning three days.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: The logical conclusion would be that \Nthe goal this time is different.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: What do you believe the goal to be?

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Well, it would send a powerful message if he were to announce his successor \Nand abdication simultaneously.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: But I find it hard to imagine the Supreme \NLeader relinquishing his power.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: It may also be meant to distract \Nfrom some other matter.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: In any event, the whole world will be \Nwatching East Gorteau in ten days.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Colt believes the celebration \Nwill be used as a screening.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Nen{\i0 but ninety-nine percent of \Nthe humans there will die.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: We must stop it before that happens!

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Our time limit is ten days.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: What's the old man up to?

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: He sent an e-mail saying that he's \Nalready inside East Gorteau, but I haven't heard from him since.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Do you think he's been taken out?

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: If he fails to contact us today, we've been told to assume as much.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Speak of the devil, it's the Chairman.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: That old man's got some sharp ears...

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Including the fact that you boys are here.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: And that Morel-san is badmouthing him.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Divide into three pairs and draw the \NRoyal Guard away from the King.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: The night before the celebration, \Nthe operation will begin at midnight.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: I'm sorry to say that your thirty days are up.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Sorry, but I'm still not convinced \Nwe should keep you around.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Attack me as if I were responsible for Kite.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: If your attack is too weak, we'll replace \Nyou with another Hunter.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Seriously, the master can be so difficult.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: He already agreed to bring Gon along...

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: You want me to attack you for real?

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: If you hold back in the slightest, \Nyou're off the team!

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: I was really about to kill you!

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: You got me... You got me good.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: You go crazy with the best of them.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Use whatever means you deem \Nbest to fulfill your mission.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Gon and Killua, as you requested, \Nyou're assigned to Neferpitou.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Knuckle and Shoot, you're on the \None called Menthuthuyoupi.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Knov and I will take Shaiapouf.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: The preparations for the final \Nbattles are complete.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Ten days remain until that moment.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Next time: A x Lawless x Home.

Title: Grudge x And x Dread.
Line: Wanna see what being controlled is like?

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Next is the continuation of \Nour report on the UMAs, or Unidentified Mysterious Animals, \Nthat have recently been sighted.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: The difference between this and our previous \Nreport is the increasing number of victims, and the amount of evidence supporting \Nthe existence of these creatures.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: In any case, many of the witnesses are \Nactive members of the police force.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: And over half of the officers who have rushed to the scenes have \Nbeen killed by these creatures.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: These are images of unidentified creatures \Nthat have been attacking the police.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: You can see the victims on the \Nground at the creatures' feet.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: What we know is that all these creatures \Nare violent, capable of speech, and show no fear of humans.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: A prime example is this interview \Nwith the lion man of Nevaska.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: He spoke at length of a crude theory \Nabout the existence of a kingdom.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: The woman interviewing him listened \Npatiently to what he had to say, but eventually, she asked the \Nquestion on every viewer's mind.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Can you prove that you \Ntruly are what you claim?

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: So far, the unidentified creatures have only appeared on the Yorbian continent.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: But it seems likely that they \Nwill continue to spread, and no effective method of dealing \Nwith them has been found.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: They became that way after mixing with humans.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Working backwards from the dates and \Nlocations of sightings and police reports, they probably originated in the Balsa Islands.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Lots of strange nations are in that area.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: You shouldn't be talking about \Nhow strange other people are.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: So they should just stay close to their nest.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Why come all the way out here?

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Maybe they were just wandering, or perhaps \Nthey were drawn to the smell of garbage.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Both NGL and East Gorteau are nations that share no information with the outside world.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: That makes it easier for them to invade.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: It's been quite a long time.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Between the victims and martyrs, \Nwe're seeing over three hundred dead.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Bombs have no effect, so we can't fight back.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: The council is still arguing about \Nhow to classify the dead.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: A few days ago, this was an ordinary human.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Some are alive and working with the Ants.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: And all of them look like monsters.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: The council's debate is whether \Nto declare them dead based on whether or not there's a way to \Nrestore them to their original forms.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: They can't avenge them because they're too busy arguing over \Nwhether they're dead or mutated?

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: They always lose sight of what's important.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: We're going to do things our way.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: If anyone interferes, we'll take them down.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Before the day is out, we'll exterminate this so-called Queen.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Those who resist will be executed.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: The chosen will live in paradise for eternity!

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Our mother's greatest flaw was that she could only produce soldiers through the archaic and inefficient laying of eggs.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Her sole achievement was giving birth to me.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Swear eternal fealty to the Queen.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: With my Queen Shot, I shall control the world.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Let's go through the front door.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Of course... It's a race to see \Nwho'll kill the Queen.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: I imagine you'd prefer to hide \Nyour abilities from us.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: If you kill the Queen, you're the interim boss.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: From their footsteps, I can sense \Nthat these intruders are special.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: They are accustomed to living in the wild.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: But then, no one will be here to guard you.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: If you're worried about me, capture the enemy and hurry back.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: I have faith in you, Pike.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: I will serve you with my life!

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: My mother's greatest misfortune was that she never experienced \Nthe joy of combat.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Bonolenov descended from a small tribe \Nthat industrialization had driven out of its ancestral lands, the Gyudondond.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: When Gyudondond males reach the age of three, needles are used to puncture holes in their body.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Depending on the holes' size and shape, and the movements the Gyudondond \Nmake, they can produce sound.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Before fighting rival tribes or wild animals, they would play a battle song using \Ntheir own bodies as instruments.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: They are known as the Bapu, dancing warriors.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: They believe the more beautiful the sound produced, the stronger \Nthe spirit that descends.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: The most skilled Bapu are treated as gods, and hold more influence than the elders.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Transform this melody into strength to fight!

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: The blood of my tribe, the most beautiful in battle, \Nflows through my veins.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: I swear on the names of the spirits and my tribe that you will not best me.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Was that attack supposed \Nto hold your tribe's pride?

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: You must not feel much pride.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: They are but a beast's ramblings.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: In a one-on-one fight, my opponent's \Nstrength doesn't matter.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: If I can pierce it with this, I'll win.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: But I'm not certain I can pierce that...

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: I'll need to slip in between them and insert the antenna into the joint \Nexposed when he moves the arm.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: I can tell because, once you placed \Nthat antenna in Pell, you relaxed.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: That must be the condition \Nfor activating your power.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: You let your guard down \Nwhen you thought it worked.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: You must also be a Manipulator.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: If my power doesn't activate after \Nthe condition has been met,

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: That, and he has a remote controller.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Yes, it's first come, first served for Manipulators.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Once I take you to the Queen, my job is done.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: I'd rather not have to use this...

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Your punch stings about as \Nmuch as a mosquito bite.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: As a gift to you on your way to the afterlife, \NI'll grant you one more attack.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: For an ant, you know some big words.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Then I'll take you up on that...

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: I get a free attack, right?

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Every time I wind my arm, my punch gets stronger.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Oh, half of that would have been enough.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: I never seem to know how much power to use.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: What's going to happen to me?

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: You'll work for the Queen until you die.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Not too different from your current life.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: I'd just be taking orders from a different person.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: But I'd rather die than listen \Nto someone I don't even like.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Well, at this point, all you \Ncan move is your mouth.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: I can move both hands and my left leg.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Anyway, ready for me to take control?

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Once I put this in you...

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: When I fight, I always carry two antennae.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: For just this kind of situation.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Aim for his leg! Remove the antenna!

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: I'll be down with muscle aches \Nfor two or three days.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: That's why I hate using this!

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: It makes me stronger, but there's a hefty price.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: And I remember nothing that happened, so I don't feel like I've accomplished anything.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: You have considerable power for a lady.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Where was she hiding that vacuum cleaner?

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: If I get caught in it, I won't be able to escape.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: You have no manners, brat.\NThis warrants a hefty punishment.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: They are but a beast's ramblings.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Then I'll take you up on that.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: When I fight, I always carry two antennae.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: It sounds like Feitan found the Queen...

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: How do I kill her first?

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Hey, little girl, come over here.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: I'm in a hurry right now.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: What? You think that means something?

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: You really are a stupid kid!

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: This rope is made of steel!

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: My fan is made of paper.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: You like hiding things on you, little boy?

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: When an opponent wears baggy clothing, it's safe to assume they're hiding something.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Are you not going to continue your attack?

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: That is the only way to stop my performance.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: If I get Pike to use his thread \Nto tangle up this guy, he can't make any sound!

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Next time, I'll rip you apart!

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: But not as fast as the speed of sound.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: An appropriate death for a bug.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: The Phantom Troupe fight to save their home,

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Meteor City, from the Chimera Ants.

Title: A x Lawless x Home.
Line: Next time: Carnage x And x Devastation.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: They can't avenge them because they're too busy arguing over \Nwhether they're dead or mutated?

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: They always lose sight of what's important.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: We're going to do things our way.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: If anyone interferes, we'll take them down.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: The Chimera Ant Zazan has \Nbuilt her nest in Meteor City.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: Calling herself the Queen, \Nshe seeks to conquer the world.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: The ones who have risen to quell her \Nambitions are inhabitants of this city...

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: Rather than obliterating my opponent, \NI should have enjoyed myself...

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: I should break my habit of beating my targets to a pulp.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: Looks like I've lost my touch.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: But this is a perfect opportunity to practice.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: He's fast, and has twice as many limbs.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: I need to create an opening.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: The moment I think I'm rid of it, she pulls that vacuum cleaner \Nout of nowhere again.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: Her power lets her pull out \Nand store objects at will?

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: And I can't catch her with my sticky webs.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: This girl is good, but I can't let her get away.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: This technique is a literal pain in the ass.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: Uh-oh, there may be no way out of this one...

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: If I keep the webs coming, you can't escape...

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: Even Bihorn-sama, strongest among us, \Ncouldn't snap these webs.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: I'll hand you over to Zazan-sama.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: She widened an opening in my web to \Nslip through, while protecting her skin.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: She left her vacuum cleaner in the web...

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: But after escaping, she can make it \Ndisappear and call it to her again.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: Now that you've removed your clothes, \Nyou can't use the same trick again!

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: I've learned the range and speed of your webs.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: And I won't mention that his anus \Ntwitches twice before he fires.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: You won't catch me again. \NI'll keep my distance.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: You can't do anything while running away.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: I said that I'll keep my distance, but I didn't say anything about running.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: Suck every last drop of blood from his body.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: I have to stop the blood loss!

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: You're bleeding from twenty-nine different wounds.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: Based on currently available information, it's impossible for you to cover \Neach wound with your eight limbs...

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: Not without another ace in the hole.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: Ah, you know those webs \Nyou were shooting out?

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: By covering your body with them, \Ncouldn't you have stopped the bleeding?

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: How can they move so fast?

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: Looks like he's moving a little better now.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: He has a ways to go before \Nhe's back to full strength.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: They were already here, enjoying the show.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: I wasted some time fooling around, \Nbut I was by no means slow...

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: And how can he leap from \Nthat position while attacki‚Äî

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: I got caught in my opponent's webs.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: He isn't back to full strength yet...

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: We know! You already said that!

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: And more of his buddies keep showing up.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: I didn't think your skin would be so tough.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: How dare you damage my face?!

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: I'm not nice enough to overlook that.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: No, she sent a little aura with that swing.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: After focusing his aura into one point, \Nhe didn't expect to deal no damage.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: In other words, he was basically defenseless.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: A puny Emitter attack could \Nhave dealt serious damage.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: She knows how to use her aura.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: She has good reason to call herself Queen.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: If he loses, the next person gets to try.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: We both arrived at the same time.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: Fool, I was waiting until you finished your fight.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: Now, now... We'll flip a coin to decide.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: Then if Feitan's defeated, I go next.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: I thought I could become \Nnumber two in no time.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: I'm used to toughing it out.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: All for the sake of retrieving my brother, \Nno matter how long it takes.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: You're gonna get caught in it.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: When he snaps, he'll hit \Neverything around him!

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: We tried to watch him once \Nbefore and almost died.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: His power has a huge range, and activates with his anger, \Nso it knows no restraint.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: If you get caught up in the \None he's using this time, you're dead, Kalluto.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: When did he put that on?!

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: Wait... More importantly, \Nhe's much stronger now!

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: "Make use of that tough body you're so proud of."

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: And the heat wasn't that strong...

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: You could have had a quicker death \Nif you'd dealt me more damage.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: Well, you only have yourself to blame.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: They didn't revert after the Queen's death...

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: But they're no longer under the Queen's control.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: You were living in this place, right?!

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: Have the guts to defend it to the end!

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: You can die with a bang!

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: Now those geezers are arguing over whether to exact \Nrevenge upon the real queen.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: Man, I'm sick of those idiots.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: All they do is sit around a table, \Nsquawking about doing the impossible.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: But you're still sticking around, right?

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: There's nothing else for me to do.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: If more Ants show up, \NI'll wipe them out at once.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: So I don't have to do any more cleanup.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: He's asking if we'll help with his job.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: Phinks, you sound like some girl with a crush.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: The Phantom Troupe has saved Meteor \NCity from the Chimera Ant invasion.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: Gon and Killua are preparing to \Ninfiltrate the Republic of East Gorteau.

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: The selection of citizens to present \Nto the King by his own guards...

Title: Carnage x And x Devastation.
Line: Next time: Infiltration x And x Selection.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: To become kings, the Chimera Ants \Nhave spread across the world, committing acts of utmost \Ntyranny wherever they go.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Fearing the damage will spread, the government asks the Hunter \NAssociation to exterminate them.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Finally, the Hunter Association makes its move.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: But the question is how to get \Nclose enough to the enemy.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: And we can't let just anyone see us, either.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: This country has a powerful \Ninformation regulation system that operates in secret using groups of informants.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Yeah, if you discover an enemy spy, \Nyou receive a reward.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: If you find evidence of insurgency, \Nyou receive a reward.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: If you stop someone from fleeing the \Ncountry, you receive a reward.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: So the people will do anything for that reward.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: And they aren't just after money.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: After racking up enough informant points, \Nthe entire group is promoted.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: But if someone provides false information \Nor a member commits a crime, the entire group is punished.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Family members are put in different groups.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: So if an entire group tries to escape, the other family members can be \Nexecuted or imprisoned for life.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: If a family is caught trying to escape together, \Nthey'll be executed, no questions asked.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: For this country's elite to live the good life, the rest of its citizens must scrape by.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: But the media also spreads lies. \NSuch as that, in other countries, half the population starves by age ten.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Foreign aid never reaches the needy.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Instead, it's spent on cars, jewels, and missiles.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: It's even said that East Gorteau spends \Ngrant money developing nuclear weapons that become bargaining chips in negotiations \Nfor unprecedented foreign aid increases.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: But you sure know a lot about it.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: And he probably heard it from Grandpa.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Yeah. Long ago, he infiltrated \Nthe country for a job.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: And I've seen similar information \Non Hunter websites.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: The system is likely still in use.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Knowing what kinds of clothes they wear or \Nhow to identify someone's rank will help.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: They may have certain practices to root out spies.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: The more data we have, the better.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Maybe everyone already left for Peijing?

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: And someone's trying to hide it.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: They didn't dig deep enough, \Nso wild dogs got to the bodies.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: I'd imagine the entire village is buried here.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: This is the true purpose of \Nthe national celebration.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: It's a pretense for entire populations of towns \Nand cities to vanish without raising suspicion.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: In hindsight, it would be tough to summon all citizens to \Nthe capital and make the selection so quickly.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: This nation has a population \Nof around five million.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Clearing out one town or city \Nat a time is more effective.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: In that case, their only concern would \Nbe coworkers or family members raising a fuss over the missing.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: But with the pretext of the national celebration, no one will find it strange that \Nthey can't contact someone.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: In this nation, cell phones aren't allowed, so if they believe the other party is traveling, \Nit makes sense that they can't contact them.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: The selection will go very smoothly.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: The capital city, Peijing, is in the southeast corner.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: They only need to attack the farthest\Ntowns first and work their way east.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: If each town is told that the government \Nwill assign its people a time to depart, there won't be any problems regarding \Ncommunication between towns.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: So, by preventing people from meeting \Nbetween towns to travel together, they eliminate any cause for commotion.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: That means they have to run around the nation \Nto attack all five million citizens.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: If one percent survives, that gives \Nthem fifty thousand soldiers.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: There are ten... No, nine days left.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: If you wanted to check five \Nmillion people in that time, you'd need a lot of help.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Nen{\i0 can check ten thousand citizens in ten days...

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: I agree, but it probably isn't that hard.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: The power that Chimera Ant used...

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: I'm guessing it can be used \Nto automate victims or, like Genthru's power, can probably be \Nused to control multiple people at once.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Ordinary humans have aura as well, so the manipulator could force a \Nvictim's aura to concentrate in his fist.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: One punch alone could create \Nan army of fifty thousand.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: While leaving four million, nine hundred \Nand fifty thousand dead in the process.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Well, it isn't all bad news.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: If my theory is correct, causing a commotion to stop their \Nselection will be simple.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: We merely have to pop up, take out whoever is being controlled, \Nand cause a panic.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Then we just encourage the people who escape to \Ncheck on other towns nearby.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Nen{\i0 taking them down will be a cinch.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: We'll just run around, taking them down \None after another, and wreak havoc.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: The problem is that they'll detect us quickly.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Once we make our move, \Nthey'll know we're here.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: If we want to go with the old man's \Nplan, we should stay hidden.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: If the selection has already begun, we can't just stand around watching.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: It'll go better if we both‚Äî

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: And no offense, but I work more easily alone.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Promise me you won't make a move!

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Not even if people are killed \Nright before your eyes!

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Our cell phones should still work in this area.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: They aren't citizens of this country.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: I would expect a couple of kids to be spies.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Are they here to hunt down the King?

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: But I don't want to fight them both at once.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: I definitely don't want to fight the \Nsilver-haired one on the left.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Just watching him walk, I can tell he's strong.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: As much potential as a Squadron Leader?

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: I completely concealed my presence, \Nbut he still sensed something?

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: You'll really transport my family \Nand me to another country?

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: We have received official approval, \Nand prepared the necessary documents.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: All that's left is for you to sign the papers.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: However, the condition that you share \Nyour complete knowledge of military affairs in exchange for your freedom is essential.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: As mentioned in the agreement, if you do not keep up your end after signing, we shall both find ourselves in difficult positions.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: All I know about the atrocities \Nthat Diego has committed.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Our lives are on the line, as well.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: You talk like it doesn't concern you.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: The wine you're drinking and \Nthe room you stand in were earned by following that bastard.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: You mean "that we've committed," \Nyou son of a bitch.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: But I get it... We're here on business.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Continue going about your business as normal.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: In two weeks, you and your family \Nwill be relaxing on the beach.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: We're supposed to stand around, \Nwatching as people are killed?

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Want me to put you to sleep, eh?

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: If they're gonna check five \Nmillion citizens in ten days, simple arithmetic says that's \Nfive hundred thousand per day!

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Of which one percent will survive!

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: That means four hundred, ninety-five \Nthousand have already been killed!

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: How can you be so calm?

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Because if we lose our cool, billions could die!

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: If the plan fails, everyone dies.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: If we can't draw the three Royal \NGuards away from the King, not even the Chairman will \Nbe able to defeat the King.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Thus, we cannot let them discover \Nour existence before the time is right.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: If that happens, security around the \NKing will be even further tightened.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: You're telling me to sacrifice five \Nmillion to save the human race?

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: If blaming me consoles you, go ahead.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: But if you don't have a better idea, \Ndon't be too self-righteous.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: We must do only what we can.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: But we must put our lives on the line to do so.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: He was acting a little weird.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Maybe I should have stuck with him?

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: But if I'd followed him, he'd be mad.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: You did well to avoid that.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: I use my strong tail as a spring, \Nto propel me among the trees!

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: In the darkness, following my \Nmovement is impossible!

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Now I'm going to crush you!

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: He seems to have a snake's genes, so he should be able to go ten \Ndays without starving to death.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: But I should continue to observe.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: I already let them find me...

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Why are there soldiers around if the \Nselection is already finished here?

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Maybe there are extra guards \Nbecause we're near the border.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: The Chimera Ants are using \Ndarkness to attack Gon.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: And why is Meleoron following him?

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: Next time: Combination x And x Evolution.

Title: Infiltration x And x Selection.
Line: I have a perfectly ordinary box, \Nwhich has not been touched.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: After Gon parts ways with Killua \Nin order to stop the selection, he finds himself under attack \Nby new Chimera Ants.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: The bat's wings are so loud, \NI can't hear the owl at all!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: My ears can pick up sounds of \Nhigher frequency than other animals'.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: I can hear you stepping on leaves \Nand your clothes rustling.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: All of which tell me exactly where you are!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: The owl uses its feathers to distract me right before the bat attacks...

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: They're using both long- and short-range attacks.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: He has a lot of aura... But it won't help.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: We are unrivaled in the darkness!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: I should approach this the opposite way!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: If the owl is acting in a support role,

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: I should focus on the sound of the bat's wings.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Right after the owl attacks, \Nthe bat will attack!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Bah, he's correctly guessing \Nthe direction of my attacks.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: For a human, his ears are sharp.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: And his aura keeps growing, so my feathers aren't doing any damage.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: The bat uses ultrasonic waves to \Nanticipate the timing of my attack.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Unless I find a way to stop it, I can't win!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: He's probably using his ultimate attack.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: If we can evade it, we've won.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: I can use my ultrasonic waves \Nto see it in advance.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Wait, I'll try getting closer as quietly as I can.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Your wings aren't like the owl's, \Nso I can hear you slice through the air.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Now, show me your ultimate attack.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: I guess a human can only hear so much.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: In that case, I'll make my move...

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Wait until I draw her as near as possible!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: But his punch will take a \Nfew milliseconds to land.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: I have plenty of time to fly away!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: You aren't the only one that can use sound...

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: He used that to deflect my shot?

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: I used my special attack and \Nstill couldn't bring it down!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: There was a sound that made my head spin.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: That stupid kid has a loud voice...

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: But I'm much better at attacking with sound!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: This is the true power of their combination.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: They strike with sound and finish with brawn.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: In the darkness, if I handicap my hearing, \Nmy reaction time will suffer.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: He'll rely on his eyes, ignoring sound?

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: He spit on cloth to make earplugs. Clever...

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Water significantly weakens the power of sound!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: I can locate the owl through its aura.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Of course... They started off as wild animals.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: From birth, they've known \Nto conceal themselves when approaching their prey!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: I can fend off their attacks, \Nbut the ultrasound really hurts.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: If I don't keep up the{\i0 they'll take me down before \NI can even find them!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: In terms of latent aura, \Nthe kid has a clear advantage.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Even after being hit all those times, \Nhe's taken no damage.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: But his level of capability is irrelevant.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Without a strategy, he's just a moving target.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Ah, he thinks that if he's right on top \Nof me, we can't use ultrasound.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: If I use Rock, I can defeat this one.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: But then the bat might run \Nand warn the other Ants!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: To me, a starry night is as bright as day.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: As long as I'm not in total darkness,

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: I can see you without needing \Nto rely on my hearing!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: So if I cover my ears...

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: The kid has shrouded his entire \Nbody in aura to avoid damage.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: But that reduces the strength of his attacks, \Nmaking it impossible to stand against them.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: At this rate, he'll never defeat them...

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Their weakness is that their movements are always in sync!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: They always take positions on opposite sides to avoid both being targeted at once.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: When the owl is in front of me, the bat is directly behind me!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: The real wall was behind me...

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: He turned our teamwork against us?

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: If I only have one opponent, \NI can concentrate on attacking.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Once he pulls off one plan, \Nthings will go his way...

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: But that attack won't be enough \Nto get him anywhere here.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: I made sure to knock you west!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: I see... This is his real ultimate attack.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: I take back what I said.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Brainwashed soldiers are running around, \Nslaughtering entire villages and towns!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: But we all saw the soldiers try to kill everyone.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: There's no time to think about it!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Just leave this village and run, anywhere!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: It was in the southeast this time.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Some of my puppets have been stopped.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Whoever they are, they're keeping \Nlow and unpredictable.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: But they are acting on their own...

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: It is no more than a diversion.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: But it doesn't feel like the purpose is to bait us.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: They're being careful not to let me catch them...

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: It may all be an act to draw you out.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Ah, how I long to indulge myself \Nin the delight of agonizing...

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: It is the sweet trap of the thought process.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Our mission is to protect the King.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: We can let the other Ants handle the rest.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: When we were injured and on the run from the Hunters, you took us in.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: You even gave us instruction on using our power.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: It is time for us to return the favor!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Someone's running around \Nand disabling my puppets.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: I'll give you updates on their location.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: They're the ones trying to earn our trust, so they'll try hard to carry out their mission.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: It's possible that they're looking for an \Nopportunity to stab us in the back.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: In that case, we should treat them accordingly.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: The closest village is at two o'clock.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: The next closest villages are \Nat eight and ten o'clock...

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Should I skip them and head for \NTaba, forty kilometers away?

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: I should have taken matters into my own hands.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: As we speak, Cheetu is racing \Ntoward East Gorteau.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: It seems the Hunters that replaced \Nus failed to capture him.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: No, if he continues on his current \Ncourse, he'll pass far to the south.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: I'm already in a bad mood.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: The Hunter Association has captured three \Nhundred and nineteen Chimera Ants outside of NGL as of yesterday.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: But Colt confirmed that none of \Nthem were Squadron Leaders.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: According to him, there are eight Squadron Leaders left \Nthat would be considered aggressive.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Hunters have encountered four, \Nbut they all got away.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Cheetu is coming to East Gorteau for a reason.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: He must know the King is here.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: He's choosing to return to the King's \Nservice in order to increase his power.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: My ability is still in effect, \Nand I have more raw strength.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: But if we let him slip away and \Nhe gains even more power, there's no telling who will win next time.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: If we allow more Ants like him to join the King, we'll never be able to draw the Royal Guard away.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Are you still gonna try to stop me? Eh?

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: If you are, I'll fight you first.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: If worse comes to worst, \Nhe'll need to replace us.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: This should increase the odds \Nof capturing that Ant.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: I told you to send Riakke!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: He'd have been perfect for this.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: The Chimera Ant we were tracking escaped.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: The review board didn't send \Nthe Hunter we requested!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Some Hunter I've never heard of.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: You mean Hunters who only take jobs \Nthrough the Hunter Association.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: It isn't surprising that they have less talent.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Damn! I should have gone \Nto talk to Riakke myself!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: If you do anything without board approval, the Chairman will get all the grief.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: He had to argue with the executive \Ncommittee just to get the two of us here.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: But they don't understand the situation.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: They base it on past accomplishments \Nand donations to the Association...

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: The review board has always been inflexible.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: How can you be so relaxed?!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: If we underestimate the Squadron \NLeaders, we'll pay dearly for it.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: After all, they listen to their deepest desires.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: So they have the talent to quickly master the abilities they need the most.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: If we let the review board bring self-preservation \Nand formality in, we won't get help in time.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: You refer to the rumors that \Nthe Vice-Chairman's faction controls the review board?

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: That they're only giving work to Hunters who agree to vote for him in the next election?

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: There's no evidence of anything \Nlike that happening.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: You think they're stupid enough to get caught?

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: They've let every Squadron Leader \Nthey've faced escape alive!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: If this expedition fails, \Nthe Chairman will shoulder the blame.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: They're willing to do whatever it \Ntakes to guarantee that result.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: As the Chimera Ants claim more victims, the voices calling for the Chairman's \Nresignation grow louder.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Too bad the voices belong to a bunch \Nof people sitting at their desks!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: If we take out the King and five million \Npeople are already dead, we've failed!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: When he developed this plan, he was \Nwell aware of the consequences.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: He knew how long assuring victory would take, and the resulting casualties...

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Five million is the low end...

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: The phones have been ringing nonstop!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Rumors of a coup d'√©tat are flying around.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: And it's been discovered that mass murders \Nare taking place all over the nation.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: This is no rumor. It's actually happening!

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: The citizens have learned the \Ntruth about the selection?

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Return to the office before anyone suspects you.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Our beloved leader, Diego, has an \Nurgent announcement to make.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: To ensure that our great leader's message \Nwill be heard throughout the nation, we request that relay speakers in all \Nregions be turned to maximum volume.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: All televisions and radios should be on, \Nand the volume raised to maximum.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: I have just declared that East \NGorteau is under martial law.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: This precaution is being taken to combat \Nmalcontents that would foment rebellion.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: I ask all comrades to stay indoors, \Nwith your doors locked.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Anyone outdoors without permission will \Nbe identified as a rebel and punished.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: I ask that you not lend an ear \Nto false rumors being spread, but that you follow my instructions.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: The soldiers of my special forces \Nwill be visiting your residences, to see if any rebels are hiding inside.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Do not open your doors for anyone else.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: It must be Killua and Gon.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: But this must be part of the Chimera Ants' plan.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: They were so well-prepared, \NI can't believe otherwise.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: The citizens learning the truth about \Nthe selection wasn't important.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: In fact, if they did, the military \Nwould have an excuse to mobilize.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: East Gorteau has been placed under martial law, completely isolated from the rest of the world.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: You can bring out tanks and fighter jets.

Title: Combination x And x Evolution.
Line: Next time: Tracking x And x Pursuit.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: Someone's running around \Nand disabling my puppets.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: You can bring out tanks and fighter jets.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: Knuckle and Shoot are on the \Nmove to capture Cheetu as he attempts to return to the King.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: If he continues on it, \Nhe'll pass by in ten minutes.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: Do you think he'll stick to the road?

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: No, he'll notice my presence \Njust before he gets here.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: Because APR will start adding interest again.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: We may be able to attack him \Njust before APR adds interest.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: I Alone Lose When It Reaches the Heavens \NChapter 7 Bankruptcy

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: Knuckle's ability, Chapter 7 Bankruptcy, attaches APR to an enemy.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: Every ten seconds, APR informs the \Nenemy that interest will be added.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: But if the enemy is over a hundred meters \Naway from Knuckle, the interest stops.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: When this happens, the time \Nuntil the next interest payment is remembered by APR.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: Once the enemy is back within \NKnuckle's hundred-meter range,

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: APR picks up where it stopped.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: He's approaching at a speed between \N160 and 180 kilometers per hour.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: If there are still three seconds or more \Nbefore APR adds interest again, there's a good chance we can \Nattack before he notices us.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: At the last second, he suddenly changed direction!

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: Don't bother. We can't catch up.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: Our opponent has a cheetah's speed.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: How did he discover our ambush?

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: The breeze is blowing this way \Nwith no change in direction.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: Ignore them. They aren't the target.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: No point in doing more work than necessary.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: It appears they were trying \Nto ambush Cheetu-sama.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: I warned Cheetu-sama before he ran into their trap.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: He took a detour toward the capital.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: He told me to thank you for the help.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: The target just engaged a squad of \Nsoldiers in the city of Longtong.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: Head north and try to cut it off.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: Looks like even the army can't handle this.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: No... Well, they're only there to buy time.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: They've had to stay in one area \Nfor a longer period of time.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: After all, it's been moving constantly \Nfor over thirty hours.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: Diego has fallen into enemy hands!

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: If you stay in your homes, you'll be killed!

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: Damn... Diego just appeared on TV, \Nlooking alive and well.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: The odds are against me now.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: I'll have to give up my instigation.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: My only option is to take out as many \Npuppets and soldiers as I can!

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: If you want something, show yourself!

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: It might be following me until \Nmore Chimera Ants show up.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: Nah, I was headed this way.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: The King's in this direction, right, Hagya?

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: Yeah, I know. It's Leol now.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: Then you did that on purpose?

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: Flutter's warning was a big help.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: Right now, I'm trying to avoid fights...

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: By the way, what's that thing?

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: A Hunter hit me with it.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: It follows me wherever I run.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: But so far, it doesn't seem to have any effect.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: Want me to get rid of it?

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: Do you want me to get rid of it?

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: The Royal Guard has assigned me a mission.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: He's headed north on the road through \Nthe forest northeast of Longtong.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: Use all your forces to slow him down.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: And you want me to help hunt him?

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: They can be tough to deal with...

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: Of course, so I've planned ahead.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: Shaiapouf-dono has prepared \Na power tailored for you.

Title: Tracking x And x Pursuit.
Line: He will teach you to use it.

Line: The bleeding's stopped anywhere \Nthat the fleas only scratched me.

Line: If I start bleeding in too many \Nplaces, I'll be in trouble.

Line: I can see clearly in every direction.

Line: There's nowhere for you to hide!

Line: If you don't have any water, \Nyou'll die of thirst in a day.

Line: You have business with the King, right?

Line: Really? Aren't you guys here to defeat the King?

Line: When the brother's darts hit the board, \Nthe target is attacked by needlefish.

Line: I will tell Leol-sama that a \Npromotion is in order.

Line: No human has reflexes fast \Nenough to catch a dart!

Line: The final dart must hit the board's \Nouter ring per double out rules.

Line: And you were playing an 01‚Äî501 game.

Line: Players with talent and confidence \Ntend to seek public recognition.

Line: I placed my hand in the 40-point area, my forehead.

Line: To improve his reflexes, Killua changed \Nhis aura into electricity.

Line: Nen{\i0 it sent a message directly to his \Nleft hand, to grab the dart.

Line: Am I... going to die here?

Line: Don't die before we get there!

Line: After you told me, an octopus, \Nthat I was a cool guy...

Line: After you told me, an octopus, \Nthat I was a cool guy...

Line: While Killua was being rescued \Nby the Chimera Ant Ikalgo, his supposed enemy,

Line: Gon, too, was forming a bond with \Na Chimera Ant called Meleoron.

Line: If the smoke sticks to you, people can smell you coming, and it'll \Nwaste your ability to become invisible.

Line: My second ability is Perfect Plan.

Line: When you go to a restaurant in a group, there's always one person that the \Nwaitress forgets to bring water.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: That's what I've been waiting for...

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Right now, I can't tell you \Nwhy I want revenge...

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: I'd like to know, but I'll wait.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: That's probably what he wants to hear...

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: If you're that curious, I'll tell you.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Beg all you want, but I won't tell you now.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: I didn't beg you for anything.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: The King killed someone I owed my life to.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: I saw the King behead him right before my eyes.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: But at the time, I didn't realize \Nwhat had happened.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: You saw it happen, didn't you?

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Because I'd forgotten that Peggy was the one who raised me.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: A little while ago, I began to recover my \Nmemories from when I was human.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: I've only remembered a few things.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: The names of my parents, my name, \Nepisodes from my childhood.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Peggy was the name of the \NChimera Ant the King killed.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: That was also my foster father's human name.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: He was into education, and always \Ncarried thick books around.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: In both life and death, he never \Nparted with his books about NGL.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Then you all have memories \Nfrom when you were human?

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: I don't know if we're all the same.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Some Chimera Ants are clearly feral in nature.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: With others, there's no \Ntelling what they're thinking.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: But I think I understand now.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: This is why, when we first met, \NI was willing to trust you.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: More human than any other \NChimera Ant I've met.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: In fact, I'd say you're still human.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Really? When I met you, \NI had the opposite reaction.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: I could sense a vicious beast inside you.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: That's why I wanted to team up.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: There's no limit to what you'll do.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: All right... Now, let's get down to business.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: But first, could you tell me your name?

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: I actually have one more ability.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: And the condition for its \Nactivation has been met.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Time to show you my third power!

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Does that mean I was using Perfect Plan, too?

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: This is my third power, God's Accomplice.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: While Perfect Plan is active, it allows \Nanyone I touch to use it, as well.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Do you understand how powerful \Nthis technique is now?

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: This power will let us approach \Nand attack the enemy... without their knowledge.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: If we can sneak up and use a powerful \Nattack when his guard is lowered, we'll win.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: You're the partner I've been looking for.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: The perfect guy to smack the King with the strongest attack this world's ever seen!

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: I was watching when you used that rock-paper-scissors thing.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: I sent them to attack, so I could \Nmeasure your strength, but they...

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Ah, no need to feel bad...

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: They were killing for sport when \NI wasn't paying attention.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: They're no longer my soldiers, or even my allies.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Well, from their perspective, \NI'm the one who's changed.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: What you said about being your partner...

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: There's someone who'd be better than me.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: And even if you end up turning on me, \NI won't blame you or regret my decision.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Because I watched you, spoke to you, \Nand decided to trust you.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: But I'm not about to trust others \Njust because you trust them.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: My life is on the line here.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: I can make people ignore my existence, but I'm still right there in the same place.\NThey just don't notice me.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: So their attacks can still hit me.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Knowing there's a person around with \Nmy ability, what would someone do?

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: They'd launch attacks in every direction.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: If one of those attacks hits me, \Neven by dumb luck, I'm done for.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: I hate to admit it, but when it comes to combat, \NI'm the weakest Chimera Ant around.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: I'm on the same level as foot soldiers.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: I couldn't even survive a punch \Nfrom a Squadron Leader.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: It's been tested, so the other \NSquadron Leaders know this, too.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: I need my enemies to believe \Nmy power to be weak.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: This ability is only invincible \Nif no one knows about it.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: My point is that I don't want to \Nreveal my power to any others!

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Not even if it's someone you trust.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: You can see for yourself, then.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: I'll call him out here without mentioning you.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: You can watch from a distance.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: You pulled a fast one! Where are you?

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: I've got lots of questions for you.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Because of you kids, the boss \Nhad to make a move...

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: The plan's been derailed, \Nbut I support what you're doing.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Letting five million die isn't right.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: The boss used his power to surround the capital.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: That should make it harder for Neferpitou \Nto control puppets remotely.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: In other words, they can't perform \Nthe selection from a distance.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: But the boss and Knov-san will be expending \Nall their energy to delay Neferpitou.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Which means, when the operation starts, they won't be in any condition to \Ntake on any of the Royal Guard.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: We expect more citizens to gather \Nin the capital for the celebration.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: There may be a massacre yet.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: We can no longer contact the Chairman.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: He's holed up somewhere until the last \Npossible minute, preparing for the final battle.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: We four need to make a decision.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Do we summon reinforcements, or do we \Nface the three Royal Guards by ourselves?

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: I'd like to know Killua's opinion.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: I get it... He's been disrupting things alone.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Can you call him real quick?

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: No luck. He isn't picking up...

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: We should meet up, the sooner the better.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Let's find a halfway point to meet.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: The match ended twenty-two moves ago.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Why did you not resign then?

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Did you believe I would make a mistake?

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Next, we have the national Go champion.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: It may look simple at first, \Nbut it is a complex game.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: It may take more time to learn than shogi.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: You are in the King's presence.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: I-It only took him ten games?

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: It's the only explanation for that loss!

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: And I think I have a fever.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: I expect you to be in top condition.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Should you lose again, I won't \Nbe interested in excuses.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Rest as if your life depends on it.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: I'm impressed by how quickly \Nyou learn these games.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: I can't believe it took less than half \Nthe time you spent mastering shogi.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: It's all about learning the feel.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: They have different rules, but all three have a certain rhythm to their moves.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: That means disrupting your \Nopponent's rhythm is crucial.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Once you've learned the openings, \Nyou can deduce your opponent's rhythm.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Once you know their rhythm, \Nyou need only disrupt it.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: A psychological principle that \Nwould apply to any contest.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: If you've already reached that conclusion, \NI don't see the benefit of playing more games.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: I believe they will only bore you.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: This country has one more professional game.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: It's a board game called Gungi.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: The game originated in East Gorteau, and nearly all citizens know how to play.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: As in chess and shogi, its goal is to trap the king.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: But you can stack up to three pieces.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: At the start, you may also freely place \Nyour pieces within your own area.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: The game has a different feel due to the addition of a third dimension.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: For the past fifteen years, \Nthere have been world tournaments, and East Gorteau has yet to lose.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Currently, they're on their third representative, \Na five-time reigning champion.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Then, if I defeat this champion, \NI'll be the best in the world?

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: A fitting way to end this recreation.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: There are six days until the selection.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: The King has no idea how this girl is about to influence his fate.

Title: Power x And x Games.
Line: Next time: Check x And x Mate.
