Line: Knov takes this opportunity \Nto infiltrate the palace.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: Still more than one hundred meters \Nto the central stairway.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: These strange trees bear very large fruit.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: Five hundred thousand people were to undergo the selection process each day, \Nwith a one-percent survival rate.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: But thanks to Killua's distractions, \Nthat schedule was only fulfilled on one day, so the numbers add up...

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: These are cocoons holding the \Nhumans who were selected.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: Which means they will become {\i0 turning against the rest of humanity.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: Neferpitou is probably a Manipulator... and intends to manipulate these \Nsoldiers per the King's will, expanding his conquest throughout the world.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: I will not let that happen!

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: First, the far exit... is set.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: I'd imagine only a select few are inside.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: If I've come this far, \NI can reach the inner palace.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: The throne room is on the third \Nfloor, at the rear and center.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: We must delay any reinforcements, \Neven if by only a second.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: The first floor is too far for that.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: The central stairway is beyond this courtyard...

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: To be safe, I'll leave an exit here...

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: No, that would be no different \Nfrom the one outside...

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: It should at least be next to the first floor's central stairway.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: Then, if I can, I'll go up from \Nthere to the second floor...

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: I can't move beyond this point...

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: If I do, I'll be killed.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: It appears to be full of all \Nkinds of misfortune...

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: At this point, I don't fear death.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: What I fear is that, before killing me, the monsters up there will squeeze every drop of information \Nfrom me that I have on the King...

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: If I'm caught, I won't be able to resist...

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: The aura's strength just confirms it...

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: This is as far as I go...

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: Oh, aren't you that lion guy from TV?

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: My name is Leol, and don't forget it.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: I heard that I should expect \Na crayfish and wolf.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: They're dealing with the grunts you created.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: So I can fight you one-on-one.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: This guy's just as strong as Cheetu.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: Right now, allowing Knov to get \Ninto the palace is the priority.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: Until that happens, I need to \Ndivert the enemy's attention.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: Refrigerated trucks are entering \Nthe underground warehouse...

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: If the information Marcos \Nprovided was accurate, living women are also inside.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: Not for the King, but for the \Nlecherous Secretary Bizeff.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: If everything is going as planned,

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: Leave the fourth truck as it is.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: Area D, of the underground warehouse.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: My very own paradise, where no one can interfere.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: From now on, you will work here.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: I've prepared rooms for each of you.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: You will be provided with all necessities.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: In your spare time, you may do as you want.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: As long as you don't attempt to escape.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: Your only job is to follow my orders.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: When summoned, you must drop everything, and come to see me at once.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: The rest of you can wait in your rooms.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: I must find a way out of here, so I can see the King and his Royal Guard.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: Using her crystal ball, Palm can observe the current whereabouts of \Nanyone she has seen previously.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: This power will allow her to keep tabs \Non the King and Royal Guard.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: The Hunters will then be able to determine the optimal route for the operation.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: My mission is crucial for \Nincreasing our chances of defeating the King!

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: What matters most isn't that I succeed...

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: But that, should I fail and be captured, \NI kill myself immediately.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: I managed to place the exits, so even if your mission doesn't succeed, \Nwe can still execute the operation.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: If you get caught, it's over...

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: One look was all it took to break my will...

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: You must have seen that aura...

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: You were probably even closer, \Nactually touching it...

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: How are you still able to face them?

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: How can you bring yourself to fight?

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: Is it to save your friends?

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: If you're caught, it's all over...

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: I won't be able... to go back there...

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: I brought you something cold to drink.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: Your lack of familiarity with the \Narea has sealed your defeat.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: Though it's almost too perfect that, \Nafter all that running, you ended up in an underground church.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: In case of emergency, this place \Nis used as an air shelter.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: An ideal place to die in a vain struggle.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: Well, you'll have to say your own prayers.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: I hear you can mold that \Nsmoke into various objects.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: Knowing that, he still chased me in here?

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: If he believes things are going his way, he won't hesitate to display his abilities.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: I've yet to meet anyone whose power allows them to react more \Nflexibly than Deep Purple.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: I can feel the tension in the air... I love it.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: Both of us waiting to reveal our abilities...

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: It's common sense to defeat an opponent \Nbefore they can use their power.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: But that isn't how men should fight.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: Hey, what are you up to?

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: Voluntarily removing one of your senses?

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: Have you heard of the band Black Planet?

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: Their second album is super cool.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: Listening to the whole thing's \Nlike reading a good book.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: When you finish it, you feel great.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: And best part of all, the medley's \Nexactly sixty minutes long.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: I hate to admit it, but I agree.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: I have a hard time fighting others who share my tastes.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: Next time: Return x And x Retire.

Title: Knov x And x Morel.
Line: It has to be you, Killua!

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Leol has chased Morel into \Nan underground church, where they will now fight one another.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: This ability only activates when it rains.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Well? Aren't my big waves rad?

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I can easily wash away your wimpy smoke!

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: You're having trouble moving \Nin the water, right?

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: You like how easily my board can maneuver?

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: If you stand still, I'll give you a quick death.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Oh, making a boat of smoke?

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: So he can stand on that smoke?

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: You think that's enough to defeat my waves?

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I told you, that's not your ability!

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: This one is my own original...

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I can't tell up from down.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I can't control my body at all...

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I stop my opponent's \Nmovements with a whirlpool.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Then, I finish him with a harpoon from above!

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: My harpoon can match the speed of sound, and pierce a whale at the very bottom \Nof the ocean, even from the sky!

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: The whirlpool should have incapacitated him.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: He had no way to escape.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: When it comes to lung capacity, \Nno one in the world beats me.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: He used his breath as jet propulsion \Nto break out of the whirlpool?

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: In this battle, you don't get a turn!

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: All you get to do is drown in my waves!

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: During this exchange, I've learned three things.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: First, I now know your power.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Somehow, you're able to use \Nother people's abilities.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: And those earphones have nothing to do with your power.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: They're either for show or for luck.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Or it means someone is sending you orders.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: If he meant to impair his hearing \Nto strengthen his power, he shouldn't be able to hear me talk.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: That Inamura ability belongs \Nto a Hunter named Grachan.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: You probably encountered and defeated \Nhim when he was sent to fight the Chimera Ants.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I'll punish you for stealing my buddy's ability!

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I was protecting myself from humans \Nwho were hunting me down.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: And I didn't steal his ability.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I'm just borrowing it for a bit.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Just borrowing it for a bit?

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Well, arguing with you is pointless.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I'd like to get my hands on his ability, but defeating him is more important.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Right now, our top priority \Nis to defeat one another.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I'm sorry, but you don't get a turn!

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: My wall of water's gonna suck you in!

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Just try and find your way to the surface!

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Now, will he make it up?

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Will I smash his skull with my board?

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Launch my harpoon through his gut?

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Either way, if he shows his face above water, he's done.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: No, he was confident about his lung capacity.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: That means he can survive for \Nten or twenty minutes.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: It's just possible that he's able to remain underwater like a whale!

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I'll impale you with my harpoon.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Bubbles on the opposite side, too?

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: It's possible, if he formed his smoke \Ninto a hose with multiple branches.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: That way, he wouldn't give away his position.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Hey! How long are you gonna stay under?

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Do you expect me to give up and drain the water?

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: If his lung capacity is that great, it's possible he could swim out through the maze of \Nunderground corridors leading down here.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I told Welfin and Brovada to stay out of this, \Nso I could take all the credit...

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Is it because my physical and \Nmental stability are compromised?

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: My power stopped working, \Nbut the water hasn't gone away?

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I let him think he had the advantage \Nso I could turn the tables on him.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: But it looks as though the one \Nwho was backed into a corner... was me...

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Am I... Am I gonna die here?

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: So he was using smoke hoses to send air bubbles everywhere.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: But what kind of... poison did he use?

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: That was faster than I expected.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: The poison you've inhaled is lethal.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: But it's something naturally found in air.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Morel used his immense lung capacity to suck in the stagnant air trapped in the church, and exhaled it with an increased \Nconcentration of carbon dioxide.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I started my attack before you ever began.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: If he was telling the truth,

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Grachan should be getting his ability back.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I have a few hours in which to move around.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: During that time, I must see \Nthem with my own eyes!

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I've observed Bizeff's movements \Nwith my crystal ball.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I know how to leave this area.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Even if Bizeff learns I've escaped, he can't tell anyone because \Nhe's kept this area a secret.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: This is an underground clinic for folks \Nwith roots in the underworld.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: You were out for two whole days.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Two days?! I need to get going!

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I have to follow through with the plan...

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: You were just on the verge of death!

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: You need a few days before‚Äî

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Your total bill comes to 1.8 million Jenny.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: If you can't pay, I'll take body parts instead.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I don't have my wallet on me. \NI'll wire it to you when I get back.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I'm not stupid enough to trust \Nthat you'll keep that promise.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Until you find someone to bring \Nthe money, you're staying here.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I don't have time for that!

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Would you just shut up and go away?

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Where are you? Are you okay?

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I'll explain when I see you.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: A strong enemy gave me some trouble.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: This means you're okay now, right?

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: We have a plan that could \Ndefeat the King if it goes well.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: We should meet, so I can hear what you think.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Then, I need you to send money \Nto a certain bank account.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: If you do that, we can rendezvous today.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: You haven't been able to reach her?

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: She's probably still in the palace...

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I imagine she's in the warehouse, \Nbeneath the palace.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: There are about five kilometers \Nof corridors surrounding it.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: But since the exit is in the \Npalace, she can't get out.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Well... he's probably out of this fight.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: But he did manage to place the exits.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: There's no change to our plan.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Okay, I confirmed receipt of the money.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Was I the only one who thought \Nwe were already friends?

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: It's whether you're coming or not.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I'm going! I'm going with you!

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I want to make something clear.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: The next time something like this happens,

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: So if something happens, \Nand I end up helping you, you don't need to thank me.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Friends are supposed to help friends.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: From now on, we'll be working together.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: So we'll be helping each other.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Supporting each other isn't a big deal.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: It'd be lame to thank each other \Nfor every little thing.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: This is the world I wanted.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: The world I longed for and sought...

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: But deep down, I thought \Nit was beyond my reach...

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: That it wasn't meant for me... \NAnd wouldn't happen...

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I'd given up on this world.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I thought it wasn't meant to be...

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I'm so happy, I could die!

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Because you're doing this for me!

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I want to make one more thing clear.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: The world you're stepping into is far more brutal than the world of the Chimera Ants.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: They may seem similar, but there's a huge difference between \Nrisking a life and throwing it away.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: People staring death in the face every day don't want to hear that someone's ready to die.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Only people who maintain a daily \Nregimen to stay in tip-top shape, and can swallow just enough poison to \Nfall short of a lethal dose, get to survive.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Are you ready to join us?

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: How could you know the words I most wanted to hear?

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: I'm going, no matter what it costs me.

Title: Return x And x Retire.
Line: Next time: Gungi x Of x Komugi.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Three days remain until the selection begins.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: In the palace, the King has \Ncompleted his recovery, and continues to play Gungi without rest.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Her mind and body are at their limit.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: I estimate it will only take another \Nmatch or two before the King wins.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: We will resume in a half day.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: If you can barely sit straight, \Nthe victory won't satisfy me.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Even while his arm was being treated, \Nthe King never stopped playing.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: But now he changes his mind?

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: If this continues, she could prove quite troublesome...

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: I must not be too hasty.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: The King chose to retract his decree.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: In order to stay true to his convictions...

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: In order to defeat the Gungi \NChampion at her best...

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: In order to demonstrate his strength!

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: If I kill this girl now, the King will remain a loser at Gungi forever.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Her death will cement her status as someone the King could never defeat!

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: My hasty impulse could have left \Nthe King with a permanent scar!

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: I shall die of my own volition!

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Once I have seen the King conquer the world...

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Using Knov-san's Apartment Complex, \Nseven people will infiltrate the palace.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: During that time, we must draw \Nthe Royal Guard from the King.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Gon, Killua, and Ikalgo will go in first.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: When we suddenly appear \Nin the midst of the palace, their immediate reaction will be...

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: To protect the King with their lives.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: They'll probably use a formation like this.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: And that's where I come in.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Can we do anything to learn \Nwhat's happened to her?

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: She's either dead or in hiding.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: If she'd gotten out, she'd have contacted us.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Since she hasn't, that's the only explanation.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: If she were captured, \Nshe'd have taken her own life.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: When she left, she was prepared for that.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: If we try to check in on her, \Nit would be an insult to her resolve.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: You just came back! Where do you get off?!

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Assuming that Palm was captured alive, it would mean the enemy knows our plan.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Which would make us like moths \Nflying straight into the flame.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: But instead of worrying about worst-case scenarios, what's important is that we trust Palm.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Well, that certainly makes sense, but Gon's point might be that, if Palm has met such a fate, we still \Nhave time to change the plan.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: He'll say that we have to save Palm first.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: But he won't offer any plans for that.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: I know you're worried, but once the operation starts, \Nyou'll have to forget her until we're done.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: If you're distracted for a fraction of a second, that might cause our operation to fail.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: There's still time for Palm to contact us.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Should I have tried to escape to the right?

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: You should have moved your knight.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: I didn't want to let a single piece \Ncontrol the center of the board.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Sometimes, you must accept \Nthe risk and move forward.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Otherwise, you won't ever be \Nable to make me hesitate.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: I am unaccustomed to playing a waiting game.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: I have some sensitive information, \Nso we should step outside.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Two days remain until the National Celebration.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: The number of citizens to process in Peijing \Nhas increased beyond our expectations.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: But the weather forecast is favorable, \Nso the selection should proceed as planned.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: I would like to move up the post-selection schedule.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: That's it? Do as you wish.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: In that case, we will depart \Nimmediately after the selection‚Äî

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: I'm telling you to decide on your own.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Do not return until I summon you.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: So you were chased out, too?

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Well, we only need to wait for the King to win.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: You think that will only be a \Nfew more matches, right?

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Wasn't that what you said a while ago?

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: The King is improving at a remarkable rate.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: I am no longer able to predict the outcome.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Well, it's still only a matter of \Ntime before the King wins.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: I am. There's nothing to worry about.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: I am one hundred percent confident \Nthat he's acting on his own...

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: The reports from Welfin and Brovada confirm it.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: The soldiers under his control \Nare all smoke puppets.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Nen{\i1 they fooled me as effectively as a smokescreen.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: He can't control as many puppets as I can, \Nbut his are more responsive.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: But I can't leave my post.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: It's about time for us to enter Peijing.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: The enemy should have noticed \NMorel's distraction by now.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: We'll make some noise in Peijing to negate their belief that this is all the work of one man.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: At the same time, many citizens will be moving toward the palace.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: If we disappear the day before the celebration, they'll believe assassins are hidden \Namong the citizens, trying to kill the King.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: And their focus will be outside \Nthe palace, on the crowds.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: That's when we enter the palace with \NFour-Dimensional Apartment Complex!

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: The King will definitely be here.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Watching the selection from \Nthe third-floor throne room.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: She continues to attack where \NI'm weak without hesitation.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: As we play, she's getting sharper.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: But it does not pain me.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Because the board dictates my every move.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Which proves that she is still \Nseveral levels above me.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Marvelous moves keep flooding into my mind...

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Then she's only begun to grow.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Could I take a short break?

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: It's the first time she's asked for a break...

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: No, I'd like to return to my room to \Nrecord the moves that are in my mind.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Oh, I'll just move the pieces around the board!

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: When I touch the pieces after they're placed,

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: I will never forget their position.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: She's memorized every placement \Nshe's ever experienced?

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Can you please tell me what your name is?

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: I speak with utmost respect, Your Majesty...

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: You are the King. You have no other name.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: You are the one and only King.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: At the moment, there are impostors \Nusing that name without permission, but we will eliminate them all.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: So that the entire world will \Nknow there is only one King.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: That assumes the others can be eliminated.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: A title can be bestowed, and it is not a name.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Your question is far beyond my capacity.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: I cannot think of a way to provide an answer.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: I believe that your feelings \Nare what matter most.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: You should select the name \Nthat you find most pleasing.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: You can choose a name after the selection.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Right now, our priority is to finish all the \Npreparations before tomorrow morning.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: If you have any concerns, we shall address them.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: That is why we are here.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: The girl with the closed eyes.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Komugi will now become much stronger, \Nalthough only at Gungi.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: If Komugi were put through the selection that will occur tomorrow, what would happen?

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: The selection chooses humans with the physical and mental \Nstrength to serve as soldiers.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: The survivors will be those who demonstrate \Nexcellent combat capabilities.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: I've learned that strength can \Nmanifest in different ways.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: For example, during our trip here...

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Your Majesty, you must not say it...

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: ...had the potential to surpass \Nme in a certain field.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: I extinguished it for no real reason.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: You must not say any more!

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: I took a life for no reason at all...

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: What tremendous strength I must possess!

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: I appear with no warning, to rob \Ncountless beings of their inferior strength!

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Brute force is the strongest \Npower in this world!

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: I am not worthy of being a Royal Guard...

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: I jumped to the wrong conclusion, and I nearly insulted the King.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: I was foolish enough to think that the King \Nmight have regretted his actions...

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Well, the King has changed since that girl arrived.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: If the girl will impede the King, \Nwe should kill her.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: To think my mind operates \Non the same level as yours...

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: My power is the strongest that exists.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: All other power means nothing\N in the face of my own.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: They are as dust in the wind.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Komugi... That female is no different.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Her skill is in Gungi, a simple board game.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: I could turn her into no more than \Na source of meat with the barest touch.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: So her life depends on my mood.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Then why am I so hesitant?

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: The goal was to kill time while \Nwaiting for the selection.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: The selection is tomorrow... \NHaven't I had enough?

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: I've had my fun. I no longer need her.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Why did you not call for help?

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: I don't want to bother anyone else.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Didn't I come here to kill her?

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: No one's ever been this nice to me!

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: What do I want to do with her?

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Next time: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Killua-sama, all these marvelous ideas \Nkeep flooding into my mind‚Äî

Title: Gungi x Of x Komugi.
Line: Then we're covered for future preview segments!

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.

Line: Why did you not call for help?

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: One day remains before the selection.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: The capital city, Peijing, wakes to a quiet morning.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: We have nineteen hours until \Nmidnight strikes on selection day.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Tonight, we finally make our move.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Once inside, Gon and I immediately head up the central stairway, \Ntoward the throne room.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Ikalgo will take the northeast elevator down to the \Nbasement, to search for Palm.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: If you find her, escape without us.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: If the King and his three Royal Guards \Nare in the throne room, we proceed with the plan.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: The problem is, what if they're not there?

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: You're really hung up on that...

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: What are the chances of that happening?

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: But the unusual happens pretty often.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: We researched the enemy's behavior extensively \Nbefore deciding on a day for the attack.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: When you're waiting for someone to be \Nin a certain place, at a certain time, that's typically when the unexpected happens.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: In my old job, I saw this all the time.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: The unusual always happens \Non the day you've chosen.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: In my old job, I could wait for the next chance, to ensure my success.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: But this time, that isn't an option.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Once we move, there's no turning back.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: A moment's hesitation can mean death!

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: So we should take time now to decide how we'll act in different situations.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Even if they aren't in the throne room, \Nif they're still in the palace, it's okay.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: So if we sense that creepy aura when we enter, we'll know that they're there.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: From there, we just follow that \Nsinister aura to where it feels densest, and they'll be at its center.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: The question is what we do if \Nwe don't sense Pitou's aura.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: In other words, what we do \Nif they aren't in the palace.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Would they be in the palace,

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: That's what happened when \NKnov-san infiltrated the palace!

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Yes, that's what I can't make sense of.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: According to Colt, Knov saw Pouf's aura.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: The Royal Guard never leaves the King's side.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: So if Pouf was there, the other two were \Nalso in the palace with the King.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: En{\i0 leaving Pouf to handle security, which allowed Knov to infiltrate the palace?

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: I believe the reason has to do with \Nhow Pitou's power works...

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: I'd guess that during that time, \NPitou was healing someone.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: I told you that Pitou was the \None who restored Kite, yes?

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Thus, healing must require a \Ngreat deal of concentration.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Which means that someone, most likely the King or one of the \NRoyal Guard, was injured and

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Who would have been able to \Ninjure one of those monsters?

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Maybe the King injured one of the Royal Guard?

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: There is no chance that Pitou \Nwould endanger the King

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Which means that the one injured...

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: I see... What you're saying makes sense.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: But then the bigger question \Nis who injured the King.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: The Royal Guard wouldn't harm him.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: But other soldiers could never put \Nso much as a scratch on him.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Under what circumstances \Nwould that have happened?

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: We don't know why, but it's the only explanation.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: I'll admit that I didn't question our \Nsudden stroke of luck too much...

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: But that chance was only possible \Nunder abnormal circumstances.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Are they starting to lose control?

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: I'm starting to think something's \Ngoing on inside the palace.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: We will now begin moving to the palace.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Citizens of sector A-1, assemble in \NDiego Plaza at once.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: The citizens of the other sectors \Nshould prepare to move out.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Oh, they're starting to file out.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Ten hours until midnight, when the selection starts.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: In twenty-five hours, tomorrow afternoon at three, five million humans will fill the palace grounds.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Has the situation in Peijing changed?

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: I thought it was only one skilled enemy, \Nbut now there are a bunch.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: They may try to use the celebration \Nas cover to approach us.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Then the danger will be greatest \Nduring the selection.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Yes, since the King will be \Nparticipating in the selection.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Our greatest concern is the King somehow being taken beyond our reach.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Nen{\i0 and that that person can use the ability \Nto isolate the King somewhere else...

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: That means at least one of us must stay by the King's side during the selection.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: As it is, he's been upset by how \Nclose we've stayed to him.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Then we guard him secretly, \Nwithout his knowledge.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: We need someone to stay just close \Nenough to monitor his surroundings while still carrying out his own role in the selection...

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Whose size won't attract attention, who won't get absorbed in an amusing task...

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Very well, I am the best choice for this.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Strictly by process of elimination, of course...

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: I can't sense any residual aura.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: They must have been packed inside.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Then if we conceal our presences, they can only assume that we're \Nhiding among the citizens.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: That would mean delaying or \Neven canceling the celebration.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Which would imply the King had \Naccepted defeat and compromised.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: The Royal Guard won't let that happen.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: The celebration will begin as scheduled, \Nno matter the cost.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Once the humans began to move, my puppets could no longer tell them apart...

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: No, giving the enemy free \Nrein would be dangerous.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Have the puppets join the soldiers that \Nare guiding the citizens, as a deterrent.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: As expected, the puppets have joined the march.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: In another hour, those sectors will be deserted.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: There are six entrances to the \Nrooms that lead to the palace.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: We'll avoid the entrances in front of the \Npalace, where security will be tighter, and wait by entrances A, B, \Nand C, behind the palace.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Once we've entered the rooms, the only exit will lead inside the palace.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: I merely want to be sure we're prepared.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Waiting by the entrances involves \Nquite a lot of risk.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: But if we enter the rooms too early, \Nwe won't be able to exit until midnight.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: If we receive any useful information, we want to be free to act on it...

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: And we can't use cell phones near the palace, since the Ants will pick up on the signal.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: I think it's dangerous to spend hours \Nwaiting inside the rooms, not knowing if there have been \Naccidents or changes in the situation.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: But you're the one who said it was \Nrisky to wait outside the palace.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: You shouldn't take their security net lightly.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: I'm the only one who can freely \Nenter and exit these rooms.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: If anything happens, I'll tell you.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: For now, you should rest here.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: I shouldn't have any problem \Ninvestigating the area...

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: It changes shape like an amoeba, \Ngiving it extended range.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: That's what Kite came in contact with.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: It's a fighter's instinct to want to know \Nhow strong the opponent is.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: And his instinct led him to misjudge their strength.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Make sure you stay out of range.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: In this room, I'm the one who most fears them.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: We will now head to the palace.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Any person who leaves their line \Nwill be shot on the spot.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: You knew that Komugi was being attacked?

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: I determined that there was no threat \Nto Your Majesty, so I ignored it.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: From now on, monitor Komugi's surroundings, and deal with any threats at once.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Tens of thousands of people are marching in a line toward the King.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: I can tell Morel and the \Nothers to come out...

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: The wind is carrying the scales of \Nhis wings toward the citizens...

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: They all look completely vacant and dazed.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Those scales have a hypnotic effect.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Stay in line as you advance!

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Once you reach your position, wait for orders.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Simple orders delivered repeatedly, \Nwhile tanks roll in the background can easily seep into a mind exhausted \Nfrom hours of marching...

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: It's the perfect situation for using hypnosis!

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Once the selection begins, \Nand blood starts to fly, they will continue to quietly stand in place.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: If they're brainwashed, the citizens won't run.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: But this works out for us.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: If we make a lot of noise, we won't have to worry about citizens panicking.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: There won't be any stampede of humans \Nfalling over each other to escape.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Assuming that over half of the people \Nwill be in place at midnight, we would have expected a stampede to \Nleave tens of thousands of casualties.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Our biggest concern has been addressed.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: We'll keep waiting until half \Nan hour before go time.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: If we knew what's inside before \Ngoing in, it'd be very different...

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Killua, in particular, shows none of the mental weakness he \Ndisplayed when we fought.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: I'd almost say he's brimming with confidence.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: But for some reason, he seems on the verge of fading away.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: No, I don't have time to worry about others.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: I'm the one suffering from the most anxiety.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: The fate of humanity rests on me...

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Meleoron and Ikalgo both have good hearts.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: It doesn't matter if they're humans or Ants. \NEveryone has a heart.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: That's what I want to believe.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: Hopefully, the King also has one.

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: But some of them must be killed...

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Line: If we don't kill them, we'll be killed!

Title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
Taking Stock x And x Taking Action.
