Title: Divide x And x Conquer.
Line: No, it can't be that I didn't notice it.

Title: Divide x And x Conquer.
Line: Was I hit by an attack?

Title: Divide x And x Conquer.
Line: So it must have been then!

Title: Divide x And x Conquer.
Line: Does that mean the condition \Nwas met during the fight?

Title: Divide x And x Conquer.
Line: Is it a countdown? A bomb?

Title: Divide x And x Conquer.
Line: No, the number isn't going up or down.

Title: Divide x And x Conquer.
Line: This is too much of a pain!

Title: Divide x And x Conquer.
Line: I only need to destroy the source!

Title: Divide x And x Conquer.
Line: Despite his overwhelming power, one reason Youpi was unable to defeat Shoot was the evident difference in \Nskill level between them.

Title: Divide x And x Conquer.
Line: It's fast... I can't get away!

Title: Divide x And x Conquer.
Line: One skewered chunk of meat coming up!

Title: Divide x And x Conquer.
Line: The reaction to the attack told Youpi \Nthat he could win at any moment.

Title: Divide x And x Conquer.
Line: Youpi wasn't the kind of fighter to rely on strategy, so this spurred him on.

Title: Divide x And x Conquer.
Line: Youpi's analysis was on the mark.

Title: Divide x And x Conquer.
Line: It was true that Youpi was \Nincreasingly likely to win this fight.

Title: Divide x And x Conquer.
Line: If he made any mistake, it was not realizing that Shoot was fine with this fact.

Title: Divide x And x Conquer.
Line: I'm telling him that there's one \Nmore enemy to worry about?

Title: Divide x And x Conquer.
Line: That will serve to distract Youpi, and it will save Shoot.

Title: Divide x And x Conquer.
Line: After calming down and regaining composure,

Title: Divide x And x Conquer.
Line: Next time: Duty x And x Question.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: I'm telling him that there's one \Nmore enemy to worry about?

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: That will serve to distract Youpi, and it will save Shoot.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Ikalgo didn't realize that the name \Nhe had spoken with full confidence had aroused Welfin and Brovada's suspicions, as he headed beneath the palace to search for Palm.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Ikalgo knew Palm only through the \Ninformation he had been given.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: However, he was already firm in his resolve that he wouldn't leave the palace without finding her.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Palm is a friend of a friend.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: That fact alone had earned Ikalgo's respect.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: I'm not doing this out of duty or obligation.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Because I decided I would help her!

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: The elevator leading underground was equipped with a security camera and a scale.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: After arriving underground, it would confirm that there was nothing inside before automatically returning to the surface.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Any number of people could descend at once, but only one could ascend at a time.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: And a pass code had to be entered.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: The eight-digit code varied per person, \Nand could be used to identify who had used the elevator.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: If the user's height and weight \Ndo not match the data on record from the time the code \Nwas assigned, a warning sounded, and the elevator became a prison.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: On the first entry of an incorrect code, \Na warning sounded, and the doors locked.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Should an incorrect code be entered three times, security was alerted, the elevator filled with sleeping gas, \Nand the violator was captured and tortured.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: In other words, a third error meant death.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Both the violator and the code's \Noriginal owner would be killed, making one's code as valuable as one's own life.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: And the only code holders able to use the elevator without \Nany such restriction were Bizeff and Marcos.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: That was because the elevator \Nwas a more convenient means of smuggling in various things, including humans, than the cargo entrance, \Nwhich was watched by soldiers.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Has Flutter been living in the morgue?

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: I can also smell Bro, since he was the last one in here before me.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Damn, there's something else, very faint...

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: The stench of Flutter's decomposing body served to dull Welfin's sense of smell.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Since Bro followed Flutter underground, he must have also noticed that Flutter \Nused the name "Hagya-sama."

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Or is Brovada conspiring with him?

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: When I was watching the intruder, was Bro watching me from behind?

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: If he was, and if he's working with the intruder, then he must have seen that \NI noticed Flutter's odd behavior...

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: If I can pass him off him as the \Nbomb threat's perpetrator,

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Bizeff will be indebted to me!

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: If he dies during the attack, \Nmy plans will be ruined!

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Forget Flutter... First, I need to find Bizeff!

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: I know nothing beyond the mission I received.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: I'll let you draw your own conclusions \Nabout what's happening inside.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Swallowing the words he wanted to say,

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Meanwhile, near the wrecked central stairway,

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Knuckle has revealed himself, a move \Nthat was not part of the original plan.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Meleoron and Shoot could only hold their breaths.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: I see... Then this is yours.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: I ain't gonna tell you, fool!

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: If you wanna know, catch me first!

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Knuckle's planning to fight Youpi alone...

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: I can't weave through those \Nblades of death to get to him!

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: In that case, I'll walk at a pace \Nthat's neither fast nor slow, to conserve as much oxygen as possible!

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Every little bit of damage counts...

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: I can't... I just can't say it!

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: I can't tell Shoot to keep fighting!

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Right now, my job... isn't to help Shoot!

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: It's to use my power to help the others, so they can complete their \Nmissions as fast as possible!

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: If I'm caught, I can still pretend \Nto be on their side.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: That might not work, depending on who I run into.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Morel and Pouf are dueling it out in the throne \Nroom, with no possibility of interruption!

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Where are they? Where are Gon and Killua?

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: He's the most skeptical of the Squadron Leaders!

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Once he suspects you, he won't \Ntrust you again until you're dead!

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: I'm already running out of breath... Do I run?

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: What if he goes the same way?

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Do I wait for him to leave?

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Can I hold my breath that much longer?

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: I'll have to exhale and inhale in one swift act!

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: For a second, I sensed something.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Welfin's power reflected his very nature, channeling his suspicion into an effective weapon.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: If anyone's hiding behind the building, surrender and show yourself by \Nthe time I count down from three!

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: No one's there... Did I imagine it?

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: To use Missile Man, Welfin identifies his target and loads ammo in the form \Nof questions or commands.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: If someone answers falsely or disobeys, \Nthe attack is launched.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: By the time Welfin noticed a presence, \NMeleoron had already moved.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Had Meleoron stayed in the same place, his attack would have succeeded, \Ndespite his inability to detect his target.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Finding nothing fitting the target's \Ndescription, the attack failed.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Once fired, Missile Man will \Npursue its target until it hits.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: No one can survive the impact.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: However, Welfin understood that \Nhis ability wasn't omnipotent.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: His power was nothing more than a tool.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Welfin was even skeptical of his own power.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: He sought to become the king behind the scenes, because being the real king would mean\N he'd have too much to be suspicious of.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Someone was here! I know it!

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Since I could only sense them for a moment, \Nthey must be very skilled.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: The use of deodorant confirms \Nthat they're aware of my nose.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: This confirms that there are traitors among us!

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: That's why they're hiding their scent.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: They don't want to fight me?

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Because they can take me out at any time?

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Do I really want to stay on the Chimera Ants' side?

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Should I really be searching for Bizeff now?

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: As Welfin began to doubt his own objectives...

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Gon and Killua had finally found Neferpitou, their target for avenging Kite.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: Next time: Revenge x And x Recovery.

Title: Duty x And x Question.
Line: No matter what happens, always have faith.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: The Hunters have entered the palace in \Norder to defeat the Chimera Ant King.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: I ain't gonna tell you, fool!

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: If you wanna know, catch me first!

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Knuckle taunted Youpi to draw his attention.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Knuckle's planning to fight Youpi alone...

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: I can't weave through those \Nblades of death to get to him!

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Every little bit of damage counts...

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Right now, my job... isn't to help Shoot!

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: It's to use my power to help the others, so they can complete their \Nmissions as fast as possible!

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Though it broke his heart, \NMeleoron had to leave the two Hunters and follow Gon and Killua instead, \Nin order to fulfill his mission.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Meanwhile, Ikalgo proceeded further into \Nthe depths of the palace to rescue Palm.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Palm is a friend of a friend.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: As Morel, the first Hunter \Nto reach the throne room, waited to continue his battle with Pouf, \Nwho remained in his cocoon,

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Netero and the King were leaving the palace, and Gon and Killua had finally located Neferpitou, their target for avenging Kite.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: I came here to get Kite back from you!

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Pitou didn't hear a single word Gon said.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: The only thing on Pitou's mind was \Nsurviving the current threat while carrying out the King's order.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Every cell in Pitou's body was focused on that task.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Watching from a short distance, Killua \Nnoticed that something was strange.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Why isn't the enemy preparing for \Nbattle when we're right here?

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: I can't sense any aura at all...

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Pitou might as well be completely \Nnaked... Utterly defenseless.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Does Pitou think it can win without aura?

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: The aura coming from Gon now \Ndoesn't even compare to his usual.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Is it because of where we are?

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Does Pitou believe that, at this distance,

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: That doesn't seem to be it.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: It looks like... a mother using its own body to guard something weaker.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Pitou isn't someone who's capable of that!

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: I'll let you draw your own conclusions \Nabout what's happening inside.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: While Killua was fighting his natural instincts, the girl lying before them brought back images of a broken Kite to Gon's mind.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: I'm telling you to take that \Nmonster and get away from her.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Fight me, so I can get Kite back!

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: The act of placing both palms face-up \Nto display one's lack of malice was a gesture Killua recognized...

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: What am I supposed to wait for?

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Pitou's unexpected lack of resistance left Gon without a target for his rage.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Meanwhile, Killua was close to fully \Nunderstanding the current situation.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: I know nothing beyond the mission I received.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Grandpa knew nothing when \Nhe brought the dragon down.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Grandpa's mission was probably to use Dragon Dive and Dragon Head to \Nseparate the King and Royal Guard.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: But he didn't know that she was here, too.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Wait, this woman must be the third party that none of us knew about!

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: And she's most likely the reason the King hurt himself.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Why would the King do something \Nso out of character?

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Because she is someone \Nwho's special to the King.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Pitou is healing her at the King's command!

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: All aura must be focused on \Nhealing ability when using it.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: However, Killua knew that this \Ninformation would only have a negative effect on Gon.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: What is it that you must save?

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Amidst the extreme tension, \Nthe answer Pitou chose to give was...

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Someone who's important \Nto someone important to me.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: She is the reason the King is who he is.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: If she dies, the King will cease to be who he is.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: All I care about is saving her!

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Once she's healed, I'll do anything you want.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: The hell if I'll listen to you!

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: It's likely that we were \Nthe ones that injured her.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: It was probably Grandpa's Dragon Dive.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Pitou is probably telling the \Ntruth about healing her.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: You want me to wait because \Nof "likely" and "probably"?

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: And after we wait, it's likely that this thing will do what I want?

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: You want... You want me to trust this thing?!

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: If you want, you may also have my right arm...

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: If that isn't enough, you can take both legs...

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: If you're worried I'll change my mind \Nafter the healing finishes, you can break any part of my body \Nthat isn't required to heal her.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Why are you helping her, after everything you did to Kite?!

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Gon, if you kill Pitou, we'll never get Kite back.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Since it means nothing to you...

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: I'm only saying this because \Nyou're out of control.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Did you forget the first thing \Nyou said when we came here?

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: We're here to get Kite back!

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: How long do I have to wait?

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: To completely heal her will take three to four hours.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: No, I can't wait that long.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: I can heal her most critical injuries.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: In one hour, you're coming with \Nme to Peijing, to heal Kite.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: I swear to keep that promise!

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: I'll wait right here for one hour.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: Next time: Insult x And x Payback.

Title: Revenge x And x Recovery.
Line: I can't think of anything right now...

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Since it means nothing to you...

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Gon's cry had guided \NMeleoron to the two boys.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: I'm going to have to refuse.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Right now, I'm not in the mood.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Just think of it as bad luck that I found you!

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Let me test my new technique on you.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: You don't have to give me such a dirty look.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: The one I really want to fight \Nis someone else, you know.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: That guy with sunglasses, \Ncarrying the big pipe.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Then, why don't you go and find him?

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: But I can't get to him.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: He controls smoke, and he's hidden \Nhimself behind a smokescreen.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: I climbed up to the roof, to see \Nif I could get in from above...

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: And I happened to spot you.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: So I'm supposed to be the warm-up \Nbefore your main fight?

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Will you listen to what I have to say?

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: For the first time since taking \Nover the family business,

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: I may have killed someone who wasn't my target.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Don't be too shocked when you see it.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Well, you'll still be shocked in the end...

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Doesn't look like I'll be able to \Npersuade you to let me go.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Your buddy told me to keep \Nmy eyes on my oppone‚Äî

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Well, the result would have \Nbeen the same either way.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: And I believe that he's removed Illumi's needle.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: I had a rare experience today.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: I must remember to ignore \Nhalf of everything you say.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Okay, we should be safe here.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Shoot's out of the battle, \Nand Knuckle is fighting Youpi alone.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Knuckle's going to keep running, \Nto try and buy time.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Okay, what's the minimum length of time \Nyou can maintain God's Accomplice?

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: The first time, I was so nervous, I failed \Nand had to tap out after ten seconds.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: If I don't move, I can hold my \Nbreath for at least a minute!

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Approximately three minutes \Nbefore Killua raised his finger...

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: In Knuckle's own opinion, his strongest \Npoint was his ability to run away.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Once, to help his friends escape, he knocked out a cop, and eluded four patrol cars and dozens \Nof police for a full day and night, on foot.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: The day he finally escaped was the day he graduated from grade school.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: His stamina when maintaining top speed far exceeds that of a cheetah.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: To save Shoot, Knuckle had chosen to reveal himself and use an out-boxing \Nstrategy against Youpi.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: For the most part, it was the right choice.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: If there was one thing he miscalculated, \Nit was his opponent's intentions.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Shoot and Knuckle considered \NYoupi a high-priority target.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: But Youpi wasn't as focused on them.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: As a Royal Guard, protecting the \NKing was his mission.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: His focus was on keeping enemies from the King.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Youpi still believed the King \Nto be in the throne room.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: And since guarding the stairway \Nwas his assignment, he was convinced that Pitou and \NPouf were protecting the King.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: So his main priority was to keep enemies \Naway from the throne room.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Since he didn't know how \Nmany enemies there were, the nature of his opponent's \Nability took second priority.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: As did any enemies running or dying.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: They did not warrant his concern.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Given their positions, when Youpi turned back, he must have spotted Shoot.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Then we aren't even worth... finishing off?

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Youpi didn't care if Shoot lived or died.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: After having fought him with all they had, the pair had never felt so humiliated.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Are Shoot and I no more than flies?!

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: In a few more minutes, \Nthis fly will send you flying!

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: The boss used Smoky Jail on the throne room.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: That means he and Pouf are alone inside.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: The King isn't in the throne room!

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Say something! Can't you hear me?

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: You're free to defend an empty throne room!

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: I'll take Shoot, and watch from a safe distance.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: By the time Knuckle realized his mistake, he had already made another.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Shoot and Youpi must have seen one another.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Shoot must have been prepared \Nto die at that moment.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: That's the kind of fight we came for.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: When Knuckle pictured the \Nexpression on Youpi's face after he'd glanced at the bloody Shoot \Nand headed up to the third floor,

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Am I supposed to ignore the fact \Nthat my buddy's been humiliated?

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: And if our mission succeeds, \NI just shake Shoot's hand and say,

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Pat each other's shoulders and laugh?

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: And while I'm apologizing, I need \Nyou to wait here a little longer!

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: I need to punch that guy in the face...

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: And I'll throw another punch for you!

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: It's my job to stay calm and stop Knuckle...

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Just keep your mouth shut, and buy more time."

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: He... looked at me like I was trash!

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Give that bastard an extra punch for me...

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: There's something more important \Nthan the world right now!

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Knuckle's new mistake was a misjudgment of his priorities.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: My attacks aren't having any \Neffect on this smoke...

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: I hope the old man's doing okay...

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Why is he staying inside his cocoon?

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: I would have expected him to be in \Nmore of a hurry to get to the King.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Could we have made... some kind of mistake about the Royal Guard?

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: I'm here to fulfill my mission!

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Negative emotions are growing, \Nbut his resolve has not faltered.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Just as I would expect from a strong fighter.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: However, that will be the constraint \Nthat weakens your decision-making.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Have the King, Pitou, and Pouf all vanished?

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: The black fog on my shoulder won't go away.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: And the number on this thing keeps increasing.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: I have to find the King!

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Damn, I should have killed the fly downstairs.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: That might have gotten rid of this fog.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: But I have to find the King!

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: What the hell is wrong with all of you?!

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: And with that shout, Youpi transformed.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: It was drastic enough to make Knuckle, \Nwho thought he had come prepared, instantly switch from an offensive \Nstance to an evasive one.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: This manifestation of evil clearly meant only to destroy.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Did you hit him... for me?

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: I'll hit him hard, so hold on!

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: But we have to run, so we don't die first!

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: For the first time in his life,

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Youpi had endured an excessive amount of stress.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: This had made it apparent that his power was not meant for guarding the King.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Rather, he realized that his violent rage could fuel a rapid increase in the \Nmass of both his body and his aura.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: The destruction brought him great pleasure, after which his body rapidly shrank, \Nand he felt a strong sense of loss.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Knuckle's superior experience helped him \Nunderstand what had happened to Youpi.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: I doubt it'll be easy to goad him \Ninto doing that on purpose, and make it out unharmed.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: But the return for taking that risk will be enormous.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: I make him mad, so he blows up.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: The perfect time to hit him would be when he's charging up.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: And the aura required to fuel his explosion will cause him to go bankrupt sooner.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: The plan Knuckle formed on the spot was almost flawless for dealing \Nwith the berserk Youpi.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: However, Youpi's true worth only \Nbecame clear after the explosion.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: As Youpi transitioned between \Nlingering pleasure and despondency, this selfish ability that could be \Ncalled the dregs of his ego was focused solely on how he could use this power for the King's sake.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: His Ant instincts and Magical Beast mentality continued to function calmly even after \Nthe discovery of his burst of emotion.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: My contribution to the King will be how well I can control this ability \Nwithout letting my emotions take over.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: I must use it to destroy the intruders.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Now that Youpi had learned how \Nto be both enraged and composed, the risk for Knuckle was overly great.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Approximately three minutes have \Npassed since the mission began.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: The intentions of all involved\Nare beginning to come together.

Title: Insult x And x Payback.
Line: Next time: A x False x Rage.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: He... looked at me like I was trash!

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Give that bastard an extra punch for me...

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: There's something more important \Nthan the world right now!

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Though the central tower's third floor escaped destruction, having been \Ncushioned by Morel's Smoky Jail, it had been blown slightly to \Nthe left of its original position, barely keeping the building's appearance intact\Nwhile maintaining a precarious balance.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Nearby, in the middle of the \Ncentral tower's lower portion, which had been reduced to rubble \Nresembling an ancient gladiator arena...

Line: I am a foolish servant of the King, letting my rage consume me as I hunt my prey.

Line: That's how I should approach it.

Line: That's the impression I should give them.

Line: Where are you hiding, little rats?

Line: Come out here, so I can squash you!

Line: I know he'll show himself again...

Title: A x False x Rage.

Line: No matter what happens outside, \Nmy goal is to pin this guy here.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: That's all I need to do!

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Approximately one hundred trillion microorganisms, tiny enough to pass between particles of smoke, maintained just enough distance \Nas to go unnoticed by Morel as, slowly but surely, Pouf carried out \Nhis escape from Smoky Jail.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Beneath the northern section of the palace

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Border Guard Area F was a large area, with warehouses laid \Nout in the shape of a dragonfly.

Line: Cultural Assets/National Treasures Area B        Weapons/Ammunition Area A

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Supreme Leader's Private Shelter Area E\N\NEmergency Rations/Supplies Area D    Supreme Leader's Personal Effects Area C

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Area D, located on one of the wing's tips, was where Bizeff had created a private zone with his warehouse for hiding women.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Having learned the warehouse's \Nlocation from Marcos,

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Ikalgo was making his way there by truck via a direct, five-kilometer road.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: By the time Ikalgo had reached the crossroads that led to Areas A and B, his Satellite Dragonflies had already \Narrived at the warehouse.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Palm put Bizeff to sleep \Nand headed for the palace.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: When he awoke, Bizeff forgot to lock \Nthe door in his rush to follow her.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Brovada's in the border guard area?

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: This meant that Ikalgo had no choice but to face Brovada.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Why? Did I make some kind of mistake?

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Stay calm and figure out what he \Nknows and what he doesn't, in order to stay alive!

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: What happened during our encounter \Nthat aroused his suspicion?

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Was there something unnatural \Nabout my imitation of Flutter?

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: I suppose it would be strange for Hagya \Nto order me to go underground.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: But since they didn't stop me on the spot, my mistake must not have been fatal.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Rather, something aroused an inkling \Nof doubt in the back of Brovada's mind.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: And Brovada's down here because he \Nwants to confirm those doubts!

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Was it small enough that I can explain?

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Or was it big enough that he \Nonly wants final verification?

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: I should assume it was a big mistake.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: I am a messenger from the secretary!

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: No, I have to assume that if he has a chance, he'll attack...

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: I am a messenger from the secretary!

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: The secretary ordered me to come here!

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: If you're here, you must come with me at once!

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Messengers were never sent to Bizeff's warehouse.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: This was meant to reassure \NPalm that he was an ally.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: I d-don't know anything about \Nwhat's happening outside...

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: I'm not allowed to talk to anyone \Nother than the secretary.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: She had assumed that this was a test of loyalty by the secretary.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: The other women thought the same thing.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Each room had a phone exclusively \Nfor communication with Bizeff, so it was illogical for him to send \Na messenger, hence their suspicion.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: They believed that a visit from a stranger must be a test to see if they could \Nstay calm and follow orders under unusual circumstances, so they refused to speak to Ikalgo.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: However, that worked in Ikalgo's favor.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: The women had a much higher chance \Nof surviving if they stayed here.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Ikalgo didn't have the time to worry about \Nkeeping them alive, much less protecting them.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: It was less likely that Bizeff would find a message that wasn't \Non paper or some other device.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: If I don't make contact before the mission, assume I am dead."

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: But he still felt as much anguish as \Nif he had lost part of his own body.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: If Palm is dead or assumed to be dead, use your Satellite Dragonflies and \Ntelepathy to support the team.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Pretend that you're reporting \Nto your Squadron Leader, when you're actually reporting to Meleoron.

Title: A x False x Rage.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Yes. It's a crucial task. \NI'm counting on you.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: That will only be possible if they don't know Meleoron is here, \Nor that I've switched sides.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Which means that, since he \Nis already suspicious of me,

Line: Once Brovada reports that to the other Ants,

Line: Still, I never heard anything about \NHagya changing his name!

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: It's true that I really knew \Nnothing of his new name...

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: I must think of a reason they'll accept \Nif I encounter any of them.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: That shows they think anyone who doesn't \Nknow Hagya's new name is an enemy.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: If they find me, there'll be a battle!

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: I have to go back up there expecting that!

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Don't tell me that he came \Ndown here without knowing about the passcode system.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: I have two options to pick from!

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: It's nearly been five minutes since \NChapter 7 Bankruptcy activated.

Line: Is that enough to guarantee that he won't \Npay off the full balance with one hit?

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: I just have to avoid a direct hit.

Line: The worst possible scenario \Nwould be that I'm hit by an attack that wipes out Chapter 7 \NBankruptcy, and also deals damage to me.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: I'm better off buying time, \Nwaiting for him to go bust.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: But that means I'll have to wait for at least ten minutes.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Shoot... Shoot won't last that long!

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: I have to make him explode once more.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Or else we'll run out of time!

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Before the battle ends, Shoot will die!

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: He fell for my trap, for my false rage.

Title: A x False x Rage.

Line: Make this damn fly that's \Nfollowing me around shut up!

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Every time it squeaks, \NI'm reminded of your annoying face!

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: Okay, I'm ready to explode at any time.

Title: A x False x Rage.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: He'll try to attack during that opening.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: But if I stay calm when my rage takes over, \NI can control my growth.

Title: A x False x Rage.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: I'll blow every last one of you \Nto smithereens, you scum!

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: When he tries to take advantage of \Nthe opening I give him, he'll be open.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: I have time to punch him in the face, \Nand get out of the way before the explosion!

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: And the next one's also for Shoot!

Line: I was never that close to him...

Title: A x False x Rage.

Title: A x False x Rage.

Line: Anyone who's risked their \Nlife with you is a friend.

Line: The interest won't be enough to pay for this.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: If you're not all big, I can knock you silly!

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: I did it! I did it! I did it!

Title: A x False x Rage.

Line: My first task is to get Shoot to a hospital.

Line: Before I even realized it, \Nthis little nuisance was on me.

Line: There were no signs at all.

Title: A x False x Rage.
Line: I saw him back at the staircase...

Line: Sorry, but what's about to happen is just me blowing off some steam.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: I saw him back at the staircase...

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: The difference in initial action \Nspeed was so overwhelming that Youpi had no time to \Nmake a sound or transform.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: Killua's Godspeed placed an \Nelectrical burden upon his own body, making it possible for his body to \Nperform at a level far beyond what should have been possible.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: Killua had divided this power \Ninto two different abilities:

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: Speed of Lightning, which allowed \Nhim to control his body at will,

Line: Speed of Lightning and Whirlwind, which allowed his body \Nto react automatically to his opponent.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: In a previous fight, he'd used the \Nlatter to stop his opponent's dart.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: A preprogrammed attack is triggered in response to vibrations in aura that \Nindicate the opponent's hostility.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: The attack bypasses commands from his brain, unleashing attacks that transcend his \Nown limits by relying on reflexes alone, allowing him to easily surpass \Nhis opponent's physical speed.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: All of these guys have less than \Nten percent of my raw power.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: I can't do a thing against him.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: Before my explosion, I never would \Nhave enjoyed fighting an uphill battle.

Line: Youpi's change in heart would lead him \Nto make an unbelievable choice, but this would not happen until later.

Line: There are plenty of trucks parked around.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: When he wakes up, Brovada won't \Nbe able to open them.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: And if I use the cargo entrance \Nto return to the surface, the risk that I'll encounter enemies will \Nbe much lower than if I take the elevator.

Line: I'll stick the barrel of my gun through \Nthe gap in his armor and open fire.

Line: If a passcode is not entered \Nwithin thirty seconds, the restraining process will begin.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.

Line: I didn't expect him to shoot the door.

Line: Do I wait for him to lower his guard, \Nthen sneak out the cargo entrance?

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: Either way, if he goes back to the surface...

Line: I'll be able to move around freely!

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: If I allow an enemy to return to the surface, \NI'm putting everyone else in more danger.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: I can't let him go back up...

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: If I can't stop him, I've failed my friends!

Line: Wait until he's a little farther from it...

Line: So there was someone besides Flutter...

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: Looks like you were trying to lure me in there...

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: If only one path remains, it's too good \Nto be true. Anyone would be suspicious.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: Well, now I know about you.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: And I bet you're hiding in the \Nmonitor room to watch me, chicken!

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: I could have completely \Ntrapped him in that hallway...

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: But there's no way out from where he is now.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: Sleeping gas will eventually \Nfill the room, and he'll...

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: I should get out of here...

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: I have to do something before he realizes.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: The armored vehicles in the garage.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: With those, I could at least lock him in.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: But then I'll have no way to get \Nback to the surface, either!

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: Is there anything I can use here?

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: Come up with the best possible plan, fast!

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: I guess I have to blow through this shutter...

Line: Damn! All that firing, and I \Nbarely scorched the surface?

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: Guess I'll need to think of something else...

Line: You can operate the shutters \Nfrom the monitor room,

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: There might be a way to escape without busting down the shutters.

Line: That's something a chicken would use.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: But the shutter behind it is still shut.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: The door to the monitor room is beyond that shutter.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: First, he closed the front shutter and \Nparked the vehicle there.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: Doesn't that mean he's also trapped?

Line: He closed off his only escape \Nroute, just to finish me off?

Line: I'm gonna drag your buddy \Nout of the armored vehicle and rip him to shreds!

Line: Hey! Your friend's gonna burn to death!

Line: If you act now, I'm willing to spare you!

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: Being an octopus, I only need a few \Ncentimeters to squeeze through.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: Now, I just have to wait for the \Nsleeping gas to fill the room.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: I can hold my breath, but I don't want to waste time.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: I just have to pull the trigger, and I'm done.

Line: Fire! This is the best option!

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: I'll be safest if I control his body \Nand return to the surface!

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: Which means I have to kill him...

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: There's no one else to help me!

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: While Ikalgo was lamenting his weakness...

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: Within the shifted central tower, \Nas Morel faced off against Pouf's cocoon, he was battling doubts of his own, as well.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: What if it isn't that he chose \Nnot to respond to Youpi, but that he wasn't able to respond?

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: Within the cocoon should be\Nnothing but a goopy mess.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: He shouldn't be a completely formed creature yet.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: If he's utterly defenseless \Nwhile he changes forms, this is the time to attack.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: Would he really make such a literally \Nfatal mistake in this situation?

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: This must be a trap. It's guaranteed to be a trap.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: But the question is whether the \Ntrap activates when I attack, or if it's already been activated, \Nbefore I've even attacked.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: You have doubts because you \Nare good at what you do.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: However, that is all there is to it.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: Next time: Fake x And x Real.

Title: Strong x Or x Weak.
Line: You're a fake. You aren't Killua.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Where did he go, in that condition?!

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: You will abandon your original plan, and \Ncommit yourself to a baseless assumption?

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: I see you've made your decision.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Once I stopped to think about it, \Nit was pretty simple.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: You used your cocoon after I played my card.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Since you went into hiding \Nonly after learning my agenda,

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: I knew that was your ability, and that it was a trap.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Your lack of reaction when I lifted \Nmy pipe to strike confirmed it.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: It made no sense that you showed \Nno sign of reacting at all.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: That was how long I expected you to take before deciding to remove the smoke barrier.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: During that time, I intended to slip \Nthrough the smoke and move freely.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: You trapped me within that barrier \Nto separate me from the King, yes?

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Meaning, as long as your \Nprison of smoke was there, your allies would see it and \Nconclude that I was still inside.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: I decided to take advantage of that misconception, and \Nquietly dispose of your friends.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: I knew you would hesitate long enough \Nto give me plenty of time to act.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: You thought I'd spend fifteen minutes \Nwaiting in front of an empty cocoon?

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: No, on the contrary, it appears...

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: He instantly broke himself up into tiny particles?

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: If that's how he broke through Smoky Jail, \NI wouldn't have seen a thing!

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Because my strategy was a last resort.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: To be honest, I was upset by the \Nfact that I'd been trapped.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Not a very good diversion strategy.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: You made it through the smoke just fine!

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: At that point, that was all there was to it.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: I was under the impression that \Nyou were a more capable soldier...

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: One who would carry out his original \Nplan and be faithful to his mission.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: However, you made some wild guesses \Nand removed the barrier.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: They just break up and reform?

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: My decision to attack the \Ncocoon was the best option.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: No, the moment I second-guess myself, \NI've played into his hands.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: My next job is to predict his objective, and stop him...

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: To join up with the rest of the Royal Guard, to find and eliminate my companions, and to reunite with the King!

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: His interests are consistent with mine.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: I'll find somewhere safe to throw this away!

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: I can't use any other abilities.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: If Deep Purple is undone, \NI'll be completely helpless!

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: I'll have to find a way to get by, \Nusing Deep Purple alone.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: What'd you do with Shoot, huh?

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: The maximum number I could \Nproduce in my current state.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: I'll use them to support Knuckle as best I can.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: I'll let you hit me once.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: This is our chance to escape.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Man, they said we'd be safe here.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: I can't get in touch with Leol-sama.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Since my stomach shrunk, that probably \Nmeans Cheetu-sama's dead...

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: And I haven't heard anything from \NFlutter, so I guess that's it.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: I'll leave to become a Queen!

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Please... get me out of here...

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: No can do... I can't move all that.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Then, could you call for help?

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: I'm in a hurry to get out of this place!

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: The boss is missing, our link \Nwith the King is gone, and the palace is a mess.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: I have no reason to stay here!

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: I'll give you whatever reward you want!

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: There are mountains of treasure underground!

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: If you help me, I'll give you anything you want.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: There's an area for the Supreme \NLeader beyond the shelter.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: I've been managing the treasure inside.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: I'm the only one with access...

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: You'll give me anything I want?

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: That was clearly proven when the air assault began before \NI was able to make any arrangements.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: They're probably calling the Ants biological \Nweapons, to use them as an excuse...

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: If I'm captured by the Federation, they'll force me to confess for a cover \Nstory and throw me in prison for life, or they'll execute me, so I can't talk.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: I won't let them capture me...

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: The smoke-user is now out of action.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Now, I'll go back to the palace, evaluate the current situation, \Nand return to the King.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Though I'm sure that even if I stay with him, \Nthe King will only find me a nuisance.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Identify the location and status of \Nevery person inside the palace!

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Pouf's Beelzebub was an ability that allowed him to disassemble into copies of himself \Nas small as one billionth his size.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: He was able to control the size \Nand number of copies produced, and the smaller the copies, \Nthe more he could produce.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: However, his main body, which served as a control center, \Ncould only be reduced to a bee's size.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Smoke-man, if you hadn't removed the barrier, my main body could not have escaped.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: My combat capacity would \Nhave been reduced by half.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: I'm sure a puppet master such as yourself must know the incomparable difference in \Nstrength between a clone and your own body.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Now that my main body is free, \NI have no weaknesses.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: You should have been more careful.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: If you had, then when you realized the cocoon was empty, \Nyou should have wondered whether what had been inside it \Nhad actually escaped the barrier.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: And if I had spoken to you \Nfrom outside the barrier, you should have wondered whether \Nthat was my real self.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: The plan I executed was an act of desperation.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: I could attempt to confuse your allies, \Nbut my clones are mere husks.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Assuming that your allies were as strong as you, even if it took a few casualties, \Nthey would have noticed that my clones were fakes!

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Had you comprehended the truth, \Nand realized that my main body remained within the barrier, you would have understood my \Nability, and searched for me.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: I would have had no way to \Nfight you in my reduced state...

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: In other words, if you had maintained \Nthe barrier as per your original goal, your allies may have suffered a bit, but you would have been able to defeat me.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: And I was ten-percent resolved \Nto accept that fate.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Your emotions were perfectly \Naligned to accomplish that.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: I suppose the explosion \Nmust have thrown you off.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Next, I will evaluate the situation in the palace!

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: From the start of the mission, \NMorel's condition was less than optimal.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: His exhaustion and impatience, combined \Nwith the extreme tension of the situation, clearly led him to the hasty decision \Nto engage Pouf in a battle of nerves.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: However, he arrived at the \Nperfect time to support Knuckle, keeping him from engaging Youpi alone.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: As a result, it could be said that \Nhe made the correct decision to remove Smoky Jail at that time.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: And it was more than simply \Na product of coincidence.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: It would be valid to say Morel's wealth of \Nexperience played a role in saving him.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Morel had weighed the strength of the enemies against that of his allies.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Subconsciously, he knew that they \Nhad underestimated the enemy.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: When he realized the length of time his allies \Ncould hold out was shorter than anticipated, he was led to attack the cocoon in order \Nto avoid struggling with the pros and cons of removing Smoky Jail to go help them.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Morel's cunning, derived from his knowledge \Nof the battlefield, saved his comrades.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: The real one's hidden among the fakes, \Ntrying to attack me, right?

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: This time, I'll land a counter on you!

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: When the real one lands a hit, I'll know.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Pitou and the woman are on the \Nwest tower's second floor.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Pitou appears to be healing the woman.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: A boy, who appears to be an \Nenemy, is sitting nearby.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Three near the entrance to \Nthe underground shelter...

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Hina, a Soldier Ant, and Bizeff!

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: He appears to be following them.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: The woman was injured by the dragon spears.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: But why doesn't the enemy attack Pitou?

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Could he be acquainted with the woman?

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: One in the soldiers' lounge, in the east tower...

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: The human captured a few days ago.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: But Youpi is taking them out quickly.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Youpi and approximately fifty enemies \Nare in the north area of the palace!

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: It's the smoke-guy and a bunch of thugs.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Also, a weird fatso with a spike on its head!

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Unable to determine if it is friend or foe.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Is the spike-head Youpi's true power?

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Only one of the thugs is real, \Nwhile the rest are made of smoke.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: The number of puppets is not increasing because he needs the pipe to make more.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: It'll take Youpi less than a minute \Nto find the real one.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: The King is gone! Where is he?

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: My attacks are too fast for you to get close.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Should I leave an opening for \Nhim to come in and attack?

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: You finally figured it out, idiot?

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: There never was a real one.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Did he really need to use such an ability?

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: But locating the King is my first priority!

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: If you hadn't set that restriction,

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: I would have snapped and rushed him!

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: I will create only angry clones of you when you've lost control of your temper.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: If that happens, you are to join the clones, and give careful thought to what must be done.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: After cooling down and thinking about it,

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: I realized that he wouldn't have taken Shoot.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: But if Shoot couldn't move on his own, \Nwho would have moved him?

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: I need to focus on the opponent before me!

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Go in before the entrance is blocked!

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: If I knew what powers they had, \NI could make a move.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: Next time: Defeat x and x Dignity.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: And that's all there is to it.

Title: Fake x And x Real.
Line: And that's all there is to it.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Had you remained silent, \NI could have killed him.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Why are you so needlessly frightened?

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: If you'd approached him with the intent to kill, he would have immediately attacked Komugi.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: That was a risk I didn't want to take.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Isn't he sitting there because \Nhe wants to help that girl?

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: You almost make it sound like \Nhe means to harm her.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Once I'm charged up, I'm going back to Gon.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Pouf is outside the barrier, so it's very likely the big guy was taken out.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Review the situation, then you and Knuckle decide what \Nto do, and whether to retreat.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Once Gon is in that state, he won't budge.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: At worst, he'll trade his life for Pitou's.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: I've always got the magic word, "Kite"!

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Then why did you look so sad back there?

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: You can't talk... And you don't want to, anyway.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Then I can't ask, and I don't want to!

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Pitou, I'll let you handle this, then.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: You can use your wing scales to control others, right?

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: You want me to stand here and do nothing?

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: What happened while I was trapped?

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: I promise that I shall not move from this spot.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: In return, I want you to tell me everything that has happened thus far.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: If I ask where the King is, he'll \Nget suspicious and silence us.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Drop me hints while you explain what's happened.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Be careful to make it sound quite natural.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: If you fail, we will see bloodshed.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: That's all there is to it.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: I could feel myself controlling the explosion.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: If I try it once more, I'll have it mastered.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: I must build up my rage before \NI forget how it felt!

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: That's the second time you've \Nmade a fool out of me!

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Stay calm, and let rage consume me...

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Create and destroy at the same time.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Youpi had yet to notice why two conflicting emotions \Ncould exist simultaneously...

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Or what his current predicament was.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Rage is not intended to be scattered.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: It's meant to be focused on a target!

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: APR's interest is calculated assuming that aura consumption will \Ncontinue to rise at the current rate.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Even if Youpi were to reduce his \Naura usage to a bare minimum, in another three minutes and fifty seconds,

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Looks like he's saving me for last.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: In that case, I'll keep fighting as long as I can!

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Morel had deployed all of his puppets \Nclose enough for Youpi to see so that he'd be able to monitor Youpi's movements, but also because he no longer had the \Nstrength to move his puppets around.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: If he lost his focus, the puppets would \Nreturn to smoke and dissipate.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: He has to run out of{\i0

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: My body and soul... refuse to move.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: At this point, Morel could not \Neven will himself to stand.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: He had literally reached his limit \Neven before Youpi went bankrupt.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: I have something to say to you.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Now that Youpi had learned how to store his rage elsewhere, \Nhis head was much clearer.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: You look like a little fly that's about to die.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: That's what makes you guys amazing.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: During the battle, Youpi had \Nevolved at an alarming rate, increasing the gap between \Nthe Hunters and himself.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Yet he had nothing but praise for the defeated.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Given Morel's initial impression of Youpi, this must have been the last thing he \Nexpected Youpi to say in this situation.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: But Morel could honestly accept \Nthat this was Youpi's true nature.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: I'm not sure how to say this...

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: I have to be sure to kill you.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Well, I'll end this with one blow.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: I don't think I even mind letting him kill me now.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: The moment I was about to cut through him, he disappeared.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: I thought that one of them had the \Nability to use teleportation...

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: But when he disappeared, \NI didn't see anyone else.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: And I struck before he disappeared, so if \Nhe teleported, I shouldn't have drawn blood.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: But I was able to cut him.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Yet I can no longer see him.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Does that mean he only turned invisible?

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: If he had that ability, \Nhe would have used it sooner.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Which means one of the others must be able to make himself \Nand the rest invisible.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: And right before I connected, he tried \Nto save the guy with the sunglasses.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: But I left a deep wound.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: We may be invisible, but the \Nblood is leaving a trail.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: If he swings that blade again, \NI'll have to get away by myself.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Right now, your job is to stay \Nhidden as long as possible!

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Knuckle chose to use words instead of his fists because Youpi's words had \Nstruck a chord with him.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: You can't even call that a trade-off.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: If you get rid of this thing, \Nmy answer might change.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: I'm sure this has to do with why you've \Nbeen constantly on the run.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Removing it will make the \Nexchange more even.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Knuckle, you'd better not be stupid!

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Morel's desperate cry did not reach \NKnuckle due to God's Accomplice.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: However, it did return Meleoron to his senses.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Will you waste everything we've done?

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Everything that Morel, and Shoot... and you... have done by risking your lives!

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: If Knuckle didn't act, the two of \Nthem could still fight together.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: To do that, Meleoron had to stay hidden.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: With that in mind, the decision that \NMeleoron made after leaving Morel...

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: We no longer have a way... to defeat Youpi...

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: The sight of a bloody Morel had reminded \NKnuckle of Shoot, and broken him.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Do you want to come with me?

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: I doubt you could handle it.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: His ability isn't teleportation, is it?

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Then you'll have to carry the \Nguy in sunglasses to a doctor, or you struck this deal for nothing.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: If protecting the King was his first priority, he should have killed all three on the spot.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: You weaklings can attack me all you \Nwant, but I'll still shake you off.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: The fact that he was aware of this, \Nbut didn't carry it out, irritated Youpi on a level that didn't \Ncompare to his previous rage.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Come for me whenever you want.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: I don't need to kill you right now...

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: And that's all there is to it!

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Damn, I picked up Pouf's habit.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: That also altered what little \Nsense of self he'd had before.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Having learned to quarantine \Nhis rage and stay calm,

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Youpi had lost his ability to \Nsee things in simple terms.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: They're responsible for the rage I've built up, so why don't I feel like using it on them?

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: What, or who, am I supposed \Nto unleash this rage upon?

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Was this a sign of maturation?

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: We gotta help the big guy!

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: I told you to leave me here...

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: The two of you... can still fight.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: He said to go whenever you want.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: I can no longer think of him... as a target to destroy.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: In that case, I no longer have... any reason to defeat him.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: If the King waves his baton, the soldiers \Nwill become demons if necessary.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Wait, let me sock this baby hard.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: I received a message from \Nthe chairman's messenger.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: As planned, he was able to take the \NKing to the appointed location.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: If they leave now, the Royal \NGuard won't make it in time.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Their job is done, and so is ours.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: I don't know if I'll be back again.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: You can see how bad I look...

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: We still have a job to do.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: No, we can do that later.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: There's something else we have to do.

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Youpi isn't the only Royal Guard!

Title: Defeat x and x Dignity.
Line: Next time: Pose x And x Name.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: I can no longer think of him... as a target to destroy.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: In that case, I no longer have... any reason to defeat him.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: If the King waves his baton, the soldiers \Nwill become demons if necessary.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: This is an area used for testing weapons of war.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: We won't need to restrain ourselves.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: You have no chance of defeating me.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: You presume to know I cannot win?

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: If you judge me by my appearance, you'll get burned.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: You don't seem like some ordinary man \Nwho can't read the state of the battle.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: I was born to rule this world.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: Originally, you humans were as \Nno more than livestock to me.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: But I have changed my mind.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: I learned that there are a few \Nhumans worth keeping alive.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: I sense that you are worthy, as well.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: I am willing to spare your life.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: You'll only spare my life, yes?

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: In exchange for his agreement to stay still,

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: Pouf was pressing Pitou to explain \Njust what had happened.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: Pitou complied with Pouf's request, telling \Nhim what happened after the attack.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: In other words, everything since \Nthey'd been separated.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: Pitou made it a point to include \Ndetails that Gon did not know, to ensure that Gon's attention would \Nbe focused on the explanation.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: Pitou deliberately did not mention \Nhow the King had held Komugi because Pitou did not know how to \Ndescribe the events accurately.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: There was no significant change in Gon.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: Pitou knew the plan had succeeded \Nwhen Gon's eyes wavered briefly.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: The King... left with the enemy of his own \Nvolition, by that doorway.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: There is no need for us to go.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: Then we should await the King's return here.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: To maintain only my outward appearance, \NI only need one-seventh of my flies.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: The other six-sevenths will go to the King!

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: You fight with the resolve to lose?

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: You fight for the human race?

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: If so, then know that my actions \Nare, in fact, for their benefit.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: For example, in human society, lands are divided by national borders, \Nmuch like territorial marking.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: On the right side of the border, \Nchildren may starve to death.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: While on the left, scum who do nothing\Nhave everything they need.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: And create a world so fair, the very concept of inequality will be forgotten!

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: I will initially use power and terror \Nto accomplish my objective.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: But I will only do so to the extent \Nnecessary to maintain order.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: I have learned what power \Nis meant to be used for.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: To protect the weak, who deserve to live.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: Power is not meant to be used \Nto torment the defeated!

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: I agreed to leave the palace so we could have a free, open discussion.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: And he hasn't realized that those two sides are incompatible.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: And neither one is dominant yet.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: But regardless of which side he falls to, the outcome won't change.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: The immediate extermination \Nof these dangerous creatures.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: There have already been many casualties.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: We will use any means necessary.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: Naturally, we have no intention of \Ntelling the experts how to proceed.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: We simply desire those dangerous creatures \Neradicated as swiftly as possible.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: So their goal is to eradicate the Ants, \Nleaving the Hunters Association to take the blame.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: We are both in difficult positions.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: I can't sense anyone else fighting.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: Does that mean I'm the only one left?

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: You've changed a lot since I last saw you.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: I could say the same to you.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: I had to escape without alerting the enemy.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: And if I move all my dispersed particles \Nat once, it's too conspicuous.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: I'm sure you're feeling impatient, \Nbut please spare me a moment.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: I need to tell you what's happening.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: Well, I suppose you have your own concerns...

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: I have no conclusive proof that the change in Pitou will \Nactually benefit the King...

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: Through his own experiences, \NYoupi could understand Pitou's behavior.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: What do you think we should do?

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: Which made it very clear to Youpi that Pouf was fearful of the subtle changes

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: We must go to the King at once!

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: And that's all there is to it... Right?

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: He was concerned only with \Nleaving as soon as possible.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: Because Youpi was feeling the same fear.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: I'm sure that was a direct hit...

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: He still wants me to sit with him?

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: I can no longer back down!

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: Are you really so eager to die?

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: From the King's perspective, the wrath that was unleashed was no stronger than that \Nof a child throwing a fit.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: Yet it was violent enough to induce \NNetero to more than double the distance between the King and him.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: It was an insult likened to laughing off

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: Netero's declaration that he would not back down.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: You will only influence me by using words.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: If it were that simple, \NI wouldn't have to do this!

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: Would you like to know your name?

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: How would you know my name?

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: My subordinates were present at the \Nmoment of your mother's passing.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: She uttered your name with her dying breath.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: And my subordinates may have died \Nfighting your Royal Guard by now.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: If you can force me to admit defeat,

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: I will tell you your name.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: Force you to admit defeat without killing you?

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: So, similar to a bishop and rook handicap...

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: The real battle between Netero \Nand the King has begun.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: Next time: Centipede x And x Memory.

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: Hey, what do you want to be in your next life?

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: Uh, what do you want to be?

Title: Pose x And x Name.
Line: In my next life, I want to be me, \Nand meet you again.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: Would you like to know your name?

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
