Line: How would you know my name?

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: My subordinates were present at the \Nmoment of your mother's passing.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: She uttered your name with her dying breath.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: And my subordinates may have died \Nfighting your Royal Guard by now.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: If you can force me to admit defeat,

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: I will tell you your name.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: Force you to admit defeat without killing you?

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: So, similar to a bishop and rook handicap...

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: As the King and Netero prepared \Nfor their final battle...

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: Beneath the palace, Ikalgo was still sobbing, having failed to finish off \Nthe unconscious Brovada.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: Fire! This is the best option!

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: There's no one else to help me!

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: This is no time to be crying...

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: The door to the warehouse area is open.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: So is the door leading to the garage!

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: I have a lot of things to ask you.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: If you seem to be trying anything funny,

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: What he wants to ask me is obvious!

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: The number of my allies, their roles, and their abilities.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: And he intends to use any means \Nnecessary to get the answers.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: People could die if I leak information.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: If he's a Manipulator, he can obtain the information against my will.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: If the alternative is betraying my buddies,

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: That bastard... How did a wimp like \Nthat figure out my weakness?

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: Missile Man requires questions and answers to work.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: If an enemy attacks before I can ask \Na question, it's null and void!

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: I'll take my time beating him to a pulp.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: They grow by feeding on your resistance.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: If you disobey my orders or try to hurt me, you'll suffer excruciating pain, then they'll tear your body apart and you'll die!

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: If you try to do that...

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: If my life is all it takes, I'll give it!

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: If he wanted to kill me, that's the \Nultimate form of resistance.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: Now, it'll take no time for the black centipedes \Nto grow large enough to kill him instantly!

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: I'm not interested in killing you...

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: I just need to make sure that you can't leave.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: I still... have plenty of bullets.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: When I'm prepared to offer my own life, it's so easy to pull the trigger.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: The creatures inside me are suffering?

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: Is it because Welfin admitted defeat?

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: I had a feeling this would happen eventually.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: I didn't think I was this weak!

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: I didn't think it'd be so scary \Nto face someone who fights with no regard for their own life!

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: The pain has stopped, but can \Nyou get rid of these bugs?

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: I'm in too much pain to think about that now!

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: I don't have a way to deactivate Missile Man.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: But if I tell the truth, I'm in real trouble...

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: Damn, how do I get out of this?

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: Until I can come up with a good idea.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: The pain is making me... feel faint...

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: I was lying! I won't do it again!

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: Forget it. I see how it is.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: That's why I didn't want to say anything.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: I'm not trying to trick you!

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: The insects are in pain again.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: Maybe because Welfin is telling the truth?

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: I only use this attack when I want to kill someone.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: I never cared what happened after that.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: I never gave any thought to \Nwhat happened to my enemy.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: My abilities reflect my own personality.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: What do I want to know?

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: I once knew someone just like him.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: Do you have any memories from \Nwhen you were human?

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: Wh-Why are you asking about that?

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: If you don't tell me the truth, I'll shoot you.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: When I woke up, my first thought was...

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: I'm sure those monster bugs killed me in NGL.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: I was fed to the Queen, \Nand reborn as something new...

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: I still remember the one thing \NI most wanted to forget.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: The sight of my father strangling me, and the woman watching behind him.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: At first, I only had flashbacks of it.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: Over time, I remembered the \Nentire sequence of events.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: I was saved by... my little brother, who was unrelated by blood.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: We used to brag about whose \Nlife was more miserable.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: He was the only one I could \Nturn to when I needed to laugh away my tears...

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: So we had nothing to hide.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: I wonder what he's doing now...

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: I want to see him one more time...

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: Yes, I just want to see Gyro.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: I'm tired of dealing with Ants and humans, with money and nations...

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: You still have something to do.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: Why did you open the doors?

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: Oh, I was letting those weaklings \Nreach the treasure in the back.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: They can't put up much of a fight.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: I was watching you and Bro on the monitor.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: And I told them to pass while \Nyou were on the way back.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: Once I saw that you couldn't finish Bro,

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: I thought you'd be an easy target.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: I couldn't have been more wrong.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: Did you see a woman in the palace?

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: Not sure if it's the one you're talking about, but the Royal Guard captured a human, \Nand put her in a cocoon.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: Take the elevator up, then turn left.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: It's the room at the end of the hall.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: Telling the truth feels really good...

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: Welfin had spent his life unable \Nto trust himself or others.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: Telling Ikalgo the location of \Nthe one he searched for was the first time he'd opened \Nup and spoken honestly.

Title: Centipede x And x Memory.
Line: Next time: Breakdown x And x Awakening.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Approximately thirty minutes after \Nthe Hunters entered the palace...

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: As the fierce battle unfolded inside the palace, an immense number of citizens \Nhypnotized by Pouf's wing scales still waited outside for the selection process \Nthat would turn them into soldier ants.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Meanwhile, a creature in the form that \Nthey would soon become began to stir.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: While her appearance hadn't totally changed,

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Palm was clearly no longer the same person.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: She was captured by the Royal Guard...

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: If Gon sees what's happened to Palm, he won't be able to take it...

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: There's no room left in his heart.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: If the transformation has \Nreached as far as Palm's heart...

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: I can see Gon completely breaking down!

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Palm must have sensed me before I noticed her watching me...

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Using that power she told us about before.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Once I used my power, it was quite simple.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: I thought she could use some kind \Nof divination to locate people.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: But it's probably closer to clairvoyance.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: From her position, Palm shouldn't \Nhave been able to see me...

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: The only conclusion is that she was \Nwatching me by some other means.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: And if Palm were an enemy, \Nshe would have backed off...

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Clairvoyance is most effective from a distance.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: And if she's an enemy, she shouldn't \Nremember me anymore.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Since she approached me, she must remember me...

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Once he's seen what I've \Nbecome, will Gon hate me?

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Gon doesn't judge people by appearances.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: And you're assuming that he \Ndoesn't already hate you.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: I have nothing to gain from your pity.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Why can she see me, but she can't see Gon?

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Was it chance that you happened to find me?

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Huh? What are you talking about?

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: You're the one who turned the corner.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Wrong! I sensed you watching me.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: That's why I came this way!

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Did I notice Palm watching me \Nonly when she physically saw me?

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Does that mean Palm actually \Nsaw me once, then immediately left?

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Then she used clairvoyance \Nto watch me follow her, and turned around so it'd look \Nlike she was approaching me?

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: When I was brimming with rage,

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: I should have let my emotions take over!

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Better to let everything out than hold it in.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: That includes my desire to kill you!

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Will you die without a word?

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Palm's ability to arm herself by covering \Nher body with her hair, Black Widow, varied in appearance according\Nto her emotional state.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: But defense was its primary function.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: What made Black Widow frightening was the fact that she could rely on \Nher hair armor for protection, allowing her to devote all \Nher energy to her attacks.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: When everything clicks, it's possible \Nto become this much stronger?

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: I completely blocked the attack, \Nbut I still took damage.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: If the fight drags on, I'll be at a total disadvantage.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Gon's mind is already at its limit!

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: He's barely holding himself together, \Nwhile he waits for Pitou.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Even if Palm's heart is still there...

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: It'll have a negative effect now!

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Why are you looking for Gon?

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Depending on why, I might be \Nwilling to tell you where he is.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Huh? Why are you asking now?

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: I just want to see him.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: I panicked and called you an enemy...

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: But even if you look different, \Nyou're still Palm, right?

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Someone he deeply respects \Nwas completely transformed.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: That person had his soul taken away.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Right now, Gon is facing off \Nagainst the one responsible!

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: If you appear before Gon \Nlooking as you do now...

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: So you have to call him by his name first.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Gon was really worried about you.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Give him some peace of mind...

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: He had no intention of letting them meet.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Help... make him feel a little better, if you can...

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Only you can do that now!

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: No one else... can do it.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Once he'd said those words, the dam within him burst.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: When Palm had infiltrated the palace, arriving at the exit Knov had \Nplaced near the stairway,

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Surrounded by aura so evil that she felt \Nas though she'd be crushed to dust, she reached the same conclusion Knov had.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: As she watched Pouf slowly and silently \Ndescend the stairs, she made her decision.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: She plotted to take her own life, so she would look like a despairing girl \Nwho could not bear Bizeff violating her.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: However, Pitou prevented that from happening.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: As one cannot help but shiver in the cold, no one could blame Palm for reflexively using aura to protect herself from Pitou's evil aura \Nat the moment she was exposed to it.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: The Royal Guard was interested in her aura, and after receiving permission from the fasting King,

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Pitou and Pouf made her experimental soldier #1.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Precedent had demonstrated those who remembered their pasts had stronger mental fortitude.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Memories of the past tended to both assist \Nand deter the growth of soldiers.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Deterrence generally happened when memories led to emotional reactions.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Thus, the two Royal Guards concluded \Nthat they should use Pitou's Dr. Blythe to destroy the connection between \NPalm's memories and her emotions.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: The experiments that produced Cheetu \Nand Leol confirmed that those who retained more of their memories \Nemerged from their cocoons sooner.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: To quickly and quietly conquer humanity, leaving soldiers with their memories, while \Nkeeping control of them, would be best.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Palm was the perfect test subject.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: The success of her experiment would \Nsignify the end of the human race.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Beat the kid before you to death!

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: I will never become a pawn to you Ants...

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Even if it costs my life!

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: There was a wall inside my head.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: My emotions were separated from my body.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: I couldn't do anything about it.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: I've been like this since I woke up.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Don't say that there's nothing you can do.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: If I can do anything to help Gon, I'll be happy to.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: You are the one Gon needs most.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: That's all there is to it.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Soldiers do not need memories or emotions...

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Which also means I no longer need Pitou's power.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: I can create soldiers on my own!

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: That will make it easier \Nto build a new kingdom for the King and me.

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Next time: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power

Title: Breakdown x And x Awakening.
Line: Oh, Knuckle... You're lending me this manga?

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: I've been like this since I woke up.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Don't say that there's nothing you can do.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: If I can do anything to help Gon, I'll be happy to.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: You are the one Gon needs most.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Killua's voiced feelings toward Gon miraculously returned Palm to her old self.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Meanwhile, on the west tower's second floor,

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Knuckle had ignored Meleoron's repeated warnings, appearing before those in the room in order to challenge Pouf.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: But first, I have something to say.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: That which stands before you is only a clone.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: My true body is already on its way to the King.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Having escaped the cage of smoke,

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Pouf had confirmed that Knuckle \Nand Morel had made contact.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: He decided to assume that his enemies knew of \Nhis ability to create clones, and to act accordingly.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: The boss told me that you could make clones.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Knuckle said this aloud for Gon's sake.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: By telling the truth first, Pouf attempted \Nto gain the mental advantage.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: But why are you telling me this?

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Since Knuckle was here, that meant that Youpi had spared his life and had not told Pouf this.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Pouf needed to leave the room peacefully \Nso that he could persuade Knuckle to tell him the motive behind the \Ntransformation he'd sensed in Youpi.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: I told you in order to satisfy him.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: He has demanded that I not leave this room.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: If we are to engage in a duel,

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: I will need him to withdraw his \Ndemand, so that I may leave.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: I cannot use my wing scales.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: However, I am still willing to fight you.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: What I seek is a discussion.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: That is why I revealed the truth.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Pouf knew that when dealing with someone who \Nwould call him from behind to challenge him, appearing to be telling the truth \Nwould be more effective.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: You were going to kill me from behind.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Knuckle, don't let him fool you!

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: First, you claim to be a clone.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Are you able to prove that?

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: I dare say that, of our enemies, \Nhe possesses the strongest will.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Perhaps I should be pleased that he is trapped here with Pitou.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Because his strong will keeps him in here.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Were I to prove myself a clone, I would \Nbe placing myself at a disadvantage.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: You must use your own judgment.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: I shall allow you to decide what happens next.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: I'll wait in front of the entrance for ten minutes.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Whether you come or not is your choice!

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: I'm the only one you need, right?

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: You have ten fewer minutes to heal her.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Pouf had been willing to leave, \Ndespite the consequences.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: But what was truly frightening was \Nhow Gon ignored Pouf's taunts, calmly moving up the deadline instead.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: How long do I have to wait?

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: To completely heal her will take three to four hours.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: No, I can't wait that long.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: I can heal her most critical injuries.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Originally, to protect Komugi \Nand heal her completely,

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Pitou had deliberately named a longer \Ntime frame than was necessary, which Gon had denied.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: So the hour that they'd agreed \Nupon was the actual time

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Pitou believed necessary for Komugi \Nto make a full recovery.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Doctor Blythe had grown stronger over time.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: It may have been possible to speed up the treatment by ten minutes.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: It may have been mere coincidence, but it was likely that Gon had only chosen ten \Nminutes to conform with Pouf's parting words.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Despite that likelihood, Pitou \Ncould not shake a bad feeling.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Or else his fangs may reach the King's throat!

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: I said that Pouf was lying, but it's probably true that his main \Nbody is headed for the King.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: The King is to the south.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Gon and Killua had seen everything \Nthat had transpired.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: But since Pitou did not know that, it was only natural to assume that Gon had seen through Pouf's plans.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Pitou's worst fears had been confirmed.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Pitou was now fully resolved to \Ncomplete the mission at hand.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Do I move as soon as Komugi is healed?

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: I can't expose her to danger.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: First, I must entrust her to someone else.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: If I'm gone, who will take Komugi to the King?

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: I will still do things my way.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: If Knuckle's information made Gon hesitant, it could result in his death.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: How would you know my name?

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: My subordinates were present at the \Nmoment of your mother's passing.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: She uttered your name with her dying breath.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: And my subordinates may have died \Nfighting your Royal Guard by now.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: If you can force me to admit defeat,

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: I will tell you your name.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Force you to admit defeat without killing you?

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: So, similar to a bishop and rook handicap...

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: As the King moved into his stance,

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: When was it... that I began to wait for my opponent to attack?

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Whenever you're ready, come at me.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: When was it that I stopped hesitating to be gracious, taking the hands of vanquished opponents when they bowed their heads in defeat?

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: That cannot be the ultimate power I sought!

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: It is fighting with all my soul against an opponent with the strength to defeat me!

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Thankful for everything that has made our meeting possible!

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: Next time: Zero x And x Rose.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: We haven't seen each other in a while.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Line: But it feels like you were always with me.

Title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Great Power x And x Ultimate Power
Zero x And x Rose.
Line: Thankful for everything that has made our meeting possible!

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: As his time was compressed to its utmost limits, the King, his consciousness alone barely following \Nthe afterimages of Netero's movements, found that a single emotion reigned within him...

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: Complete and utter admiration for his enemy.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: He brings his hands together to start the attack.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: That's the only motion he has \Nthat far surpasses my speed.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: Such wasted movement could \Ncost one's life in battle, but now, it works as a weapon \Nthat may allow him to defeat me.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: Trying to guess what drove \Nhim to do this is pointless.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: It would have required choosing \Na path that defies reason.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: I would presume that, at one point, \Nhe was on the verge of madness...

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: And the entire time, he focused on this alone.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: I recognize that you have dedicated an incredible amount of time to achieve the power you have displayed.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: After all that, he's barely been scratched.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: Not that I expected any different.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: An individual can reach his limit after much training.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: You are a rare example of one \Nwho has transcended that limit.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: An insect should not talk down to humans!

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: The King's strategy was quite simple.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: If the only attack capable of besting him, \N100-Type Guanyin Bodhisattva, could do next to no damage, \Nthe King had no cause for fear.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: These are no more than dummy hands.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: They can only move in set patterns.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: If I attack from an angle that he can't \Nblock with a move he's already used, he'll have no choice but to reveal a new move.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: Once I have verified all of the combinations,

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: I can find the angle of attack that will \Nforce him to reveal another new move.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: However, while he may have a limited \Nnumber of attack patterns, the number of combinations they can \Nbe used in may as well be infinite.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: But every individual has a rhythm.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: There will be an unconscious bias for, \Nand against, certain patterns, and that bias naturally shapes one's identity.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: If I can identify his personal rhythm,

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: I have a fair chance of guessing \Nwhich patterns he will select.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: To find the single correct needle \Namong countless millions, and thread it accurately... is what it will take to pierce my target.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: Old soldier, I beg of you...

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: Don't lose your life before I succeed!

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: Well, I'm also enjoying myself, so I can't blame him.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: No matter my attack trajectory, he recovers immediately and moves to counter.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: If I make a wrong move, his speed won't \Nallow me time to unleash the next Hand.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: If I lose focus, he'll tear me \Napart before I realize it.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: This is a contest of endurance, in which \NI must keep choosing correctly...

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: That's probably what you're thinking, Ant King!

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: I'll show you my Zero Hand!

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: After hundreds and thousands of hits, the King was beginning to feel the slightest \Nhints of dull pain within his body.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: You have done well for a human.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: If you don't act, you'll die of blood loss.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: You shouldn't get cocky after \Nlanding a lucky punch...

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: You have truly earned my admiration.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: I am amazed that your spirit has not flagged.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: However, losing your leg was basically inevitable.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: It is the consequence of using a defense that, \Nwhile not bad, was not the best choice.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: After playing against Komugi, I learned \Nthe art of anticipating enemy actions.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: Your unconscious bias against certain patterns gives me insight into the otherwise \Nlimitless options you have.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: Next, I'll take your left arm.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: The ensuing fight did not even last a minute.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: This is my life's final act!

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: As he released his 100-Type, Netero's resolve heightened his physical and mental senses, resulting in an exchange of more \Nthan a thousand punches, and sparking countless fireworks \Nbetween the combatants.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: His attacks began to show a slight inclination, one not quite significant enough \Nto be called a habit or bias.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: After using his body to bear the \Nbrunt of Netero's attacks, the King was able to find \Nthe faint light beyond, and... he reached it.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: You believe I cannot pray with a single arm?

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: A prayer comes from the heart.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: If the heart achieves the correct \Nform, it becomes emotion...

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: 100-Type Guanyin Bodhisattva Zero Hand was a Buddha that appeared behind an enemy, gently enveloping the target \Nwith an indiscriminate love.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: Previously, Killua had sensed its murderous \Nintent from a great distance away.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: It had left such a strong impact, \NKillua had changed his direction.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: The entirety of Netero's aura was transformed into a light as \Nblinding as a star, and fired with a merciless roar.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: I was born to be King of the Ants, to rule over all organisms.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: I represent the instinctive hope \Nlong nurtured by my species, and that species continues to evolve for my sake.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: I stand here now, the resulting boon \Nof the total support of my species.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: You are an individual human, not a king...

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: I am the King that bears his kind's fate.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: That was the difference in this battle.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: The Chimera Ants' long evolution \Nhas culminated in me.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: This is a feat the human race, with its \Nindividuality, can never match.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: However, humans will no longer \Nbe used to propagate our species.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: We have learned that the strong human ego disrupts \Nthe bonds between Ants.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: Out of respect for your efforts,

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: I shall allow humans to permanently \Nsurvive within a special zone.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: We shall reevaluate the number and \Nquality of humans to be used as food.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: Your lonely battle was not in vain...

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: I shall not repeat myself again.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: Don't underestimate the human race, Meruem.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: As Netero spoke the King's name, the King had no time to consider it, as he watched the old man who was \Nsupposed to be surrendering.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: Meruem, King of Ants, you understand nothing... of humanity's infinite potential for evolution!

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: It was the first time the King had felt fear.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: One look at the face of this beaten old man, \Nwho should have been waiting for death, made it clear that his seemingly \Nvain words were no mere boast.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: Should your heart stop beating, this will activate.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: If there is a hell, I'll see you there.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: You had me in checkmate from the start...

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: The bomb was both low-budget and compact, while also proving surprisingly lethal.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: With the right technology, it was possible to quickly mass \Nproduce these bombs.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: Due to the shape of the smoke cloud, it was called the Miniature Rose, \Nor the poor man's rose, and was popular with small dictatorships.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: Next time: Hostility x And x Determination.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: No matter what happens, \NI won't betray my friends.

Title: Zero x And x Rose.
Line: No matter what happens, \NI'll believe in my friends.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: Don't underestimate the human race, Meruem.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: Meruem, King of Ants, you understand nothing... of humanity's infinite potential for evolution!

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: You had me in checkmate from the start...

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: The bomb was both low-budget and compact, while also proving surprisingly lethal.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: With the right technology, it was possible to quickly mass \Nproduce these bombs.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: Due to the shape of the smoke cloud, it was called the Miniature Rose, \Nor the poor man's rose, and was popular with small dictatorships.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: In more than 250 countries and regions of the world, ten times as many roses had bloomed, consuming 5.12 million human lives.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: After terrorists used the bomb in the \Ncenter of an adversarial nation's capital, taking more than 110,000 lives, an international treaty was signed that \Nbanned the bomb's production.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: However, over eighty percent of the \Nworld's countries rejected the proposal to discard and ban the use of \Nroses they had already produced, meaning that hundreds of thousands of seeds still wait silently in many countries \Nfor their chance to bloom.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: When Netero decided to use his last resort, could this thought have crossed his mind?

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: Now, there is no way to find out.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: The two immediately understood what the distant cloud of smoke and \Nresulting vibration in the air signified.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: Pouf's clone found itself looking Knuckle in the eye.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: Knuckle hoped to reach a \Nsimilar understanding with Pouf.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: But his faint hopes were quickly shattered.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: If the King waves his baton, the soldiers will become demons if necessary.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: Pouf's main body must have learned \Nthat something happened to the King.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: That led to the transformation of the clone's \Nface, revealing the Ants' true nature.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: Did the chairman defeat the King?

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: No, it doesn't matter either way...

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: In Pouf's face, Knuckle had seen a barrier \Nthat could not be overcome.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: It only took them thirty minutes \Nto wreck the whole place.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: But I'm glad to see you.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: Then, as planned, I'll take you to Peijing by car.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: Well, she'll certainly be useful in a fight.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: In terms of raw offensive power, \Nshe has me beat...

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: To be honest, I want to go to Gon at once.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: He's decided to fight Pitou by himself.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: I'll wait right here for one hour.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: And once he's made up his mind, \Nthat's it. He won't budge.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: In return, he performs his best when circumstances are as expected.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: Which means all we can do is stay out of his way.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: If he gets into serious trouble, \Nwe'll immediately rush in to help him.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: So that's why they're staying behind.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: Even if Gon uses all the power he currently has, he still won't be able to beat Pitou.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: In fact, even if the three of us join him, they're aware that we're still no match for Pitou.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: They're staying behind to die with him!

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: We're also looking for Knuckle and the others.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: We separated the King and the Royal Guard to let the chairman defeat the King.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: As Knov-san said, we've completed \Nthe mission we were assigned.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: Each of us will have to decide \Nwhere we go from here.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: Do we stop or keep going?

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: I am going to keep fighting them.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: I've already laid down my life here more than once.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: Even if we can't reach an understanding,

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: I won't give up until I'm content with the outcome.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: Did he notice that my surgery was done?

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: I made sure to hide my progress from him.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: But if I showed any sign of \Nrelaxing after finishing it, and he noticed that...

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: Did he notice my bloodlust then?

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: The next time you try to delay me, I'll kill her.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: U-Um, I don't understand what's going on...

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: Pitou was close enough to take \Noff his head with one arm.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: After seeing how sharp Gon's senses were,

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: I can't make a move now...

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: There'll be many, on our way to Peijing.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: But I must get Komugi to the King!

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: Gon, want me to use Chapter 7 \NBankruptcy on Pitou?

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: If there's an escape attempt, \NI can track Pitou down.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.
Line: And if Pitou tries to fight back, \NAPR will protect you.

Title: Hostility x And x Determination.

Line: We won't be able to trick him.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Nen{\i0 was not anger, fear, or hatred.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Only senses of duty and resolve.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: If you are fighting for the survival \Nof humanity, your battle is over.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: It seems you doubt what you've just heard.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: You have won... The battle is over.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: The rest of what I have to \Nsay is for your ears only.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: The reason I am here is quite simple.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: I wish to see the human named Komugi.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: That is really all I want.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: I learned my current state and fate.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: And having learned my fate, I simply wish to spend my remaining time with Komugi.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Was this a plan you devised after \Ndiscovering my personality?

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: No, I already know the answer...

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: You expect me to believe you?

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: You think I'll just accept that explanation?!

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: An omnipotent King would \Nnever lie to himself in order to fool a lower being like me!

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: After all the killing you have done, \Nand soon will do...

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: The King admits defeat? Cares for a human?

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: He's doing this because it is the truth!

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: I believe it was only a slight change...

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Something, somewhere, changed ever so slightly.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: In my current state, I am not a god, but I...

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Perhaps, I only feel this way \Nbecause everything has fallen into place.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: You should know I have very little time.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: I want you to tell me her location, so I do not have to search for her.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Yes, I know where she is!

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Why don't you just torture it out of me?

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: We both know that isn't an option.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Your aura is as strong and beautiful \Nas any I have ever beheld.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: All I can do is to ask you to help me.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: I know very well how important \Nyou are to the race...

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: May I use my power to watch your final moments with her?

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: If that is what it takes to be with Komugi, you certainly may.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: We have a shocking news update.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: The true purpose of the summoning of all Republic of East Gorteau \Ncitizens to the capital city was a plot by the Supreme \NLeader to massacre them.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: The body of Supreme Leader Diego \Nwas discovered under the rubble, suggesting that the victims were \Nlikely forced into mass suicide.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: But the second-in-command, \NSecretary Bizeff, is still missing, so some authorities believe a \Nrevolution is the greater likelihood.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Meanwhile, there has also been trouble in the NGL region of the Mitene Union, \Nas international peacekeepers have sent queries regarding refugees, and have received no response.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: There have been rumors of illicit dealings between \NEast Gorteau and NGL, and the international community \Nseeks to use this incident as an opportunity to conduct \Na more forceful investigation.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Yeah, the boss did his duty.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: No, I wasn't there to see it.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Can we really trust her alone to verify the King's death?

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Plus, that person was captured and converted by the enemy, yes?

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Well, that's a question of professionalism.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: It would be professional to provide a complete report \Nin the safest manner possible.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: But those are the professionals who spend all of their time sitting in fully-furnished offices.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: And when we field Hunters are told \Nto trust a partner, we trust them.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: But I'm the one out in the field!

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: I'm not sitting in an office!

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: The Vice Chairman's faction won't \Naccept that argument.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: If they find out, you can expect \Nto be questioned, at the least.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Chairman, thank you for a job well done.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: The same day, a video was streamed \Nonline in which Netero announced his resignation as Chairman \Nof the Hunter Association, and gave instructions for \Nchoosing his successor.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: However, major news stories in the \Ngovernment-run media overshadowed it, and only a few realized that \Nthe video was his will.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: In every age, there will be good \Nhumans and bad humans.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Human life is too long \Nto devote to reproduction, yet too short to devote to learning, \Nin the helix of time.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Perhaps that is why humans succumb \Nto desire and seek release.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Despite the fact that life is complete \Nwith the sun, the land, and poetry.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Supreme Leader Diego (Real) \NIn his 30th year of retirement, \Non a farm, in an unnamed country

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: But it feels like we \Nhaven't played in ages...

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Playing in real life is completely different \Nthan playing in my dreams.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: I thought I felt someone kick \Nme hard in the stomach.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: After that, a strange person kidnapped me...

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: But you must have saved me, Supreme Leader.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: It wasn't me. It was my subordinates.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: I jumped to the wrong conclusion.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: I was unworthy of their loyalty...

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: When they stop by, I must thank them.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: It means the light that illuminates all.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: It is an honor to know you!

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: I didn't understand what really mattered.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: B-But, I could never do that!

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: I would never dare address \Nyou without an honorific!

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Then if I beat you at Gungi, you will \Naddress me without the honorific.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Do I die after I've addressed \Nyou without the honorific?

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: There is no need for you to die.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: I am not the same person I was before.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: You should be prepared to lose.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: What do you want if you win?

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Komugi, do you mean to mock me?

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: I will not allow you to fool around.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Yes, I have never fooled around \Nwhile playing Gungi.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: If you lose, you will die.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Is she saying this will not \Nmean her certain death?

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: She had a number of other options.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: But all would only serve to lengthen the game without increasing her chances.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: If she thinks she has a chance to win...

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: I want to see where this goes!

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: She has found a way out.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: This is the only way to go!

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: I should be able to checkmate her!

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: When she's forced closer to my position, \Nmy advantage grows with each move.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: But if she slows down and allows \Nme a turn to attack, she can't stop the knight \Nand lieutenant general!

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Am I allowed to be so happy?

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Can so many wonderful things happen to someone like me?

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: I suppose I must tell you the truth.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: I have been poisoned, and I have little time.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Komugi, I wanted... to spend my final moments \Nplaying against you.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: If you stay near me too long, you will also...

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Right now, I am very happy.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: I may not be worthy, but please allow me to join you.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: I believe that I was born to be here today.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: It appears I never defeated \Nyou a single time.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: I need to take a short nap.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Will you stay by my side until I wake?

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Line: Next time: Homecoming x And x True Name.

Title: This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
This Person x And x This Moment.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: Homecoming x And x True Name

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: With the death of King Meruem, the battle between Chimera Ants \Nand humans was over.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: Republic of East Gorteau    Republic of West Gorteau

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: The Republic of East Gorteau and \Nthe NGL were tentatively placed under control of international peacekeepers, and the nations essentially ceased to exist.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: Between the two former nations, five million survivors were declared refugees.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: The Mitene Union's three remaining members divided East Gorteau's riches and agreed to jointly govern the former nation's territory.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: As for the NGL, there was a proposal to give all open land permanent designation as nature reserves, \Nto prevent future incidents.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: It was agreed that the nature reserves would be under the Hunter Association's jurisdiction.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: The name "Gyro" doesn't mean anything to me.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: But this place feels very familiar.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: I'm guessing that I was an NGL resident \Nthat didn't work for Gyro...

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: Well, I won't force you to come, then.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: This is probably safer than other countries now.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: One look at me, and the peacekeepers \Nwould freeze on the spot.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: She seems more like you guys.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: Damn, she's annoying... Give me a minute!

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: Well, people like me who barely \Nremember our previous lives can tell that people like you and Hina, \Nwho have their memories, are different.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: Or it's how you look into the distance.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: Somehow, I can tell at once.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: And I can tell that she remembers her past.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: Hina said she'll never talk to us...

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: But I don't think it's that she won't talk.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: Zip it! I get the idea!

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: We probably won't see each \Nother again, so take care.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: Try not to die until you're dead.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: It's one of my favorite phrases.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: No... I just kinda like the phrase.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: So life is what you make of it, huh?

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: Okay! It's time to go look for Gyro-sama!

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: Not so long ago, it was \N"Hagya-sama" this, "Leol-sama" that.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: No point in thinking about the dead.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: Still... Are you sure we can \Nmake it through the port?

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: Yeah, this is a government vehicle, so once I show my card, they'll let us pass.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: Soon, I'll be a resident of Meteor City...

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: Don't be so negative about it.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: I'm sure that Gyro's also headed there.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: It's possible that he's already gathered all the sympathizers and tools we'll need to build our own nation.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: In no time, we'll be back on top!

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: You're so optimistic, I can only envy you.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: I'm the one who stopped the King.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: Yeah, I'm a class-A political criminal.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: Might as well enjoy whatever is left of my life.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: Humans are alive until they're dead!

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: Welfin, Hina, and Bizeff head to \NMeteor City, in search of Gyro.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: I need someone who can communicate in a peaceful and reasonable manner!

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: I'm not here to harm anyone!

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: I just have a question to ask!

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: This will probably be hard to believe, \Nbut will you hear me out?

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: You're the only people I can turn to!

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: I'm your mother! I'm your mother, Reina!

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: He told the monster to go away, and told me to run... He kept me safe!

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: But I was too scared to move!

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: You and Kurt did your best.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: I'm sorry I wasn't there with you.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: I'm sorry I couldn't keep you safe...

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: That isn't what I was doing...

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: He never should've let me live!

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: The politicians have turned this \Ninto an international crisis.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: The Ants are no longer involved.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: You'll be classified as a new Magical Beast.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: Well, if they label you as a good \NMagical Beast, you'll be fine.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: Actually, something has been bothering me.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: She keeps saying her name isn't Reina.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: I wouldn't recommend sending \Nhim to a specialist until he can be taken off life support.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: I've never seen or heard of anything like this.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: How could this happen overnight \Nto a twelve-year-old boy?

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: He's a hero who's earned special treatment.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: I will cover all the expenses.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: If necessary, we may have to \Nrebuild this entire hospital.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: In any case, we cannot let Gon die.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: In the end, you did everything by yourself...

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: Kite saved your life, and he \Nhas no connection to me.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: I wanted you to ask for my \Nhelp in defeating Pitou!

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: Did you say that to me as a teammate?

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: You run ahead, while I clean up after you.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: But this time, I won't let it slide.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: I'm going to heal you up!

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: We're assembling a team of \Nmedical specialists to save Gon.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: I must head back, so I can use \NHide and Seek to transport equipment and people.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
Homecoming x And x True Name.
