Line: In response to Netero's message, the Zodiacs, the Hunter Association's leaders, \Nassembled at headquarters that day.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: Next time: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: I won't say anything until I've seen your face.

Title: Homecoming x And x True Name.
Line: I'm going to heal you up, so you have to apologize!

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Chairman Netero gathered the top \Nleaders of the Hunter Association, the Zodiacs, for the purpose of \Nelecting the next chairman.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Twelve Hunters whose abilities \Nthe chairman had recognized.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: In emergencies, he entrusted \Nthem with leading the Association.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: When nothing was happening, they \Naccompanied him in leisure activities.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Each Zodiac is assigned a code name...

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: And most members, out of \Nadoration for the chairman, made moving efforts to embody their code names, such as changing their names or personas.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: I thought we had all the Zodiacs present, but the Rat is missing.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: The Vice Chairman is very busy, even at a time like this.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: It's because it is a time like this.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: He's scrambling to secure votes for himself, I'm sure.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Ginta... You're loud, annoying, and you smell!

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Even the habitual slacker Ging showed up!

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Guess the Rat's just a scumbag.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: What do you mean, "even" I showed up?

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Go ahead and try it, dumbass.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Why didn't the chairman call us to help?

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Morel and Knov were above that kind of job!

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: "Above" is not the word you're looking for.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: You wanted to hunt the Ants yourself, did you not?

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: The chairman wanted all of us together for this.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Let's wait for him to arrive.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Everyone is in a frenzy over what's \Ngoing on with East Gorteau.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Then let's begin this meeting on the \Nelection of the next chairman.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Why are you leading the meeting?

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Don't boss us around after you showed up late.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Pariston, you're irritating! \NYou're a creep! Get lost!

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Well, I wasn't sure if I should take the lead.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: But you know, I'm the Vice Chairman.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: I outrank the rest of you, and I'm \Ngood at coordinating these things.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: I'm sure you all want to finish this quickly.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: If we rank by age, Botobai-san should lead.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Judging by ability to foster progress, \NCheadle-san should lead.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Both are better suited to the task than I.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Would one of you be willing to take over?

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: I'll refrain. You'd probably give me a hard time.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Forget it. Just lead the meeting.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Just come out and say you \Nwant to do it, scumbag.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: In that case, if anyone objects \Nto me leading this meeting, raise your hand.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: I object! I object! I seriously object!

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: The majority says I should continue.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Of course, we can discuss any \Ncomplaints as they arise.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: I'm ready to step down anytime.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: I will run for the position of chairman, so let's not bother with an election.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: My point is that we'll waste time and money.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: No one here will vote for you.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Together, you can only muster eleven votes.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Do you know how many Hunters \Nare in the Association?

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: The late Chairman Netero was too strong...

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: So he couldn't understand \Nthe feelings of the weak.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: The same can be said for all of you.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: However, I can understand the weak!

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: That is the kind of Chairman I seek to be!

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: The weak end up as your slaves, \Nworking under the name of intermediaries.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: How much have you made off \Nthem, Prince of Kickbacks?

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Please, you have it wrong. I'm asking \Nthem to contribute to the pool.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: It's meant to help the Association expand.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Do you know what that number represents?

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: The number of Hunters who've \Ngone missing in the three years since you became Vice Chairman.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: As professionals who risk our lives, we're obligated to be aware of the \Nsituations our trusted associates are in.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: A missing Hunter is more bizarre than \Na Hunter's unexpected death.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Before you became Vice Chairman, the \Naverage was 0.6 Hunters missing per year.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Do you have anything to say?

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: That number is tragic... It pains me greatly.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Once I become Chairman, \Nthe number will surely decrease!

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: I'm going to carry on the old man's will.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Don't want to vote for either of them!

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Ging-san, I hear something \Nhappened to your son...

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Would he even realize I was there?

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: I heard he's in critical condition.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Maybe I shouldn't go after all...

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: If he dies after I do, I'll have wasted my time.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Uh, can I ask a question?

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: First, shouldn't we reevaluate \Nthe process for running?

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: You're the one who started it!

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: I only offered to serve in hopes \Nof saving us money and time.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: If we can't avoid the process, \Nlet's first decide how to go about it.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: When he controls the pace, everything becomes more complicated.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: In that case, we can draw lots.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: How can we have our leader chosen by chance?

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: I'll give a sheet of paper to each of you.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: I want each of you to write what you believe to be the optimal election process, with the prerequisite of achieving \Nat least 95% voter turnout.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: And a third party will pick one \Nof the proposals at random.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Each proposal has a 1 in 12 chance.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: So there won't be any hard feelings.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: That's fine, since I won't lose.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: But we should write down our names, \Nso we know whose idea is chosen.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: She said the odds are 1 in 12, but that isn't true.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: If the ten of us write something \Nthat puts Pariston... and Ging, if possible... at a disadvantage, our odds will be 5 in 6.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: If we record how each person votes,

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Should we use anonymous ballots to allow \Nfor dividing points among candidates?

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Would our intermediaries then \Nbetray us with no guilt or fear?

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: There are twelve sheets of paper inside.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: It will determine the rules \Nwe will use for the election.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: You want me to pick one?

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: He's no Pariston, but he's still trouble.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: "All Hunters are both candidates and voters."

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: "If the winner of the first election fails \Nto receive a majority of votes, the top sixteen will have a runoff.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: If a majority is still not achieved, there will \Nbe another runoff with half the candidates."

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: "If the turnout for any given vote is under \N95%, that vote must be redone."

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: "Voters must write their name on the ballot. \NAnonymous votes will be invalid."

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Why force people to sign them?

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Are you an idiot? A total idiot?!

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: When everyone knows who voted for whom, it's a lot more entertaining.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: He only cares about having fun!

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: "The election committee chairman \Nwill be Ging Freecss."

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: I didn't include such a rule...

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: I was too focused on the actual rules.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: This is what Ging really wanted.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Now he can control the election as he pleases.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: This drawing was to determine how the \Nelection would be conducted, correct?

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Rules one through four are fine, but the chairman should be chosen separately.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: What brings you here so early?

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Yeah, I happened to be in the area.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: I saw the old man's video.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Can you leave one by the phone \Nin the conference room?

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Oh, there should already be one.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Is there also a trashcan like this one?

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: These are rules for the election, yes?

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: In a few days, the Zodiacs will gather here.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Most likely, there will be a drawing.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: If we tried to hold a vote or come to a \Nconsensus, it would take too long.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: 1 in 12 odds would be acceptable, \Nas long as it might give him an advantage.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Either way, it's a win for him.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: And everyone else will think \Ntheir odds are 5 in 6...

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: I expect Cheadle will propose it.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Piyon would be a long shot.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Kanzai would be a really long shot...

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: And they'll ask me to hold the drawing?

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Everyone else in this building supports Pariston.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: If these rules look acceptable, fold it three \Ntimes, and keep it until the meeting.

Line: If they don't ask for you or if \NI fold my paper differently,

Line: I'll look at the floor, and you should \Nburn that piece of paper.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: In my opinion, if you're willing \Nto become Chairman...

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: I'm not doing this because I \Nwant to change the result.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: All I'm doing is furthering the old man's will.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: I'm not looking for any trouble.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: If I leave that as Rule #5, it'll give people pause.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: And if I agree to concede that rule, they'll be more ready to accept the rest.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: This is how criminals con people.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Ging-san, why do this if you don't want to change the result?

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: That's a strange question to ask.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: If I can get my target to move as I want,

Line: I just want to enjoy the process.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: The election committee was composed \Nof the twelve Zodiacs.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Cluck, one of the Zodiacs, \Nsent ballots to every Hunter.

Line: Which means that is the number of candidates.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Each Hunter must bring their own ballot.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Ballots may only be entered when at least three committee members are present, \Nand identification has been verified.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: The voting takes place in the Hunter \NAssociation headquarters.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: As long as three or more \Ncommittee members are present, absentee ballots may be entered \Nat a different location.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: The vote will take place from 12:00 AM on August 8th \Nto 11:59:59 PM on August 8th.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Any voting that occurs away from headquarters \Nmust follow this schedule.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Votes will be tallied the same day.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: And it is now August 8th, 12:00 AM.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: I wouldn't think a murderer would be interested \Nin such an ordinary event.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: I'd like to speak to him.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: He said the next time we see \Nhim here will be at the runoff.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Why don't you take your paper and leave?

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Get lost! Aren't you done here?

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Ten points, twenty points, forty-five points.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Ten points, two points, fifty points, thirty points.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: I guess pro Hunters are still nothing special...

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: If I want someone to fight, \Nit'll have to be a Zodiac.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Ah, I have the results for the \N13th chairman's election.

Line: (Wrote own name only, misspelled name, \Nvoted for previous chairman, no name given, etc.) \N\N(Gon, Shoot, Kurapika, Killua, \NShalnark, and others, totaling 28)

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: None of the candidates received a majority.

Line: As the conditions were not met, \Nthe vote must be redone.

Line: I won't allow anyone to view the ballots.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Since I was designated election chairman, this is my decision to make.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: It's no fun if I can't see who voted for whom!

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: You probably don't watch the news.

Line: The election was held because \NChairman Netero died.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Rumors say he died alongside \Nthe mutant Ants he was fighting, and the Association received \Na lot of land in reward.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: A lot's happened around the world, while you were chasing Chrollo.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: If you'd stopped to think for a moment, you could have fought the \Nchairman or the Ants.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: That would require stopping to think...

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Maybe you can become my manager?

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Gon and Killua also joined the Ant hunt.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Gon's on the verge of death, and Killua's \Ngone to speak to our father.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: At this rate, they'll both die.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: There is actually another \Nyounger Zoldyck brother...

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: I want to get rid of him.

Title: Debate x Among x Zodiacs.
Line: Who is the fifth brother they share?

Line: Next time: Request x And x Wish.

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: On August 8th at 12:00 AM, in the Hunter Association main headquarters, the voting to elect Netero's successor, the 13th Chairman, began.

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: The rules set by Ging made all of the six hundred and sixty-one members both a candidate and voter.

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: On this day, voter turnout was below the required 95%, meaning the vote had to be redone.

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: Election for the 13th Chairman \N\N1) Pariston ‚Äî 251 (37.9%) \N2) Cheadle ‚Äî 46 \N3) Ickshonpe ‚Äî 28 \N4) Botobai ‚Äî 27 \N5) Mizaistom ‚Äî 24

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: 8) Cutie, Sanbica, \NTeradein, Bushidora ‚Äî 10 \N12) Loupe ‚Äî 9 \N13) Linne, Biscuit ‚Äî 8 \N15) Tsezguerra ‚Äî 7 \N16) Knov, Kanzai ‚Äî 6 \N18) Kite, Satotz ‚Äî 4 \N20) Menchi, Geru, 13 others ‚Äî 3 \N35) Saiyu, 11 others ‚Äî 2 \N47) Gon, Hanzo, 16 others ‚Äî 1 also failed to meet the requirements,

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: Vote must be retaken because \Nrequirements were not met. and had to be redone again.

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: Taking the results from the \Ntwo votes into consideration...

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: First, we will have Beans-san review all ballots before they are entered, to reduce \Nthe number of invalid votes.

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: Hunters who violate the rules by \Nabstaining or submitting invalid votes will have their licenses temporarily taken away.

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: If we implement the first, \Ndo we still need the second?

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: Just getting rid of the invalid \Nvotes would put us over 95%.

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: Some Hunters may play hooky when they \Nlearn they can't submit invalid votes.

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: There are those who would trample \Non the former chairman's wishes.

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: Drop it. You'll only waste time.

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: Oh? Did I say something wrong?

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: The former chairman declared that \Na 95% turnout was required, so Hunters who submit invalid votes or \Nwon't vote are betraying his memory.

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: They just don't want to see you become chairman!

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: Then they should vote for someone else.

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: I'm sure there are other qualified candidates.

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: Though that isn't how the majority of Hunters feel...

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: Is that too hard for you, with your limited \Nvocabulary and math skills?

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: I told you that you'd only waste time.

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: Before adding new rules, \NI believe we should broadcast each candidate's message.

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: Besides, abstaining and submitting invalid \Nvotes are not technically violations.

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: I fully agree with your first statement, but the second makes me \Nwonder if I heard right...

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: I cannot believe those words came from one of the former chairman's leading supporters.

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: The former chairman said that the difficulty of this election was D-rank.

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: Which means, for us Hunters with stars, \Nthis should be a simple task.

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: In other words, the former chairman \Ntrusted us to handle this.

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: Don't talk! Keep your mouth shut!

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: The difficulty level is just his way of \Nexpressing his degree of trust in the Zodiacs.

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: If it's S, he's encouraging us.

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: If it's F, he's challenging us.

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: You can spin it however you want, but abstaining and submitting invalid \Nvotes don't violate any rules, scumbag.

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: I was only insinuating that those \NHunters are mistaken in their manner of paying respects to the former chairman.

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: The message is that making the election \Na success would be the right way to pay our respects to him.

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: Then, say that during your speech!

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: If you make it a rule, that's coercion!

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: Is coercion such a bad thing?

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: My reasons are different than yours, but I agree that, barring \Nextraordinary circumstances, no Hunters should be abstaining \Nor submitting invalid votes.

Title: Request x And x Wish.
Line: I hope you aren't going to say that, \Nduring that time, Hunters who have their licenses taken away \Naren't considered pro Hunters.

Title: Request x And x Wish.

Line: I'd like to use Speed of Lightning to keep going, but to be safe, I should save my \Nenergy for getting into town.

Title: Magician x And x Butler.
Line: If I were gone, would everyone get along better?

Title: Magician x And x Butler.
Line: I were the only person in the \Nworld who really loved you, would you be sad?

Title: Magician x And x Butler.
Line: I'm so happy, I can't stop smiling.

Title: Magician x And x Butler.
Line: You don't need to worry about anyone else.

Title: Magician x And x Butler.
Line: I guess this won't be easy.

Title: Magician x And x Butler.
Line: A magician who wishes to stay anonymous.

Title: Magician x And x Butler.
Line: You two shouldn't be trying to fight back.

Title: Magician x And x Butler.
Line: Save your energy for the mission at hand.

Title: Magician x And x Butler.
Line: A power that lets you rapidly fire coins \Nwith more power than bullets...

Title: Magician x And x Butler.
Line: Your power is strong enough to explain why \Nyou'd send your subordinates away.

Title: Magician x And x Butler.
Line: My coins pack enough power that you \Ncan't escape unscathed if they hit.

Title: Magician x And x Butler.
Line: He must have used his power.

Title: Magician x And x Butler.
Line: My aura possesses the qualities \Nof both gum and rubber.

Title: Magician x And x Butler.
Line: I hope you don't regret it, you hack magician!

Title: Magician x And x Butler.
Line: Telling my name to someone \Nabout to die is pointless.

Title: Magician x And x Butler.
Line: It doesn't matter that you \Nknow what my power is.

Title: Magician x And x Butler.
Line: Hisoka and Gotoh are about to engage in battle.

Title: Magician x And x Butler.
Line: While a furious battle takes place,

Title: Magician x And x Butler.
Line: Next time: Needles x And x Debt.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: You removed the needle, didn't you?

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Then I won't have to hold back when I kill you.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: You can't kill family members \Nduring an inner mission.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: You shouldn't consider that thing \Nto be a member of the family.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: They're all thinking the same thing!

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: I'll beat you at your own game.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: To save Gon, Killua is heading \Nfor the city with Alluka.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Hisoka, who is working with Illumi to kill Alluka, confronted Gotoh and the other \Nbutlers escorting them.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: A power that lets you rapidly fire coins \Nwith more power than bullets...

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Your power is strong enough to explain why \Nyou'd send your subordinates away.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: My coins pack enough power that you \Ncan't escape unscathed if they hit.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: He must have used his power.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: My aura possesses the qualities \Nof both gum and rubber.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: I hope you don't regret it, you hack magician!

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Telling my name to someone \Nabout to die is pointless.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: It doesn't matter that you \Nknow what my power is.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Were my eyes just accustomed \Nto your attack that time?

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Yeah, it was a lot slower.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Because I diverted some \Npower to make them spin.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: If you don't release your ability, \Nyou'll be strangled by your own aura.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Or would you prefer your body riddled with holes?

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: He dodged my attack from that position?

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: I sent my gum out with the first card...

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: So it would be ready to activate anytime after I removed the gum from my feet.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Now, this evil magician has a lethal pop quiz for you.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: I took twenty-two coins from your attack.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: How many coins will I return to you?

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: He's going to use the gum to send \Nthe coins flying back at me?

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: You will have to find out for yourself.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Even if the answer is greater than twenty-two,

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: The answer is enough to kill you.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: A lethal pop quiz doesn't \Nneed to be answered.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Forty kilometers until we reach the next town.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Alluka, you're gonna feel a little zap again.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: If he runs at that speed on pavement, \NI won't be able to catch up on my own.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Master Killua is headed for Parasta.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: I need you to follow the road.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: With my grandmother's motorcycle, \Nit'll be faster with two riders.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: We'll be using our auras as fuel, so this will be more tiring than if you were to run.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: I know I'm carrying Alluka, but Speed of Lightning is at full power!

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: If I go this way, you can't follow on a motorcycle!

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: At Master Killua's speed, it'll take less \Nthan ten minutes to reach Parasta.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: It'll take Master Illumi over twenty minutes by car.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: What will he do with his ten-minute lead?

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: What's the first thing Master Killua \Nwill want to do after he loses us?

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: And how can he contact his friends \Nwithout us finding out?

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: He'll need to check for any \Ntracing or listening devices, and use someone else's phone.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Think about what matters in this situation!

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: We may know where Master Killua is, but if we can't get near him, \Nwe won't know what he's doing.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Sounds like you only have one.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Without at least five or six airships heading \Nto different places, we'll never lose Illumi!

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Split up, and make the arrangements.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: This airship will take us to our destination.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: We'll have to pay for two tickets, \Nor they'll figure out it's unmanned.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: I know that! Do you take me for a fool?

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: What names should we put the tickets under?

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Look, can't you do anything by yourself?

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Hey! You were pestering me as a distraction, \Nweren't you? You helped them escape!

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Once I've dispatched the other \Nflights, I'll ride one of them.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: If you follow them on the ground, \Nbe sure you aren't followed.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: If you follow them by air, it'll be more obvious!

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: I can serve as a decoy.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: And since I plan to join up with Gotoh, \Nit'll be easier to move by airship.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: The real you is pretty cute.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: I'm sure that Master Killua will \Nlike you more that way.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: A-Are you making fun of me?

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: I can't get in touch with Gotoh-san.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Got it. I'll try calling him.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Your older brother wants to \Nkill your younger brother?

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Alluka's the only one who can heal Gon.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: But Illumi wants to kill Alluka.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Because he thinks that my wish may \Nend up wiping out the entire family.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Why don't we just wait for \Nthem around the hospital?

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: The closer we get to the hospital, \Nthe more likely we are to fail.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Killua's friends will be in the vicinity.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: And if we just hang around waiting, \Nthey'll realize something isn't right.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Will you bring in more allies?

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: No, I have no more allies.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Seems like a waste, but I guess I'll use my needles.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: If I stick them in someone and give orders, \Nthey'll work hard for me until death.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Though, they usually die from working too hard.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: If segregationists knew about \Nthat, they'd be all over it.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Illumi will probably follow the airships by ground.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: My butlers have dispatched seven decoys.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: My brother doesn't usually rely on others, so he'll probably use Needlemen.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Nen{\i0 to create soldiers that fight to the death for him.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: He sacrifices ordinary civilians to do it.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Illumi's powerful aura enters \Nthe victims through the needles, so the moment they're pierced, \Nthey turn into vegetables.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Morel, I need you to get some Hunters to take the Needlemen into custody.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: If we have proof that he's harmed \Nmultiple innocent civilians beyond recovery, then it's okay to hunt him down, \Neven if he's a pro Hunter, right?

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Killua sought this confirmation because of \Nwhat the fourth Hunter Commandment said.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: A Hunter may never target another Hunter.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: However, this does not apply to Hunters \Nwho commit heinous criminal acts.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: I believe some of the candidates were talking about changing the Commandments and Hunter Exam.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: If we catch Illumi, a lot of people who agree with \Nthose views will come forward.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Killua, are you really going to sell your brother out?

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: I won't forgive anyone who tries to hurt Alluka.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Not even if he's my own brother.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: I'll do whatever it takes to crush him.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Teradein and Bushidora will \Nprobably agree to help.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: There should be many Hunters \Nwho will gladly lend a hand.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Since you're coming to the city \Nwhere the Hunter Association HQ is, you'll be right under our noses.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: But I'll make sure everyone understands \Nhow dangerous our opponent is.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: The mission will be to secure the \NNeedlemen, not to go after Illumi.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: I've accessed Parasta Airport's flight records.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: There are six airships landing within twenty \Nto thirty kilometers of the hospital.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: We don't know where Killua \Nand his butlers will land.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: And Illumi can't pursue what he can't see.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Illumi and the Needlemen will try to \Nstay in visual range of the airships, as they follow on the ground.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: They will be vulnerable to attack \Nat a number of points before they reach Swaldani City, where the hospital is.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: So we need to send Hunters to those points.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Our top priority is recovering the Needlemen.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: We can confirm if there are needles afterward.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Capture anyone who approaches the airship!

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Hisoka, can you dispose of the fakes for me?

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: I always knew the fourth Commandment \Nwas fundamentally wrong.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: We can't wait for a villain like this to appear!

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: The Association's honor will be sullied.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: The exam needs to be more strict.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: If they were required to behave \Nproperly before joining, we wouldn't have this problem.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: For the three of us, the anti-chairman faction, to leave the Association.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Today, I‚ÄîTeradein‚ÄîLoupe, and \NBushidora have joined forces.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: We three are commonly known \Nas the anti-chairman faction, but that is not a name of our choice.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: The Hunter souls within us were inherited \Nfrom the former chairman, I assure you.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: And so, to carry out his will, we seek to reform the highly versatile team \Nto which the former chairman belonged,

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Seirin Group the legendary Seirin Group.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: And I, Bushidora, will serve \Nas captain of the troops.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: In this election, as an expression of our solidarity, we request that all votes go \Nto Teradein, the leader.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: We hope that everyone who agrees with our message will vote \Nfor our comrade Teradein.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Now, as we address our message, we have received trustworthy \Ninformation from a reliable source stating that multiple parties have found \Na certain Hunter guilty of many foul crimes.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: We are currently pursuing this Hunter.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Ladies and gentlemen, let us come together to rebuild the \NHunter Association with wisdom and integrity!

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: And so, the conflict within \Nthe Zoldyck family over Alluka grows in intensity as it now involves \Nthe Hunter Association chairman election.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Teradein and his allies seek \Nto control the Association.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: As the election continues, \NIllumi manages to capture Killua.

Title: Needles x And x Debt.
Line: Next time: Sin x And x Claw.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: In the fifth vote in the election \Nfor the 13th chairman,

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: 6) Botobai ‚Äî 26 \N7) Mizaistom ‚Äî 21 \N8) Morel ‚Äî 20 \N9) Biscuit ‚Äî 18 \N10) Saccho ‚Äî 16 \N11) Linne ‚Äî 15 \N12) Cutie ‚Äî 10 \N13) Ging ‚Äî 7 \N14) Sanbica ‚Äî 3 \N15) Loupe, Bushidora ‚Äî 0 \N\NValid Votes: 633 (28 Absentees) \NTurnout: 95.8%

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: But since he didn't receive \Nthe majority of the valid votes,

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: 1) Pariston ‚Äî 274 (41.4%) \N2) Teradein ‚Äî 77\N3) Cheadle ‚Äî 63 \N4) Leorio ‚Äî 55 \N5) Ickshonpe ‚Äî 28 those in the top eight must hold a runoff.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Our beloved Pariston will bring my dream \Nof a cutiful Hunter Association to life.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: I'm sure everyone knows \Nhow crazy he could be.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: But there's one thing I can say.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Just like in the battle with the Ants, you can't escape danger just \Nby being good all the time!

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: I'll continue to support the \NAssociation behind the scenes.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: I won't proffer any names, but I hope you vote for someone worth supporting.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: I would like to thank all \Nthose who voted for me...

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: I managed to obtain a map.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: It has routes and destinations for all six airships.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: They seem to be on one of \Nthe two remaining airships.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Want me to send a picture?

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: I'll be using Texture Surprise to \Nchange it a little, though.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: An idiot over here was carrying the map, too.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: And I already know which airship Killua took.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Oh, right... He has a spotter.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: I don't think I'm so senile that someone \Ncould tail me when I'm tailing another.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Since the mission began, I've felt eyes on me.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: They're quite far away, \Nyet I can't shake them off.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: This is the first time that's happened.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: This person must be very good...

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Fortunately, it appears that \Nclouds have come out tonight.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Master Killua is sure to use \Nthat to his advantage.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Tsubone's power, known as Rider's High, allows her to transform herself \Ninto various different vehicles.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: However, the vehicles are \Nfueled by the rider's aura, so she cannot use her power alone.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: When we're above the clouds, no one can watch us from the ground, \Nno matter how strong the scope.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Amane, if there are any suspicious aircraft \Naround, we'll take them down.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: There's still time before either ship will land.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: I'll help Hisoka out a bit longer.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Nothing out of the ordinary here.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: The target has yet to appear.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: We've lost all contact with Point C!

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Nothing has happened at Point A.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Should we tell them to send support?

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: We can't assume that Point A is safe.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Illumi manipulates others with his needles.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: He may control that area already.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: You're saying he's killed over twenty people?

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: It doesn't matter how many \Namateurs we throw at him.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: We should warn the pros who are \Ngoing after the Needlemen.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: The two airships they were \Nfollowing are in close proximity.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: It looks like I must go.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: It's a chance to show that I'm worthy \Nto be Captain of the Seirin Group!

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Those who are able should still go.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Even if we exclude everyone who's hunting, we can still finish in the top four.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: We must continue voting in the election.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Even if we can't predict the outcome, I don't \Nwant to manipulate it through absenteeism.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Why don't we hire Association Hunters?

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: If we show that we're trying to carry on \Nthe spirit of the Hunter Association, we could win some of the votes \Nthat are defaulting to Pariston.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: He's right. We should move immediately!

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: If everything works out, \Nthe Association Hunters will be killed and miss the next vote.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: If I told him that, I'm sure Teradein would object.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: If we can't predict the outcome, we should force more absentees, \Nso it will be invalid.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Teradein is too honest, and Bushidora can't plan well.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Teradein-san has requested Hunters in \Ncompliance with the Association's terms?

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Accept the request! Do the job!

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: You don't need to be concerned about me.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: In fact, if there's no limit on the \Nnumber of Hunters we can send, spread the word and take everyone.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: If you come across anything you want \Nto ask or tell me while on the job, feel free to contact me anytime.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: If anything needs to be improved, \Nwe can work it out.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Yes, they make an excellent trio.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: 6th Election for the 13th Chairman \N\NTotal Number of Hunters: 661

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: The vote's invalid because the turnout was 91.2%.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: 1) Pariston ‚Äî 272 (41.1%) \N2) Teradein ‚Äî 73 \N3) Cheadle ‚Äî 66 \N4) Leorio ‚Äî 58 \N5) Morel ‚Äî 53 \N6) Mizaistom ‚Äî 44 \N7) Botobai ‚Äî 37 \N8) Ickshonpe ‚Äî 0 \N\NValid Votes: 603 (58 Absentees) \NTurnout: 91.2% (Invalid)

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Everyone pursuing the Needlemen was wiped out.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Our members, the camera crew, \Nand the Association Hunters!

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Illumi must have hired dozens of strong soldiers!

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Since we took flight, I haven't \Nfelt anyone watching us.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Which means we really were being tailed before.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Well, since we're this far from \Nthe hospital, it should be fine.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: If anyone sees Alluka when we enter the hospital,

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Tsubone will say that Alluka's \Npower has been revealed, and she'll take us home immediately.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: But if I clear the area, that'll only \Nmake it easier for Illumi to act.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Taking this airship to the \Nhospital would be difficult.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Gotoh's idea to drive a car straight \Ninto the hospital may be best.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Then I need you to tell Hishita and \Nthe rest to send cars immediately to the following three locations.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: We've lost the ground pursuit \Nby flying above the clouds.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: We'll be fine until we're in the car.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: After that, we have to pick the \Nbest route to the hospital.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Since we had to loop around, it took longer.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: But now we're sixty kilometers \Nfrom the hospital.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: There are people in front of the car.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Following us should have been impossible!

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Was it the car? Did they follow the car?

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: I can't do that, Master Killua.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Not unless Master Illumi orders it.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Unless he knew which airship we were on!

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Even if he knew which airship, \Nhe couldn't be here.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: We flew dozens of kilometers over the clouds.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: He couldn't have followed us on the ground!

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Kil, you seem to be hiding something \Nfrom me about Alluka.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Do I use Godspeed to get Hishita out of the car \Nand use it to escape?

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Or do I go back to the airship \Nand try to escape by air?

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: If I were alone, those options would work.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: But it'd be hard to manage \Nthat and keep Alluka safe.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: How did you know we were here?

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: If I tell you, will you give me Alluka?

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Alluka has an ordinary child's strength.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: A single attack from one of the \NNeedlemen could be lethal.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: The fool who was completely tricked.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Your mother can see everything that I see through this scope.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: She probably transmitted the \Nvideo to you, Master Illumi.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Bingo. Tsubone served as my spy.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: I felt eyes on me again and realized the truth.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Ah, so you actually felt us watching...

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Well, now you know the truth, but you can't remove that scope because \NMom ordered you to wear it.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Tsubone, give me the nail from your middle finger.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Tsubone, give me the nail \Nfrom your ring finger.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Amane and I will take care of the rest.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Please allow me this opportunity to \Nmake amends for impeding your mission.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Are you going to do it?

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: That means when you save Gon, \Nyou'll follow the same process, right?

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: If you'd sacrifice those two to kill me, you won't have any problem sacrificing \Na bunch of strangers to save Gon.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: The same person can't make \Ntwo wishes in a row.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Would it be more fun to kill Alluka, \Nearning Killua's wrath, or more fun to spare Alluka and save \NGon, making Illumi my enemy?

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: If you say yes, I'll be happy to die.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Your inner mission will have succeeded.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: It's against the rules for family \Nmembers to kill one another, but the thing that will grant your wish... isn't family.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Assuming there's a secret rule that \Nmakes rule 5 not apply to Killua...

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: If my death means no other family \Nwill die, that's acceptable.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Killua will suffer for the rest of his life.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: I will live in his heart forever.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: My death in exchange for your word \Nthat you yourself will make the wish to save Gon.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Alluka lives while Illumi dies, but I don't earn Killua's wrath.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: So if Gon is healed, I neither gain nor lose anything.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: I will kill Alluka to earn Killua's wrath, then take out Killua to earn Illumi's wrath.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Tsubone, put out your left hand.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Something is skilled at destroying, \Nbut fixing isn't her forte.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: When she's fixing, she must touch the target.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Something is the one who calls me "Killua."

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Healing someone is tiring, \Nso Something must sleep.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Something has never made a cruel \Nrequest after healing someone!

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: The one who's cursed is the one who wishes.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: If you refer to Something as an object again,

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: I won't consider you my brother anymore.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: If you can heal Gon without any risk, that's terrific.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: But that doesn't change the fact \Nthat Something is dangerous, and my questions remain unanswered.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Such as how Milluki's rule 5 doesn't apply to you.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Until you tell me everything, \NI won't let Alluka go.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: That's why I can't tell you anything.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: If you knew the last rule, you'd...

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: No, all of you... would put needles in my head again.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Master Killua, I will take you to the hospital.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Captain Bushidora, of the Seirin Group, was killed in pursuit of the wicked Hunter \Nthat we hoped to bring to justice.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: This confirms that demons are hiding among us!

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: However, I regret to say that the Seirin Group does not have the power to bring the \NHunter, or Hunters, to justice.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Everyone! This is an urgent matter that the Association must band \Ntogether to resolve at once!

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: That is why our goal is to ensure \Nthat voter turnout exceeds 95%, and that the winner has a majority!

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Thus, we are currently in negotiations \Nwith Morel, who has strong ties with the former chairman's faction, in hopes \Nthat he will be our new captain.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: At the same time, we are prepared \Nto reveal the name, face, and abilities of this demon to prevent further tragedy.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: If you agree with our ideals, please... cast a vote for Teradein!

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: I'm pretty sure I turned you down.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: I agree that I was fairly close \Nto the former chairman, and I participated in the Ant extermination.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: It was determined that my support was required, given the nature of the operation.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: I wouldn't say that I'm strong.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Didn't you watch them introduce the top sixteen?

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: I belong in the water. I'm a water man.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: And if you're in a hurry to end the election, you could tell your supporters to vote for Pariston!

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Though, I'd rather die than vote for him...

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: If you release his identity, you and a bunch of other fools will end up dying.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: And don't use the "Seirin Group" \Nname when you're so weak!

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: I'm not interested in teaming up with \Npeople who won't heed my warnings, and I'm not interested in becoming chairman.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: 7th Election for the 13th Chairman \NTotal Number of Hunters: 635 \N\N1) Pariston 293 (46.1%) \N2) Leorio 95 \N3) Cheadle 87 \N4) Mizaistom 72 \N5) Teradein 43 (Death confirmed during voting) \N6) Morel 14 \N7) Botobai, Ickshonpe 0 \N\NValid Votes: 604 (31 Absentees) \NTurnout: 95.1%

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: The results of the seventh vote call \Nfor a runoff between the top four.

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Is everything going according to Pariston's plan?

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: What does it take to move the human heart?

Title: Sin x And x Claw.
Line: Next time: Approval x And x Coalition.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: I heard that you're leaving tomorrow.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: You're abandoning the election and your son?

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Why don't you stay and see this through?

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: We already know the election's outcome.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Meeting that Leorio guy was the best part.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: He shows a lot of promise.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: We're down to four candidates. \NWe don't know the outcome.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: That's what I'm saying. \NSee? You do understand.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: I plan on voting for you today.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: What in the world are you talking about?

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: I'm saying the outcome will be \Nthat there is no outcome!

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Want to know how many days \Nit'll be before this is over?

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: How can you possibly know that?

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Because you and Mizai are in this to win.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: But if you really wanted to win, \Nyou should have tried harder before.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: You needed to use any means necessary during the second or third \Nvotes to secure a majority, and clear the turnout requirement.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Why are you telling me this now?

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: It's easy to say whatever you want in hindsight.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: If I'd warned you beforehand, \Nyou'd have done the opposite.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Well, I don't care if you think \Nthis is hindsight speaking.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: You can tell yourself that until the day this ends.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: You don't sound too happy about it.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: I don't know what Pariston is thinking.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Except you've never done anything \NI've told you to do...

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Okay, I'll start with what Pariston's thinking, then.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: But he doesn't want to lose, either.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Common sense tells you that people \Nwho want to win are stronger, right?

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Nothing wrong with that. You're right.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: And being right makes you predictable.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: That goes especially for when you want to win a game where you're trying to secure votes.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: See? You thought I was being disrespectful, right?

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: You're mad because you're big on morals, \Nbalance, and sticking to the manual.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: You're failing to act like a dog.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Pariston is familiar with both sides \Nof you, so he knows that.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: He knows exactly what you're \Nthinking and what you'll do next.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: And even then, he doesn't want to win.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: If I tell you what to do, you'll never listen.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: How many times must we go through this?

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Okay, I'll tell you what happens \Nif the game continues as is.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: First, you and Pariston will be the ones \Nremaining after the next vote.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: In the two-candidate vote after \Nthat, first and second will flip.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: And that's what will keep happening.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Pariston will probably try \Nto lower the turnout rate.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: The Association Hunters he has \Ncontrol over will refuse to vote.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: He doesn't want to win or lose.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: He'll drag things out until the very last day.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: He's just looking to have fun.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Well, I get bored a lot more quickly...

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Of the four remaining candidates, \NPariston is the only one who carries on Netero's will.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: You have no right to say that!

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Were you that fond of the dirty old man?

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Don't get too full of yourself!

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: You just have to tell me the day \Nwhen this election will end, you stupid vagabond!

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: But before this is over, you \Nshould learn to act in character.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: The day Netero blew himself up, one hundred large airships belonging \Nto the Hunter Association set off for East Gorteau.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: There's no record of their departure.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: All records show that they're \Nin hangars for maintenance.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: You had no idea, did you?

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: You should make friends with \Nsome mechanics and pilots.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: And they're all probably about to hatch.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Pariston plans to have some fun with them, now that he has such a huge playground.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: The day the election ends will be \Nthe day of the next Hunter Exam.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: However, if the Commandments are reformed, the situation will change slightly.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: You'll have to figure out the rest yourself.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Okay, we will now hold the eighth vote \Nfor the election of the 13th chairman.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Today, we will start by listening to speeches \Nfrom the four remaining candidates.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: After some debate among the candidates, \Nwe will move on to the vote.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Oh, I guess it's my fault...

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Now, first, we have comments from the \Ncandidates who did not qualify.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: First, I would like to thank everyone \Nwho supported me. Thank you.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: And if possible, going forward, I would ask those who had \Nfaith in me to give your votes to Cheadle.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: However, there are those among \Nus who share very similar goals.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: And the one who shares my goal is Cheadle.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Her desire to maintain balance will lead \Nthe Association in a better direction.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Where you people are now is not \Nmy reality, so do what you want.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Ging!! Don't try to run while you're \Nahead!! Get back here!!

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: We will now begin the speeches \Nfrom the candidates.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: There is one thing to note.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Everyone who's gathered inside the hall today will be asked to stay until the 13th \Nchairman has been selected.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: I'm waiting for her to wake up.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: It's possible that we will \Ncontinue to have multiple ties, but we've arranged for all necessary provisions, so you can rest easy repeating the vote as \Nmany times as necessary, be it for hours or days.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: You may not leave this hall until the \N13th chairman has been selected.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Now, we'll start with a speech from \Nthe candidate in fourth, Mizaistom.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: To eliminate Pariston, I will \Nserve as a sacrificial lamb.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Of the four candidates on stage,

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: I believe the one most qualified to be chairman is Cheadle.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: I won't say that I'm not willing \Nto become chairman.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: First, I must train the Hunters under me, and work to become a Triple Hunter.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: I would appreciate it if you'd respect my \Nwishes, and help end this election today.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: That's all I have to say.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Next, we have the candidate \Nin third, Cheadle-san.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Ladies and gentlemen, I believe the 13th chairman should be Leorio.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: That's all I have to say.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: I don't even want to be elected.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: But I guess I should say what I want.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: My focus right now isn't this election, anyway.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Next, we have the candidate \Nin second, Leorio-san.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: I won't let you have your way!

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: What am I doing up here?

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: I'll just say what's on my mind.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: If elected chairman, I'll treat the \NAssociation like it belongs to me!

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: My first command will be to order \Nall of you to help save Gon!

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: This isn't where I should be right now.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Well, it isn't like I could help \NGon if I were with him...

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: He's... Gon is fighting for his life now.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: But I only found out recently.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: While I was studying for myself, drinking, moving from place to place, jerking off, entertaining women, and surfing the Internet...

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Alongside the former chairman and their allies.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: One of them has put his life \Non the line to save Gon.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: All I could do was talk to Gon.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: So if I become chairman, \NI won't stop talking to you.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: If you have an idea, take action!

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: If there's something I can do, tell me.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: I think I understand why you \Ndidn't avoid his punch.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Even from that moment, \Nyou saw something in him.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: I'm fine with having him as chairman.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Damn, I think I said more than I needed to.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Forget the part about jerking off.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: If we're there to support him,

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: I'm sure he'll make a good chairman.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Finally, we have the candidate \Nin first place, Pariston-san.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: It doesn't matter what you say.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: My eighty-seven votes, \NMizai's seventy-two votes, and the fifty-seven independent votes will be added to Leorio's ninety-five.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: That gives him three hundred, eleven votes.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: He'll have over fifty percent of the vote.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Um, in a moment, I'm going to get loud.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Everyone, you can continue \Ntalking on the phone.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: This is the true Hunter spirit.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Once this election ends, I promise to \Ndo everything I can to help Gon-kun.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: However, we must keep that matter \Nseparate from the election.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Of the remaining candidates, \Nthe one most qualified to be chairman is Mizaistom-san.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: There's something I've learned after serving as Chairman Netero's \NVice Chairman for three years.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: There are three conditions a chairman needs.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: This is an absolute necessity, \Ngiven our job requirements.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: During the recent crisis, this was evident.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: As a Hunter, you can never have \Ntoo many years of experience.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Why do I feel so irritated when he's talking?

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: He never says what he truly thinks.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: There aren't too many people who make you think that the Association would be in good \Nhands if they were chairman.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Stop... Don't let emotions get the best of me.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Hey, you were supposed to laugh.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: I need to figure out what he's after.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: I believe that Mizaistom-san is the only \None possessing all three qualities.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: One hundred and twenty of Pariston's two \Nhundred ninety are Association Hunters.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Thirty of the votes come from the investigative and administrative \Ndepartments he heads.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Pariston is able to control those votes as he likes without any signs or speeches.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: We will now move on to the \Ndebate among the candidates.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Pariston's speech will create a split among the independents, who were all \Nmost likely leaning toward Leorio.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: I'm guessing this is how it will look.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Leorio: Leorio votes, Cheadle votes, Morel votes, Teradein votes \N\NPariston: Association Hunter and Administrative \NDepartment votes, Pariston personal votes \N\NMizaistom: Mizai votes, Pariston votes \N\NCheadle: Mizai votes

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: But that would just push the \Nelection out another vote, which matches our goal.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Will something change during the debate?

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Fine, then... I'll figure this out myself!

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: As I said earlier, I'm not interested \Nin becoming chairman.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: No, you said that you wouldn't say \Nyou're not willing to become chairman.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: However, this isn't about what you want, Mizai-san.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: What matters is how the voters feel.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Sometimes, there are situations where a job \Ncan only be done by a certain person.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: You shouldn't be talking about how you feel.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Stop the petty tricks, and let the voters decide.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: You have the nerve to say that?

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: But why is he pushing Mizai?

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Does he expect us to let greed get the better of \Nus and push Mizai to second?

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Because the votes for Leorio \Nare primarily independent.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: If Leorio loses, they're likely to swing to Pariston.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: But if Leorio remains, the votes previously cast for myself \Nand the openly anti-Pariston Mizai will go to Leorio.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: He'll hold on to Teradein's anti-Zodiac votes, and the Morel votes are also anti-Pariston.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Meaning that they'll never switch to Pariston.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Defeating Pariston is the ultimate goal.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: As a Crime Hunter, I trust my instinct.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: There's no proof, and it's entirely possible \Nthat his hands are clean.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: We can't let him run rampant within \Nthe Association any longer.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Since it appears that not even \NNetero could rein him in...

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: This election is where we must...

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: And so, the eighth vote for \Nthe 13th chairman begins.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: As Killua takes Something's hand, \Neverything approaches its end.

Title: Approval x And x Coalition.
Line: Next time: Defeat x And x Reunion.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: If you have an idea, take action!

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: If there's something I can do, tell me.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: The results of the eighth chairman election were promptly counted by Beans.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Now, please take a look at the result of \Nthe eighth election for the 13th chairman!

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Eighth Election for the 13th Chairman \N\N1) Leorio 282 (44.4%) \N2) Pariston 250 \N3) Mizaistom 58 \N4) Cheadle 16 \N\NTurnout: 95.4%

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: This puts Leorio in first place!

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: For the first time, Pariston hasn't \Nfinished in first place...

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: However, the first place vote-getter, Leorio, \Nreceived only 44.4% of the vote.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: That was below the 50% requirement, which means we'll finally have a run-off \Nbetween the top two vote-getters.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Then I'm gonna do whatever the hell I want.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: My friend is here, sleeping. He's very sick.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: I want to help get him on his feet again.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: You want Something to take over.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Boo! Just when I was able to spend time with you!

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: We'll be together from now on.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Killua is the one person who doesn't \Nhave to follow the rules.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Though I'll have to check whether it's specific to Killua or something \Nthat happens after a wish is used to heal.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Either way, the power to destroy and fix can become a powerful tool \Nif the user can be tamed.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: His utter lack of humanity and wicked ambition deviate even from the path of an assassin.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: When he was being controlled, he suffered less.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Alluka is only awake when Something is asleep.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: She spends less time as Alluka than one would think.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: The time after Something's requests \Naren't met and people die, until Something makes the next level-1 request...

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Or the time when request-making is paused \Nafter someone leaves Something before her three requests are complete...

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Or the time after Something fixes and falls asleep, until someone else makes a wish \Nto Alluka and has it granted...

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Making this the last wish and never \Nwishing to Something again would be the best thing that could happen.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: I've never felt anything like this before.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Are you serious? Are you serious?

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Then I'm going to do whatever I want.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Then let me ask the two remaining candidates if they have anything they want to say.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: If not, we will proceed with the final vote.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: It doesn't matter what you have to say.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Well, I have a feeling that \Nthis election is already over, but I would like to ask Leorio-san a question.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Can you answer this question for me again?

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: What will you do if you become chairman?

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Leorio-san, can you please \Ngive us your answer again?

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: What will you do if you become chairman?

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: And I'll make all of you help me!

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: This would have been the perfect time, but I'm not God.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: In that case, do you have any \Nplans for shuffling personnel or restructuring the organization?

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: I don't even know why I'm \Nstanding here right now!

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Those are all the questions I have.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Everyone was aware of those answers \Nwhen they voted for Leorio.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: His supporters applauded because they \Nhave every intention of backing him!

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Do you have any questions for me?

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: No! Let's just get this over with!

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Then I move for an emergency council.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: In accordance with the Eighth \Nand Ninth Hunter Commandments,

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: I move for a vote of confidence.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: The topic will be a revision of the Hunter \NCommandments and the Hunter Exam.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: First, I propose that we abolish the \Ncurrent Hunter Exam system.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: During the Zodiac council, we decided the Ten Commandments weren't to be touched!

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: The council reached an 11-1 majority decision.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: I was the only one in favor of \Nrevising the Ten Commandments.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: If Cheadle-san or Mizaistom-san were \Nstanding on the stage now,

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: I would have deferred to the council and \Nkept my mouth shut until the election ended.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: But both of them are out of the running.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: And Leorio-san has stated that he \Nhas no plan for the Association!

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: I can express my opinion as vice chairman, \Nand not as a member of the Zodiacs.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: This is the only chance I will ever get!

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Of course, I could use the Eighth Commandment to override the council's decision \Nand force the matter to a vote.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: But I wanted to avoid that.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: The Zodiacs are something precious \Nthat the former chairman left us.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Hey, if you say something stupid, \Nhe'll pay you back ten times over.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Honestly, part of me wishes to let this \Nmatter die without making waves.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: However, the late Teradein-san and \NBushidora-san made an excellent point.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: The Third and Fourth Commandments are suffering gravely as a result \Nof the current exam process!

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: He doesn't want to lose, either.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: He doesn't care about winning or losing, so with nothing to gain or lose, he can \Nalways stay dispassionate and calm, while he manipulates others and plays the rules against us in the worst way possible.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: If Leorio wins, I volunteer to serve as an advisor.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: I promise to conduct a comprehensive review of the Ten Commandments and \NHunter Exam at that point.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: I won't let you grab any of the Teradein votes!

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: I'll counter every point you've made!

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: To everyone who's voting for \Nthe potential Leorio shows, but who's concerned about \Nhow he will serve initially,

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: I will quell those concerns, even if it \Nrequires me to leave the Zodiacs.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: I have no idea what you people are talking about.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: But I'm in a hurry to save Gon \Nas quickly as possible!

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Did I l look that bad?

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Bad doesn't even begin to describe it!

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: He's healed now. Isn't that enough?

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Pariston wanted Leorio to be his final opponent!

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Leorio no longer has the motive or \Nsupport to become chairman.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Leorio, you can't tell Gon that Killua healed him.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
