Line: For Killua's sake, promise not to tell him.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: When did you predict that this would happen?

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: I don't have the ability to predict anything.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Please tell me. I want to know.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: It hurts to admit this, but I've been defeated.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: It was when Ging-san said he \Nwould run for chairman...

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: After he said he would run,

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: I asked a question to provoke him.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: And he responded that Gon-kun wouldn't die, right?

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: I could see the scene that \Njust transpired before us.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Well, I anticipated Ging-san \Nand I would stand on stage, and Ging-san would ultimately win.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: First, since Ging-san said Gon-kun wouldn't die,

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: I knew that meant there was a way to heal him.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: And that if he became part of the \Nelection, I would never win.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: That was the moment I was defeated.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: But Ging-san gave up on the election, then Leorio-san arrived, and hit him.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: When he stood on stage and talked about his friends risking \Ntheir lives to save Gon-kun,

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: I finally saw the complete picture.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: I was assured of my victory a moment ago, when I felt that immense power.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: I could sense that Gon-kun's friends had saved him.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: All that remained was to delay \Nthe vote until he arrived.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Oh, I'll retract the earlier motion, \Nso there's nothing for you to worry about.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: That was all the information you had?

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: I trust Ging-san as an enemy.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: And these are the friends that \NGing-san trusted to save his son.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Get on stage and say something!

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Man, I don't know what to do.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: But, well, this was always gonna happen...

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Gon has finally caught sight of Ging's back.

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: What will he say to him?

Title: Defeat x And x Reunion.
Line: Next time: Chairman x And x Release.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Because of me, Kite turned into a little girl!

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: I h-heard he was captured by the enemy.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Then Kite told me to run away, and Pitou showed up.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Kite lost his arm, I was knocked out, and then we trained...

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Shoot got Kite out of the Ants' nest, but it wasn't Kite...

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: They did all kinds of horrible things!

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Pitou said that Kite was already dead!

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Well, I don't get it, but just have a seat, okay?

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: We should both try to calm down...

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: It was because I insisted... on having my way!

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: I should have been the one who died!

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: He took you along because he believed in you.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: He told you to run because he'd \Nunderestimated the enemy.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: If he hadn't thought you capable, he wouldn't have let you accompany \Nhim, no matter what you'd said.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: It was his fault that he misjudged the enemy.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: You're also at fault for being too weak!

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: And you should apologize to Kite, not to me!

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: You didn't clearly say if he's dead or alive, but either way, you should apologize!

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: When apologizing to a friend, there's a rule.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: You promise to do things differently next time.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: And you keep that promise, no matter what.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Can I... talk to you some more later?

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: You never went to see Gon after he cleared it!

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Promise him you'll act more like a father!

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Hell, you don't have the right \Nto say you're his father!

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: You should have Leorio punch you again!

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: I'll be waiting, so get going!

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: How stupid do you think we are?

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: If you have a problem with \Nwhat I'm doing, bring it on!

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Yes, I still haven't given up.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: A new last chance has appeared!

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Due to the circumstances, no one \Ncan leave until the election is over.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: You're in a hurry, aren't you?

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: But this will be the final vote.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Once you vote, you'll be allowed to leave.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: If you tell us your choice right now, everyone here will accept that as a valid vote.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Between myself, Pariston, and Leorio-san, whom do you believe is most \Nfit to become chairman?

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: I should mention that the \Nformer chairman, Netero, is taking an extended vacation \Nafter defeating the Ant King.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: How can you say such a thing?

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: If Gon picks Leorio after his dramatic arrival, everyone may get caught up in \Nthe heat of the moment again and vote for Leorio.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Gon-kun, you can rely on your gut.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Be true to your heart, and pick one of us.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Nope, because Leorio wants \Nto become a doctor, so he can't be chairman!

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Is that all you have to say, you idiot?

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Someone stop this negligent jerk of a father!

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Zodiacs, don't just stand there \Nand smile! Do something!

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: I guess, in his own way, Ging's popular.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: And I taught him his techniques.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: There's a number that his \NCrazy Slots won't bring up unless he's adamant about not dying!

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: If he's still alive, that's probably why.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: He would never consider dying in your place.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: So don't mess up your apology.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Ninth Election for the 13th Chairman \N\NTotal Number of Hunters: 635 \N\N1) Pariston 458 (72.1%) \N2) Leorio 157 \N\NTurnout: 96.8%  Valid Votes: 615

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: And I have an important announcement.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: I, Pariston, name Cheadle-san as vice chairman, and resign as chairman.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: How long must you make fools of us?!

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: I didn't become vice chairman because \NI wanted to become chairman.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: I just wanted to hinder the chairman.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: When I said silly things to tease him,

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: I really wanted to play with him some more.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: I recommend that you reform the Hunter \NExam and Commandments quickly.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Cheadle-san, if the Association becomes \Na dull place under your leadership,

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: I'll get serious about toying with you.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: It sounds like he was traveling, \Nlooking for a way to save you.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Well, once we contact him, \NI'm sure he'll come see you.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: I need to apologize to Killua.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: When I was fighting the enemy, I got confused, and I said terrible things to him.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Well, sorry that I couldn't do anything \Nwhen you guys were in trouble.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: The requests following a wish for a computer should be more severe than playing \Ndead and a pat on the head.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: When I heard Milluki's report, \Nthat was the first thing that seemed off.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: And when the two-choice wish resulted \Nin a simple kiss on the cheek, it demanded fingernails, a far too heavy price.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Assuming that the fingernails were \Nthe price for the computer,

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Wish                                            Request that would match the balance between \Nwishes and requests seen previously.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: If my theory is correct, playing dead and the pat on the head \Nweren't requests from Something.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Thus, the two-choice wish didn't require a payment.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: One, because the wish was simple enough that Something's power wasn't required.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Two, because it wasn't a wish.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: However, there's still an unresolved question here.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: If playing dead and the pat on the head \Nweren't requests from Something...

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: They were requests from Alluka, not Something.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Killua claims that Something calls him "Killua," and the request to play dead was made to "Brother."

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Thus, the one who calls Killua "Brother" is Alluka.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: If the request came from Alluka, then Something wasn't awake, and Killua shouldn't have been \Nable to make the two-choice wish.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: However, Something responded to Killua's wish.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: The hint to resolving this contradiction \Nlies in the wording Killua used.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: When making the two-choice wish, \NKillua was not asking.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: It makes sense that a command \Nwould work differently than a wish, and would not require a payment upon completion.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: I'm the one who can use Something's power, \Neffectively and safely, for the Zoldyck family.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: As it stands, Alluka is no more than \Na spirit locked forever in one room.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: But if I control him with you at his side, at the very least, I can guarantee his freedom.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Kil, you need to learn your place.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Kil, this is your last chance.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: If Killua issues a command, there is no need to worry about requests.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: This means that turning Killua into \Nmy puppet is worth any price.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Can you leave us alone for a moment?

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: If you don't leave on your own,

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: I'll have to issue Something a command.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Something is doing this because \Nshe wants me to praise her.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: I don't want to use her by issuing commands.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: If you're nice to me, you have to \Nbe nice to Something, too!

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: If you're going to protect me, \Nyou have to protect Something, too!

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: If you're mean to Something, I'll hate you!

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: I guess I was still under Ill-nii's control.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Can you tell Something to come out?

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: I was scared of Ill-nii, and I couldn't defy him.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: So I did what he said, and I hated it.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: When I realized he might force you to do bad things, too, I got really scared...

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: For Alluka's sake, I lied to myself, and I said mean things to you.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Don't listen to wishes from anyone else anymore!

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: I'll pat you on the head whenever you want!

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: So would you please come out again?

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Something, will you forgive me for being a bad big brother?

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Tsubone, I've rescinded the restriction on Killua.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Too many memories to speak of.

Title: Chairman x And x Release.
Line: Next time: Salvation x And x Future.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: Something, will you forgive me for being a bad big brother?

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: And you should apologize to Kite, not to me!

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: You didn't clearly say if he's dead or alive, but either way, you should apologize!

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: When apologizing to a friend, there's a rule.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: You promise to do things differently next time.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: And you keep that promise, no matter what.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: She had red hair just like yours.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I knew that the scumbags pursuing her enjoyed keeping their prey alive to toy with.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: After my rebirth as an Ant,

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I realized that I was doing the \Nsame things I'd done before.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: Before I was reborn this way, \Nmy job was to get rid of people.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: When ordered to, I pulled the trigger.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I spent the rest of my time yelling at people.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: It was a job anyone could do.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: A ridiculous cycle that continues even after rebirth.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I wanted to give her an escape from that cycle.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I didn't know exactly how it all worked, but...

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I felt that if I let them capture her, \Ntorture her, then kill her, the cycle would repeat itself.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: A dull life in the middle of nowhere, but one lived in peace and quiet...

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: Until that life was suddenly ended \Nby mindless violence.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I pulled the trigger with a prayer that she would escape that cycle.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: Regardless of my actions, \Nthe Queen ate hundreds of humans.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: And when they were reborn, only a few \Ncould remember their prior lives.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: It's possible that most of the human \Nsouls managed to safely escape.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: But I wanted to do something.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I wanted to feel like I was helping them escape.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: If you're inside that body instead of her, that probably means she escaped, and I still haven't run into an Ant who's told me I killed them in their prior life.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: Perhaps they were all able to escape.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: Before all this happened, I didn't believe \Nin the human soul's existence.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I believed that humans had the same worth as flies or fleas, \Nand that they only lived and then died.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: That the ego was nothing more than a bug that arose because the human \Nbrain was slightly more complex.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: That there was nothing after death.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: Our bodies simply decomposed, \Nturned to dust, and scattered.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I believed those tiny fragments had no purpose.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: My appearance is completely different, but I'm doing the same stupid things as before.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I may be a fool, but I won't deny \Nthe things that I know now.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: And I don't want to ignore the \Nthings I don't understand.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I died, and my body was broken into tiny pieces.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: The fragments that I believed were \Ntoo small to retain any meaning possessed a power I could have never imagined.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: Particles no larger than pollen from our perspective have enough energy to impact our health tens or hundreds of millions of years later.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: And our DNA, which is even smaller, contains the vast amount of information that \Ncomprises us, all within a double helix.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: And that infinitesimally small \Nsize is a necessity for the birth of the enormous space \Nknown as the universe.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: Just because something is small does \Nnot mean it produces less energy.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: The soul is probably small, but it has \Nenough energy to repeat the cycle.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: Does that mean I was reborn to continue that cycle?

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I don't know what the future holds.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: So this is nothing more than \Nspeculation on my part, but something inside told me that I \Nmustn't repeat the same things again.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I'm guessing that I'm forced \Nto repeat all of this because there was something I failed to provide \Nmy soul with while I was alive.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: You know how the body moves more slowly without \Nthe soul's encouragement...

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: In my case, I've always been driven by the thought that I can't let things stay this way.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I will repeat the cycle, while thinking that I have to change things.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: Because I made the wrong choice.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: My target shouldn't have been that girl.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: It should have been the ones pursuing her.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: It just means I was the biggest scumbag of all.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: The price for cleansing a tainted \Nsoul was too heavy, so I avoided that.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: While selfishly praying that her soul would escape,

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I was desperate to avoid getting hurt myself.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I shot her to protect myself.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: And now, I'm trying to save myself again \Nby confessing my sins to you, the one who inherited her appearance.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I appreciate your listening to my story.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: You'll stay with the person you shot, living life the only way you can.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: No one will allow you to take your own life and hit the reset button.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: You must live and apologize to me every day.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I'll keep you so busy, you'll never have time to worry about what's right or wrong.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: You will apologize to me and do the work I tell you to do, as you devote your life to me.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: If you forget your current resolve and slip,

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: So you can focus on living.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I wasn't able to fight by your side.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: It sounds like you did some \Ncrazy stuff to defeat Pitou.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: However, that doesn't change the fact \Nthat you defeated an enemy I couldn't.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I suppose I can soothe my ego by telling myself that my judgment was correct.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: But I wouldn't be here now without \Nhelp from Killua and everyone else.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I didn't make it here by myself.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: It appears that we both needed more training.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I heard that you met Ging-san.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: You should go back to him.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I understand what you wanted to say.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I'm glad you came to see me.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: If I need help, I promise to let you know.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: Say hi to Killua for me.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: So right now, go back to Ging-san.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I was trying to take the easy way out \Nby running away from everything.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: No matter the pain, I will keep living.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: So when I die, I'll feel I did the best I could.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I'm waiting atop the World Tree.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I tried to stop him... here{\i0

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: This is definitely the tallest tree in the world.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: The World Tree stands at the city's center, at a height of 1,784 meters.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: Humans are still unable to build a taller structure.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: Climbing the tree is not forbidden, but you must pay a fee and sign a written agreement.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: You can reach the 500-meter \Npoint by elevator or stairs, but after that, you'll be risking your life.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: Every year, around 3,000 \Npeople attempt the climb, but 94% fail to reach the 1,000-meter \Npoint, and turn back.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: Another 4% are forced to pay an extremely \Npricey fee to be rescued from the tree, and another 1% fall and die.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: Which means that, each year, \Nonly about 30 people make it to the top and return safely.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: This is as far as we're going.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: Well, after you told me you would defeat Pitou alone and that it was none of my business,

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: And I think I can say I'm only here with Alluka \Nnow because of the time I spent with you.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: She's the one who healed you.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: Why are you telling me now?

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: You should have told me sooner!

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: We don't want too many people knowing about this.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: You know, it's sort of a complicated family thing...

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: Alluka, can you tell Something to come out?

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: She has the power to grant any wish I make.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: Because of that power, \Nshe was locked up in our house.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: But thanks to you, she's outside now.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: And I'm prepared to spend the \Nrest of my life protecting her.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: We should be the ones thanking you.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: This is no good. If we stay here any longer...

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I'll be traveling to all kinds of places with Alluka.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I'll e-mail you from time to time.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: If anything comes up, let me know.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: Since you owe me a lot...

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: Say hi to your dad for me.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I want to go with you, but I have to watch Alluka.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: And you haven't had a chance to talk alone yet.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: After I've had my brother all to \Nmyself for a while, I'll set him free.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: Will you hang out with him then?

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I'm the one choosing to hang out with him!

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: Sorry, but as far as I'm concerned, \Nyou're in second place.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: Kite said that no matter where we go, we'll always be friends!

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: Next time: Past x And x Future.

Title: Salvation x And x Future.
Line: I'll introduce you to Ging eventually!

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: He abandoned you when you were still just a baby.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: He was willing to abandon his own kid for it.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: That's how amazing it is to be a Hunter!

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: The last test to be accepted \Nby Ging-san is to find him.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: It's a task more difficult than any Hunt.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: As far as I know, he's the greatest Hunter there is.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: He never told me what it \Nwas that he wanted.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: You are a Hunter, aren't you?

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: You want to climb the tree?

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: No one under the age of eighteen \Ncan go beyond this point.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: Unless you have some special \Nlicense or certification...

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: But I'll need you to sign this first.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: Even a president would have to sign it.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: It's just the usual thing that says you \Ndon't care if you die during the climb.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: Don't trust any of the grips or footholds \Nleft behind by previous climbers.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: Those who make it to the top \Nusually do it bare-handed.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: That's how the guy who's at \Nthe top right now did it.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: Well, if you feel you're in trouble, \Njust press that button.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: If you can hold on to the tree for ten minutes‚Äî

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: I still have a long way to go...

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: I can entrust myself to it.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: The moment my fingers touch it,

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: I can feel that there's life there, and that it flows throughout the entire tree.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: So long as I heed the tree's whispering as I climb...

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: How long did it take you to get \Nhere from the 500-meter point?

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: Well, I guess that's acceptable for your first time...

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: On overcast days, it's like a sea of clouds.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: Sure. I might not give you an answer, though.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: What is it that you want?

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: That which I can't see in front of me right now.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: That which you can't see in front of you?

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: I wanted to become a Hunter because...

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: I wanted to become a Hunter because, at the time, it was the most practical way to get into the place I wanted to go.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: That place was used as a certain \Nroyal family's burial ground.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: To enter, you had to belong to \Na trustworthy organization, and to agree never to speak of it.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: And you had to pay all expenses out of pocket.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: In other words, you couldn't really explore it at all.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: You won't find anyone willing to spend the resources and receive nothing in return.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: But I saw it as my chance.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: If I became a trusted pro Hunter, getting the money wouldn't be a problem.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: I set up a special nonprofit organization to explore and repair the tomb.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: Before that, I'd spent the two \Nyears after getting my license surfing archaeology buffs' websites and blogs online.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: To create the nonprofit, I needed about ten oddballs who didn't need money or fame, \Nbut only wanted to know the truth, and who could be trusted to keep secrets.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: I'm always going after what I need.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: I'm so focused, I stop caring about \Nthe ultimate goal that lies beyond.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: Then I guess I'll keep going.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: The people I recruited online and \Nbefriended in offline meetings were all older than me.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: They were regular office workers, \Ngraduate students, and job-hoppers.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: After I told them my background and plan, they helped with the various tasks \Nto create the nonprofit, and they even gave donations \Nfrom what little money they had.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: When our dream was realized and \Nwe stepped inside for the first time, the best part for me wasn't when I finally witnessed the truth of the tomb.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: It was when I looked at my colleagues' faces and shook their hands.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: To this day, they still work for the \Nnonprofit with zero compensation, providing me with viable information.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: The secret of the tomb was nothing compared to the relationships I built.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: What was truly important came \Nto me before what I wanted.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: It'll take some time to explain...

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: Gon, what is this tree we just climbed?

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: Down below, how did they describe the tree?

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: At 1,784 meters, it's the world's tallest tree.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: But the truth is that this tree is a young sapling that's stopped growing.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: A World Tree that didn't receive enough nutrition, \Nand could only grow this tall.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: A real World Tree would take in magma, embed its roots in the mountains, and continue to grow after leaving the atmosphere.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: The world map that you're familiar with.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: The Ants that you and the chairman fought were a non-native species from outside this world.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: That's the truth they don't teach you in school.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: Adults with common sense choose not to go near Pandora's Box.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: In other words, the world that we know is nothing but a small part of a much bigger world.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: There are records showing that a chosen few, from a select time and place, \Nwere able to make it outside.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: I still want the same thing I always have.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: Something that I can't see in front of me.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: There are many requirements to go outside.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: At least four are required before \Nyou can even start the journey.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: Authorization, the means, qualification, a contract.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: I still haven't obtained a single one.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: So if our paths happen to cross in the future...

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: You should enjoy the little detours.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: Because that's where you'll find the things more important than what you want.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: Kite asked me to return this to you.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: The scar's still on my shoulder.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: And then, there was a huge boom!

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: And what popped out was \Nanother coffin, just this big.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: They're called the Testing Gates, \Nand you have to open them to go inside.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: You should enjoy the little detours.

Title: Past x And x Future.
Line: Because that's where you'll find the things more important than what you want.
